name: linabperez_
text: Love this place!!! Doggie training is really good and professional she gives you a lot of tips with one on one classes as well. It’s also fun for the dogs and safe. Definitely worth it.

resp.text: Thank you Lina!  It was a pleasure working with you and Rachel.  :)

name: cheryl gwin
text: Great place for your doggies! Your fur babies will be well taken care of, run and play their hearts out, and have the time of their life! Whether it's for boarding or doggie day care you can't lose with Red Dog Ranch.

name: cheryl gwin
text: Best place ever for your pooch!  You can rest easy knowing your dog is in good hands when you bring them to the ranch.

name: Bretta Cagle
text: Amazing place for your dogs. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Bretta!  Sure do love having the girls stay at the Ranch 💕

name: Joe Anderson
text: What an amazing place to board your dog. Gracie's has learned to.play with other dogs by hanging out.at the ranch.

name: Eve Anderson
text: This place is unbelievably wonderful!  I am in the Shoals, AL area frequently for work.  This wonderful pupper oasis allows me to bring my sweet pup Maggie along with me.  She’s always depressed for a couple days when we return home to Chicago, because she feels so at home - as well as physically & mentally engaged at the ranch.  The owner / operator is actually a dog trainer, and I’m seeing Maggie pick up some great habits each day after her playtime.  Thank you sincerely, for all that you do for Maggie and I.

name: Eric McGee
text: Boarding without hours spent kenneled. Fields to run, pools to stay cool, and other dogs to play with. I think we missed our puppy more than she missed us!

name: Chris Whealen
text: Just an awesome experience and I know my pup had a great time. Very reasonable rates as well.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!  We really enjoyed keeping Elvis at the Ranch, and glad to hear he enjoyed himself as well. 😉

name: Misty Campbell
text: Very pleased with Frank, Jamie, and all the great people at Belle Shain!!  I contacted Frank when I was about at my wit’s end with our puppy, Cross.  He was biting/chewing excessively (on me mostly), he was unable to walk on a leash, and he was just not doing well.  Within a matter of weeks, Frank and his team have taught Cross how to behave better, he has learned commands, and he is a more pleasant dog to be around.  I can tell Cross loves being at Belle Shain, too. He enjoys playing with other dogs, running around, and swimming in the river. Definitely helpful for training and burning off all of that puppy energy!

name: Annie Summers
text: I trained my two dogs Dixie and Maddie with Frank and Jamie at Belle Shain Kennels. It has made a huge difference in how much enjoyment I get from my dogs now they will sit, heel and place. I highly recommend their training facility. My dogs love it there. I still take my  them for kenneling when I travel and day care boarding too. Frank does tune ups on Saturdays at the Woof Bar, I think that’s more tuning up the trainer than the dog🐶. Great people and wonderful property for the dogs to play.

name: Stacey Bottorff
text:
Great training and boarding program! Our dog spent about 3 months with Frank working on general obedience and then progressing from there. He is very knowledgeable and patient, incorporating training sessions with my husband and I throughout the months as well. Our dog enjoyed her time there!
During her time there our dog also required some vet attention (preexisting issue) and Frank did not hesitate to get her into his vet for care. Would definitely recommend Frank and his training program to other dog owners!

name: Daniel Campbell
text: Frank and the gang at Belle Shain are nothing short of fantastic. They are very accommodating and do a great job at a very reasonable price. Our dog was young, very energetic, and rambunctious. They are successfully turning him into a much better mannered young dog. He gets lots of exercise and loves playing with other dogs and swimming in the river (under supervision). He is excited to jump out of the truck he gets there every Monday morning and is obviously very well treated at Belle Shain. I can not recommend them enough.

name: Chase Emerson
text:
Frank and his crew were outstanding!!
They had my dog trained very quickly, and efficiently.
Not to mention they treat all the animals very well. I will use them in the future over anyone else!!

name: Kyle Maxwell
text: Frank and his crew did an amazing job training my dog and treated her very well.

name: Chris Wade
text: No other place I would take my dogs. Frank did an awesome job with both of my dogs. Use him for boarding when we go out of town. Dogs have a blast and get excited when we pull in the driveway!

name: Abigail Jackson
text: Clipper has had a blast this summer at training and boarding camp. He has learned so much and is now off leash. I have seen a total transformation in Clipper’s behavior and attitude. Frank and Staff are amazing to work with and really get to know and care about your dog. I am forever thankful for BelleShain Kennels.

name: karalina worley
text: I brought my 10-week old puppy in for grooming! The staff was extremely friendly and very accommodating. The quality of their services is unmatched and their customer service is even better! My new dog salon for sure. The next appointment is already booked!

resp.text: Thank you! We are excited to have you both! 😀

name: Melissa Williams
text: The crew at Shaggy Chic are just perfect. They loved on my anxious little girl and made her feel at home. Her nails look better than they ever have. I love this place!!

resp.text: Thank you Melissa! I think she will get more comfortable as she spends more time with us. 😍

name: Olivia Shults
text: Very friendly and attentive to me and my pup! Everyone working there seemed very nice and seemed like they really enjoyed working there. They talked with me about what I was wanting and made sure that I was happy with it before I left! They did a great job, she smelt a looked amazing!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We look forward to seeing you and your fur-baby again soon!

name: Tammy Smith
text: Tonya and her crew are amazing. They always take good care of my girl

name: Blake McCranie
text: Took my 11 month old Husky for her first “professional” bath and she smelled and looked amazing!  The owner and groomers are very professional and super friendly.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your sweet baby with us! We look forward to seeing her again soon! 😊

name: Faireca Anderson
text: Very friendly service and they do an excellent job! We loved our dog's St. Patrick's Day photo.

name: Mike Darnall
text: Great place. Friendly staff and clean facility. Dogs are separated by size and they have plenty of room. Staff was knowledgeable and courteous. I was texted promptly when Ollie was done and he came home with a fresh cut and nice bandanna. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We can't wait to have Ollie back in to play! 😊

name: Kara Barr
text:
Staci Galey does a terrific job when grooming my dogs! She is knowledgeable when it comes to grooming different breeds, both large and small, and she is understanding and patient when dealing with our elderly dogs. She also listens when specific grooming preferences are made.
I would highly recommend this business!

name: jazzlyn glover
text: I have gone several times hoping it would eventually get better, but I have had enough. I take 2 dogs there - Malcolm and Charli. Charli has “lost” SEVERAL collars and today when I picked them up they lost Malcolms leash and said I must’ve taken it with me after I watched her walk away with him on a lease. My leash. Also, it looked like Charli wasn’t even cut - especially her beard which is what I wanted the most. Not to mention how unorganized they are. After dropping off today, several hours went by before they called and had all the wrong information - which i’m not even sure how they had the wrong information considering I watched the lady at the front desk write exactly what both dogs were getting done on a sheet on paper by their name. It is honestly not worth the money, I would recommend Petsmart. They’re more expensive, but they have always remembered my dogs names and been incredibly friendly and they do not lose their belongings. Very disappointed and will not be returning.

resp.text: I'm so sorry you have had a difficult time with us. I know excuses shouldn't matter, but I would like to explain and clarify...  I believe your leash was accidentally placed in the wrong cubby today, and we have it at the desk. Being short handed today put our bathing a little behind schedule. We were a little confused on the notes because the length we have on file didn't take much off of malcum, which is why we called to verify. Also, we would love a chance to fix Charli's groom. We only had her down for a face, feet, and hygiene; not a full body cut, but would be more than happy to take more off her face. Sorry again about the confusion. We will be in touch to discuss further if you like.

name: Dianne Windsor
text: Great service, very friendly and goes above and beyond to provide excellent service!!!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Dianne! We appreciate your loyalty over the years! 🥰

name: Tammy Otten
text: Tonya is awesome with my special needs senior miniature schnauzer. She does an awesome job..

name: Jermaya Blevins-Wilson
text: Took my doodle Reesee here yesterday for her very first big girl Groom and I am in Love! I was so nervous about how she’d look and my husband and I are both very pleased that they took the time out with our busy body! She looks amazing!

name: Marye Mcmeans
text: After verifying an appointment two different times when we arrived there was no record. They agreed to work our puppy in for the day.  I called to verify he would be ready and was told to be there at 5 pm, no later.  I showed up at 4:45 pm after a 45 minute drive and was told it would be another hour.  3 different employees that did not provide any customer service and were extremely rude!  Owner stepped in but it was still not customer service you expect. Disappointed!

resp.text:
I'm so sorry you had a bad experience with us. We have recently had to hire several new employees due to the rise in demand. Because it was our scheduling mistake,  I agreed to still keep and groom your baby, along with our already full schedule, knowing it would make for a longer day for us. I explained to your husband during drop off, it might be around closing time before he would be ready, and he was fine with that.
We try our best to accommodate all of our clients accordingly, and provide loving care for your pets as if they were our own. Sometimes that means we have to spend a little more time with nervous or scared ones, which often means we are working past closing. We apologize for the confusion, but what our staff was trying to say when you called was that even though we technically close at 5pm, we stay until the job is done. We always tell our clients to feel free to call and check in, however we will text when ready finished. We have several clients that travel from different areas and if we know at check in, we can get those pups done first.

Shaggy Chic operates differently than most other salons. We allow for a fun and enjoyable experience for the pets that come in, instead of sitting in kennels all day. Because of this unique service, and our goal of providing a high quality groom for each individual pet, our finishing time varies. If mistakes are made, all we can do is try to accommodate accordingly and handle it to the best of our ability. Thank you for giving us a try, and hopefully you will give us another chance in the future.

name: Tracy Kimbrell
text: Everyone here is always so friendly and nice. I am very picky with my dogs groom and they have never disappointed us! If I could I would give them 20 out of 5 stars.

resp.text: Thank you Tracy for your kind words! 🥰

name: Angela Boackle
text:
My Doodle Kevin, loves this place!
He looks great and felt fantastic 👏

name: Sallie Majors
text: Awesome...  so glad to find someone who will groom cats!

name: Janet Hester
text: My Aussiedoodle, Montana loves to go to Shaggy chic and play with the other dogs before and after getting groomed. Everyone there is always super nice and I enjoy seeing them as much as my pup does. They always do a great job on her grooming.

name: Nedra Harris
text: They ALWAYS do a great job with HoneyBun!

name: Beth M
text: I am not sure who love shaggy check more… divO or myself. It is a hidden dream for any pet owner.  Daycare is the best.

resp.text: We love our Divo! Thank you for the sweet review 😉

name: Joe Bertschinger
text: My boys have been treated well here.

resp.text: Thank you! 😉

name: melvin Young
text:
We were one of the fist customers to come to tonya when she opened. We have 15 dogs so we was bringing a substantial amount of business to her. We are an African American family and expect the same understanding as anyone would. We had an issue with one of the hair cuts and mentioned it and things changed immediately. It seemed we were not welcomed there anymore. Tonya would not return our phone calls so we stopped come. Now we tried to give her a second chance to get our business and we called 2 days straight and she will not take our phone calls or even call us back. Very bad business ethics if you ask me. You just don't treat people this way.
Especially with everything that's going on all
Clients should be important but it's not that way with this busy I'm sorry to say.

resp.text: Let me start by apologizing for feeling unwelcome. Our goal is to provide the best experience possible for each pet and their family when coming to Shaggy Chic. With this being said, when you first started coming to Shaggy Chic, I remember going above and beyond to configure a special discounted rate based on you bringing all 15 dogs in for grooming. After agreeing on this price, we have only ever seen 6 out of 15. Out of the 6, only 4 were brought in more than once. No other client has received special discounted rates for having multiple pets,  however, I made an exception for your family. I simply can not be expected hand out discounts for owning multiple pets. We are still doing the same amount of high quality care to each individual pet, and I still have to pay my staff. Let me also say that we have never given any client a hard time when asked if we could change something about their pet's hair cut. Every client has their own vision of how they want their pet groomed, and we always do our best to comply with each unique style...  As for me not returning phone calls, I am a very busy person running a small business and also grooming dogs full time. This is why I have a receptionist to answer the phones and schedule appointments. It is unfair to say that just because I have not had a moment to return a phone call, that means we have "bad business ethics". My receptionist has been more than willing to answer any question you may have, as well as schedule a grooming appointment. However, you have refused to discuss with her. We try our best to please every client that comes through our door. Nevertheless, we are only human. If you are not happy with our services, then I recommend finding another salon to take your pets to.

name: Nettie Dudley
text: Love it!!! They always do a great job grooming my sweet morkie 😊

name: Erica Bodiford
text: First time customer, and definitely won’t be the last time I take my dogs there! They got me in quick and worked around my schedule, forever grateful ❤️

name: Holly Plata
text: They really did a good job on Romeo.

name: Jim Warren
text: Awesome that is the key word about this place. Very professional and did an super job on my little Nikki. Highly recommend the Shaggy Chic Grooming and Nikki enjoyed herself as well.

name: Shelby Seeley
text: Tonya is very professional. She stripped my Spinone Italiano. He got a bath & nails trimmed. I feel he is safe when he was there. Thank you Tonya.

name: James Early
text: Shaggy Chic is the best my pup was sooooo happy

name: Laura Tucker
text: They are quick to respond and schedule. They really pamper your pet and the prices are very reasonable! Not to mention convenient!

name: STEPHANIE BLALOCK
text: Took my LUKE AND LOLA today they were wonderful with my babies. The ladies did a wonderful job and my dogs looked beautiful. Tonya even painted Lola's nails. How about that for a spa day. Already recommended her to Luke's sister's owner. Thanks lady's see you soon...

resp.text: Thanks Stephanie! We loved pampering your sweet babies today! They both did great 😁

name: Mei Mei
text: Wonderful experience. Will return.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! :)

name: Ronnie Savoie
text: We've been looking for someone to groom our dog. We've used a national chain and they said they could not handle our small dog. I call Tanya at Shaggy Chic and she took care of our little man so well, we will recommend her to all of our friends. Jon & Ronnie S.We love everyone at Shaggy Chic. Thank You!

resp.text: We were happy to work on your little man today! He is a ball of energy, and fun to watch run and play . 😁

name: J Onathan
text: Great quick service took three dogs in that all needed different services and they handled it great.

name: Brandon Doss
text: They treat our dog like she's family! Always happy with the service.

name: Jess S.
text: Tonya always does such an amazing job with our 85lb Pyrenees mix. Highly recommend the defurminator treatment to keep down the fur tumble weeds!  Eliza loves her summer shaves for the heat.

resp.text: Thanks Jess!

name: Lorin Dobbins
text: They were great! They kept me updated the entire time my pup was there! Great group of women!

name: Anessa Hammel
text: I absolutely love this place! They were more than accommodating for my dog and the de-shed treatment works like a charm! I'll definitely be back 🙂

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Darlene Talton
text: Greatest groomer. Tonya really loves animals and does an excellent grooming. She doesn't keep your pet caged up.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Talton! Love my Macy!

name: Kevin Shaw
text: I used to live in Pelham but not I live in Leeds and I will continue to drive over there because they do a great job and they are very nice.

resp.text: I'm sorry,I've just noticed your review, and wanted to say thank you for supporting us! We appreciate the loyalty. 😊

name: Terry Maggi
text: Real caring people. If your looking for a new groomer for you fur babies highly recommended

resp.text: Thank you Terry!😉

name: stephanie kennedy
text: Awesome spa day for my dogs and workers so nice.

resp.text: Thanks Stephanie! We enjoyed having them!

name: Winston Waid
text:
Thanks for finally responding. If by settled your mean the check your insurance paid out 4 weeks later that covered the em regency vet and ONE of many of our vet follow ups than yeah guess “settled” in eyes of the law. Also by Alabama state law you would have been better off killing him in your carebecause unfortunately as of now Alabama state law classified him as a possession and worth retail price. But we just want to know WHAT HAPPENED!!!  I’ve done my research this will go away once I find out what happened to our sweet baby. And everything I have stated is factual. Did happen and have all the proof. Contact me and tell me what happened and I’ll remove review. Even though you should be shut down for allowing something like this to happen on YOUR watch.

Added a photo of him leaving emergency vet.
Still no idea how it happened.

Update: 8 months later our dog still having comlpications from injuries sustained here. Hope she’s done something to help protect little dogs because we still have no idea what happened. It not about the money tonya. We want to know what happened to our little guy. I pray this never happens again to another dog.

Dogs stayed 8 hours. Got back with 3 broken ribs!!!!
We dropped off our pups on 9-19-18. Dropped them off at 8:30 am. Well finally at 6 pm we go to get them and one is acting weird. Took him to emergency vet. Long story short he had 3 broke ribs on left side and trauma to eye and face on right side. Nicely asked Tonya about what happened and I don’t know is the only answer we got. She has cameras but of course apparently did not work on that day but they do now. Spoke with her nicely multiple times. Well her insurance paid our claim but only for medical expenses and denied the reimbursement for the groom because Tonya the owner denied to them anything had happened. So when I got frustrated 3 weeks later I went to the place and let her know I was frustrated without yelling or cussing like I wanted to do from day one but did not. Next thing I know cops are there bc her helper called saying she was scared for her life. I have all of this on audio record. If anything Tonya yelled at me when I calmly stated would go public if did not give me my money back bc something happened to my dog in her care. Today is oct 15. We got ins check but no reimbursement from Tonya. Just asked her about it and was told to quit harassing her. Well to this day we still don’t know what happened. But something did because when we left the dog was fine at 8:30 A.M. and picked up at 6pm he was not. Dog was in constant agonizing pain for over week and half. Our vet is the only reason he got any relief until healed because she would sedate him for us. If he wasn’t sedated he laid down staring off in space constantly crying. We’ve used this groomer for 3 years. Don’t think she would intentionally hurt any animal but the fact is he got hurt while in her care and this whole process is completely unprofessional and cannot believe we are getting treated how we are when it’s my dog that has had something happen to him under someone’s else’s care. I’m sorry Tonya but “ I don’t know” is not acceptable when you are dealing with people’s animals. Even though apparently I’ll recieve a law suit for writing this. People need to be aware of what dangers could happen. An animal is a piece of property in the eyes of Alabama state law. Unless you have video evidence you are lucky to get medical bills paid back to you. Never leave your animal at any groomer. Especially a big chain. Thought we were safe dealing with someone we thought we could trust. Will never make that mistake again.
Thank you Tonya for a wonderful experience. Wish I could work somewhere that if I provided a horrible service I could keep the money.

resp.text: This review is inaccurate, and this issue has been dealt with 2 YEARS AGO, when it happened. For the last time, there was no significant situation in which we questioned injury or discomfort while in our care. IF something happened to your dog, he did not show signs of pain/ discomfort at any point during the Grooming proved. I'm sorry that isn't the answer you want, but it's the truth. Therefore, we have nothing further to discuss. You have been Trespassed from Shaggy Chic2 n, and should refrain from posting on any Shaggy Chic related website. Any further communication will result in legal action.

name: Zuryeil Scott
text: These are great people they do a phenomenal job with any dog of any size with really great prices

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Jerry Vazquez
text: My dog feel happy indigo

name: Jessica Fox
text: Best groomers in town

name: Amanda Cronin
text: Friendly employees and clean puppies

name: David Willis
text: Did as I ask.

name: Cami Jennings
text: Took my two pups here today. They went in for their temperament test for daycare, and I tried to warn them that one of my dogs gets overwhelmed easily on leash. They barely greeted me, and took them without asking any questions and threw them into a fully packed yard without reading their charts. My pup must've gotten too overwhelmed and she started to get protective. The main man at the daycare came out and yelled at me, pointing his finger in my face, and saying rude and abrupt things. I doubt this would've happened to others, but he seemed to think he could get away with it because I'm a young 20 year old girl. Would not recommend this place. I thought that they would at least try to work with my dogs because that's their job but they didn't. Treat your customers with respect.

name: hillary lemley
text: Horrible. Horrible service also. My dog stayed with them for 4 days and came home with BLOODY feet and they didn’t even tell me. I had to call back the next morning. I spoke with the owner and she basically blamed my dog, saying she couldn’t sit still. I’m sorry, but she plays at home constantly, and has never came home with slashed paws! I had to take her to the vet the next day and now she’s on several medications to help her heal. AWFUL. Do not take your pets here!!

name: Paul Brasfield
text: Such a nice facility where the owners and the staff genuinely care for your pet.

name: Brittany Ball
text: HH is the best of the best! My shy German Shepherd loves it here. I will never take her anywhere else.

name: Melissa french
text: Excellent facility. Our dog absolutely loves it. The owners and staff are great and very attentive.

name: Susannah Lamon
text: Love this place! The staff is friendly, and the grounds are so nice!! I've taken my pup to quite a few places in Birmingham and this is by far the kennel we feel the most comfortable and she seems the happiest staying. I can tell she plays all day because she comes home just absolutely exhausted. Great place!!

name: Stephanie Baj
text: We love HH Farm! Would not trust anyone else with our girl.

name: Stephanie Casterline
text: We have used Howlin Hollows multiple times for our two dogs when we have gone on trips. The facility is immaculate, clean and beautiful.   The large indoor kennels are amazing with glass doors that the staff write special notes on about our dogs. (If they have a special treat etc)   There are several different areas the dogs can run and play set in beautiful shaded woods and hills. They have a doggy swimming pool that is ionized and a water feature water fall.  It truly is a vacation for our  pups!  Its so comforting to know our dogs are being so well taken care of when we travel!

name: Amanda B
text: Been taking our doodle since she was 6mos old. Everytime we pull up, she squeals with joy! Always worn out when we pick her up too (hooray!). We tried other places too and while perfectly fine for socializing,  after she was full grown, their "runs" just didn't accommodate her activity level needs. Howlin Hollows offer plenty of room to run (or relax!). Great staff, too.

name: Becca Fulmer
text: We searched around the greater Birmingham area for approximately 3 months before we found a place that we were comfortable leaving our pup with. Whereas other kennels and boarding places keep your pet in cages for a large part of the day and rotate them out during the day to play, Howlin Hollows has multiple, large fenced in outdoor areas for your dog to play in all day. All day!! They also have a zero entry pool for your pup to jump in and cool off. The actual kennel facilities are amazing. No cages. You really should at least tour this place before making a decision about whether it is right for your pet or not. It is especially great for high-energy dogs, and dogs that either really enjoy playing with other dogs or that you would like to socialize more. Our pup started off very timid and is slowly becoming much less shy around other dogs. Feel free to contact me personally- i'm happy to share more about my experience with this place.

name: Chuck Schroeder
text: This is like having my dogs at my own house but they get to play and swim in the pool ALL day with other dogs. They get to socialize constantly which in my experience ( 5 dogs) is what most dogs are lacking today. They come home with such a passive demeanor, kids do not have to worry about an aggressive dog and when you walk your dog they would try to play with a passerby dog, not try to pick a fight. Its the owners fault the dog is aggressive- LACK OF DOG SOCIALIZATION!!! Give them a try, you will be thrilled, but your dogs will love it more!!

name: Cynthia Wingard
text: In 30 plus years of marriage  my husband and I have never boarded our dogs when we go out of town always asking family members to care for them or getting a pet sitter. We heard about Howlin Hollows Dog Farm , toured the facility and started trying out the Day Care for our 3 dogs. We were so impressed we've already boarded them twice and couldn't be happier with the care and attention they received!! Kimi and Scott obviously love dogs and take care of their "guests" like they were their family.  I am so happy we can now take our dogs to Howlin Hollows Dog Farm when we travel and have complete peace of mind about the care of our 4-legged children!!!

name: Carlos Enrique Aleman
text: The best place for our Lulu.

name: Betsy Reamer
text: Our favorite place in town - whether for a play day or for boarding, we trust Sadie is having the best time and is very well taken care of. When we pull up, she knows where she is and can't get out of the car fast enough! We love everything and everyone at Howlin Hollows!

name: Heather
text: This is the BEST daycare / boarding facility in the state! The owners are huge dog lovers and all-around good people. The in-ground dog pool is amazing! Your dog will love Howlin Hollows! A++

name: Josh Champion
text: This place is phenomenal and takes great care of our dog!

name: Betsy Reamer
text: We've absolutely loved this place since the first time we took our 12 week old puppy to board her. We've never experienced anything less than the highest level of service and care for our sweet pup. We feel like we're doing her a disservice if we don't take her out there at least once a week because she loves it so much! She gets to run around and swim, and she loves the owners like they're her second parents. Don't discount this place because of 1 review where there are 2 sides to every story and people who have reviewed without ever stepping onto the property. We've been fans of Howlin Hollows from the start and not one thing has made us waiver from our initial feeling. Thankful to have them as a part of the community and as a weekly resource!

name: Jason Lovoy
text: Love this place. You have to see it to believe it. I now recommend to all my friends when asked where in Birmingham to board their dog(s). Whether you have a big dog or little dog - there is a place for them (we have a little dog - but you never have to worry about them getting plowed over by the bigger faster dogs as they have separate places to run.)

name: Ryan Ramage
text: Great place for our dog and not a prettier place around.  Our 13 year old lab loves lounging around the pool and playing in the numerous yards.  Owners a true dog lovers!!

name: Jabet68
text: Charlie loves this place. They take care of him and he always seems ready to go there.

name: Jordan McDonough
text: My dogs love coming here. We always get them back happy and exhausted from all their play. Wonder facility that really cares about dogs!

name: nate Allen
text: EASILY the most beautiful pet care place I've ever seen. I mean off-the-charts nice. Hell, I wish I could stay there. Seriously, it's that beautiful.

name: Jackson Tate
text: Unbelievable place!!! I not only wanted to drop my dog off there, but I wanted to stay there myself for the weekend! Absolutely spectacular establishment and wonderful staff!

name: Mike Schmidt
text: Seemed like a good place. Left the dog for a week. Supposed to get a bath last day. On pickup they said he chased another dog - he does NOT start fights with dogs.  No bath. Said he showed his teeth. He gets regular baths at Petco and others who board him with never an issue.  Add it up, someone likely mistreated him. Would reccomend somewhere else, especially for 40.00 a day and you supply food. Head to take dog to vet.  Has injuries around his eye.

name: Don Gaston
text: I have been using Howlin Hollows Farm since March of this year for my dog's boarding and day care and the results have been exceptional. My wife and I have been looking for a place like this for years where your dog can run and just be a dog. Rosie, my brittany, is a high energy dog that needs plenty of exercise which she can get at Howlin Hollows. Scott, Kimi, and the entire staff go out of their way to make sure your dog has a pleasing experience. The facility is first class and always extremely clean. Birmingham has needed a place like this for your pet for a long time.

name: Shannon Hughes
text:
Howlin Hounds is a lifesaver for me!!  Lokie stayed there a week while I went on vacation and he had a better time than I did!! Lol. They have acres of fenced yard for him to run plus a swimming pool that he loves!!
He goes to doggie daycare a few days a week. The facility is clean and the staff is amazing!!! Thanks guys!!

name: Jane Kemp
text: I have 2 small dogs who have stayed at HHF several times. They even stayed while I was recovering from surgery. Kimi and Scott have been amazing with them. This is the only place my dogs will walk into without shaking their fur off. They LOVE Kimi & Scott!

name: Scott Handler
text: Amazing new facility and tons of outdoor space.

name: Steve Serra
text: Fantastic facilities and super owners. Thanks

name: ZombieJonathon
text: I couldn't be more impressed with Infinity Dog Training! I feel like their greatest skill is teaching me to speak "dog". I have learned so much about dog behavior and that step is very important to training. Understanding what your dog is telling you is so important and helps form the partnership needed for you both to learn together.

name: Frank M
text: We have a "new" dog.  The training was great.  The instructor was very patient and knew what we needed to do to get the best from our dog.

name: Keegan Hammond-Walters
text: Everyone there loves our fur baby as much as we do.  They provide a wonderful, safe and structured environment for him to play and learn.  He has made such progress in becoming a well behaved dog since LaDale has been working with him.  Cannot recommend enough!

name: Miss Behave
text: Started taking our 18 month old GSD here a few weeks ago. He is very high strung and suffers from anxiety which leads to nuisance barking.  He snaps and growls at ALL dogs (even tiny puppies) due to an attack by an adult pitbull when he was 10 monrhs old. Luckily, he was already about 70 lbs. and held his own but has been a different dog since. The owners at Infinity listened to what we had to say (the place near home said he was an aggressive dog) and wanted to charge accordingly. Infinity had us being Bailey in FIRST to gauge how he acts. He knew it was a mix of anxiety and impulse control. Having trained dogs for years, LaDale knew we needed to work on those two areas. In 4 sessions we already see an improvement. He is more relaxed around strangers and doesnt jump straight to 10. Today was the 1st time we introduced another dog and he was anxious but did better than expected. We are glad we found them. The prices are very reasonable and they will work with you. Love these guys! We are getting a dog we can enjoy all the time.

name: Benjamin J. Melton
text: My dog is a new person!!

name: Lindi Pearson
text: Wonderful play groups and boarding. Great staff and always willing to give me reports no matter how many times I call to check up on the puppies. Highly recommend

name: Jennifer Horn
text:
CDT isn't our normal boarder, but i almost effed up Thanksgiving by forgetting to schedule Jackie to board. Creative Dog Training came through for us!

I couldn't believe they had room! And when we got there, they were SO NICE. Oh my gosh, i can't remember her name, but she was tiny & had dark hair like me. She was really able to make me feel confident about leaving him in their care.

Jack was having some hotspot issues, so she took his medicine & told me they keep a close eye on him. They also were able to put him in a play group for older dogs, which they posted pictures on Facebook every day! They also didn't care that I'm a helicopter dog mom & called every day to check. =)

I was so excited, i burst through the door at the facility & announced i was there to pick up my dog. (I also may have done a little dance.) The little girl from before said Jackie's name before i even got a chance to! They really know & care about their clients!

Also, when i picked him up, they'd been taking such great care of his hotspots, they were almost totally resolved!! =O

11/10 experience, will DEFINITELY board there again!

name: Keith M
text: Fantastic facility and knowledgeable staff.  They really work well with teaching us and especially our kids.  Can't say enough positive things about this place.  It's the only place to go for dog obedience.

name: Rebecca Whitaker
text: I took my dog here for a class lesson and Mrs. Margaret was absolutely wonderful. She made the lesson easy and fun for my children and has certainly made a difference in my dog. She has a way with training not only dogs, but owners too! I would recommend Creative to anyone!

name: Madison Mindler
text:
The absolute best place in town!! I have worked here since 2016 and can only say great things. We take care of every dog like they are our own and have absolutely nothing to hide. You can come in anytime for a tour, talk to a client advisor, trainer, or supervisor. Every person has a passion for dogs and a drive to make Cdt the absolute best. I can’t dream of a better job and watching clients go home happy with their pup
Is the best feeling ever!!

name: pitna kim
text: My dog loves to go CDT and he seems like too much fun every visit :)

name: Shades Creek Dental Patient Centered Care
text: I can not say enough about creative dog training! Our dog Sandy is always excited to go and play and comes home exhausted from all of the fun. The staff are clearly all animal lovers and take great care of your pets.  Also, if your pet needs any vet care, they work with a vet a couple doors down to take your pet back and forth for appointments! Thanks!

name: Amanda WR
text: They were nice enough at the counter but when we picked our dog up, her paws and legs were soaked in urine and she was filthy. Our backseat had to be professionally cleaned to get the smell out. I don't know how they let the dogs get like that, perhaps not cleaning the play area well. Anyway, I called them and left a voicemail about this and never heard back.

name: chris collins
text: Creative Dog Training is awesome. We bring our dog every Monday for continuing training and play time. He comes home smarter, tired, and happy as ever. We love our friends at Creative.

name: Lucy Phillips
text: Highly recommend Creative Dog Training! They have done a fabulous job training my Siberian Husky and she LOVES doggie daycare! She’s always exhausted when she gets home!

name: DeKayla Sankey
text: Very poor customer service. You have to consistently pester and call them, only to have them take down your name and number with a very empty promise to get back with you. THEY NEVER DO. I have been calling for a week straight and my problem still has not been resolved, but everytime I call they tell me how sorry they are. Tuh. I am a paying customer and feel very undervalued. I’ve been more than patient with them, but at this point I just want what I paid for, so I can be done with them. I will not be returning.

name: Everything Bham
text: The owner and staff really care about you and your animals!  Never have had a bad experience! One of the best family owned businesses in bham! I believe in Birmingham!!

name: Lori Goldberg
text:
Do NOT take your dogs here!
This place is not sanitary. The workers leave dogs in pee and poop filled kennels for hours before they are cleaned.
The dogs don't go outside from 4pm to 7am the next day.
They have had 2 cases of kennel cough since spring break, and have still been using the same sponge to clean all of the dog bowls.
If your dog is having a health issue while boarding, the workers will not tell you about it if they don't think it's serious. There are dogs who get incredibly sick either from stress or other health problems that result in blood in the vomit and/or stool. The only thing they do is take the dogs food and water away and don't let them outside.
The dogs water bowls are only checked at 7am and then again at 4pm. So your dog may be going without water for any number of hours between those times and the workers will ignore it. The bowls are only cleaned once per day, so if your dog is boarding for several days, there's a very good chance that they'll have the same bowl of water over the course of their stay. They have a major rat problem there, so often times there is rat feces in the water bowls.
The dogs are left alone all night with the rats, which your dogs could be eating over night, making them very sick and possibly catching diseases.
The workers do not have first aid training, so if your dog chokes on the mulch that is outside in the play area, then they are told to "look up an instructional video" to help the choking dog.
They don't pay attention to what the dogs are doing because they're too busy on their phones to care. So if your dog poops mulch (very bad for his digestive system) then it's because they were eating it from the play area. There are also several dogs who eat poop, so if your dog has that habit, it's probably only getting worse because they think they're allowed to do it while staying there.
When the dogs are playing outside, they are sometimes not given water for several hours due to certain dogs not liking the water hose.
I have witnessed a coworker giving the wrong dog her medicine. Once that realization was made, still nothing was done about it.
If your dog is not good with other dogs, they are set as "individuals" where they play by themselves. These dogs are only getting 10 minutes outside to play, and then they get 10 minutes inside to play. They are supposed to have another 10 minutes to play but are usually skipped because the workers want to go home early. So if your dog is boarding over the weekend and they're not good with other dogs, then they're only getting about 20 minutes of outside time every day while the other dogs get over 2 hours.
The weekend hours are different, so all of the play groups are shortened and the dogs are left alone for a lot longer than they normally would be.
Their medicine is put in pill pockets in their food. If the dog doesn't voluntarily eat the pill pockets, then that dog will not be getting their medicine that day.
The dogs only have access to their food for a couple hours a day. So if your dog is a grazer and doesn't eat all of their food at once then they will be eating very little over the course of their stay.
The kennels are painted very poorly, paint is always chipping off the walls, usually because dogs are chewing it off.
Workers regularly spray dogs in the face with Bitter Apple spray. This spray is supposed to be used for dogs that have problems chewing their fur, and is not meant to be sprayed in the eyes or nose of the dogs, but they are regularly sprayed in the face if they are barking in their kennels.
If you request for your dog to be given a bath, they will usually bathe the dogs very early in the day to get it out of the way. Once they're bathed, they are not allowed back outside and their food and water bowls are taken away. So if you dropped your dog off at 8am to be picked up around 5pm, there's a good chance that your dog hasn't been outside or had food or water since about 10am.

resp.text:
Hi Lori, I wanted to reply here as well since I did not hear back from you regarding this same review you left on Facebook.
I'm truly sorry this is how you felt about working at CDT.

As one of the owners, and the person responsible for systems management in the locations I am very upset to hear these things. I'm also very concerned that not once had myself or any of the owners been contacted or told any of these things throughout the course of your employment there.

Because I can assure you, that not one thing you have said is company policy or are reflective of our systems we've built over 40 years.

There's nothing I can say to refute your claims because you cannot prove a negative, all I can say is that if you truly felt this way you should have come directly to myself, Margaret or Damian the multiple times we are all there per day whether helping out, working on things or just leaving our own dogs there for boarding or daycare.

At the end of the day, I'm sorry you feel this way about CDT. We have been doing this for over 40 years at this point, and have thousands of satisfied clients and dogs that I would hope reflect otherwise. If you would like to talk further or share specifics please send me a message because I would like to know details so I can address anything possible.

name: Daryl Mote
text: I’m glad that I checked on here for reviews before scheduling. The owners responses on here to previous employees are very unprofessional, very telling, and honestly, a complete turn off. You ALMOST had my hard earned money.

name: Elliott Knight
text:
Stay far away from this place.

The dogs here are kept in very unsanitary conditions that resemble a prison.

The staff here do not get along and the management is even worse. Almost all of the staff quit in one day over horrible working conditions, unfair treatment, and unfair pay.

Do not apply to work here, and do not take your dog here.

name: Tamara Buckley
text: Experts!! Loving, caring, patient! Trustworthy, your puppy to your senior companion will be in excellent care.

name: Michael Morgan
text: Professional and friendly staff providing effective dog training.  Boarding. Day Care. Grooming.

name: Steve H
text: This place reeked of non-neutered dog pee. My wife could smell the odor on my clothes when I came home and I only took a brief tour.

name: Matthew Burford
text: Knowledgeable trainers at a decent price.  Levels of available training levels from puppies to mature adult pet.

name: Susan Halbrooks
text: My dog loves it and so do i

text: Eye for an open market, professional, and an expert at what they do. Entrepreneurship at its finest in BHM!

name: Anusheel Gandhakwala
text: Its a good place for dog . But sending your dog for 2 hour and your pet will stinks for until you get him bath .

name: karen lovett
text: It was a good place but the inside kennel smell was horrible and starting pay was extremely low.

name: Jordan Estus
text: Great place with great people!!!! Highly recommended!

name: John Phillips
text: They treat me and my dogs like family

name: Gz
text: Dishonest business practices.

name: Hilary schulak
text: Fun place

name: M Be
text: The owner cares about people !! Rare these days

name: Dexter Boyd
text: Great business

name: Bonnie Clarkston
text: On the hardest day of my life the girls sent the most beautiful card home.  You took care of our little man so gently and professionally.  You knew our pain as you day boarded our other big dogs.   When I needed them home after sending Stevie Ray to the rainbow bridge, you sent the best card ever.   Thank you

resp.text: ❤️❤️❤️ they become family to us, too! As do their owners.

name: Charles Kemp
text: We think the are excepcional,  the airways tale Carey of tour family (Pets) anda the facilities are perfect for over night stays.

name: K Richardson
text: Rylee enjoys her visit with the girls and she looked fantastic after her bath.

resp.text: We love when Rylee comes. Thank you!!

name: Estela Somerville
text: These guys were awesome! They took care of our cats for an extended stay. They kept us informed and often sent us pictures. I have a Sassy cat and these guys handled her like pros. Now they're all friends. We will most certainly be using these guys again.

resp.text:
Thank you for the sweet review.
We miss your kitties and can’t wait to see them again!!

name: Liz Griffin
text: So nice and just great 👍

name: Dark Rush
text: The owners were just as warm and fuzzy as the Alpacas!

name: leigh tapia
text: During the end stages of my grandmother's battle with cancer she boarded her schnauzer Buddy here. Sadly she passed away while Buddy was boarded and when my grandfather came to pick him up the day of the funeral (a Saturday) the owner refused to take payment. They had been boarding Buddy at Southern Star for 10 years. My grandfather was appreciative but still wanted to pay. He went back the following Monday to try again to pay because he just wanted them to know how important it was to him that someone had taken care of his furry friend during such a difficult time and they would not let him pay. This meant so much to me and my family. The people at Southern Star are amazing and care not only for the pets but the people as well.

resp.text: Your review is truly touching. We love Buddy like one of our own & your grandfather is precious to us (as was your grandmother). This is the least we could do for your family during this difficult time. Your grandparents have been awesome customers for the past 10 years and customers like that are considered family to us, too. Thank you for such a sweet review, we continue to keep your family in our prayers.

name: larry thomas
text: The best dog grooming i have ever been to

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Denise Graves
text: Wonderful staff who take the best care of your dog.  Facility is spotless.  And the grooming is outstanding.  My dog loves going there.  When I leave him I have no question that he is getting the best care.  And it's affordable.

name: AJ Mullins
text: My elderly dog and teenage cat were taken very good care of. Will be a repeat customer!

name: Ralph Holley
text: Great people. They don't just board your pet, they genuinely care for your pet. I highly recommend Southern Star.

name: Catherine Green
text:
We’ve been driving an hour from Montgomery to board and groom our dogs at SStar for many years.
After trying a few local places, our dogs were not happy when we picked them up.  They love SStar and jump out and run to the door  when we drive up.  The staff is knowledgeable and very friendly-always greeting us with a smile.  They groom our golden and she always looks perfect.  Our family highly recommends SStar for both boarding and grooming!!

name: Drew
text: After getting my dog back from them she doesn’t bark anymore, seems like she’s afraid to for some reason and it’s odd that this change in behavior only appeared after she spent a weekend here. The staff was also sarcastic and not as all friendly; I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.

resp.text:
Hi. Sorry for the late response, our Google business page is under new management. We take reviews like yours very seriously. Unfortunately, we have no record of any incident with a customer as described in this review. We are also unable to verify your identity from the names of customers in our records. We went through our customer bookings in the time period of your review in order to try to contact you and get more information on this incident.
We take pride in allowing dogs to be themselves at our facility. We have 8 spacious yards where the dogs are allowed time to run, play, and bark as they please! 7 days a week.
We hope it is not too late to talk to you regarding this review.

name: Marla S. Webb
text: Nice people that are helpful and do a great job!  Nice place too!  My dog even loved it!

name: WE Pine
text: Extremely friendly and courteous! Thank you!

name: Logan Turner
text: Amazing cuts for good prices!! Wish i had more stars to give!

name: Lisa Adney
text: Best pet people ever!

name: k JONES
text: Very good and friendly.

name: Jennie Jacks
text: Very good

name: J&J Pest Away
text: Great place!!

name: Peg Lawson
text: Always the best care!!!!

name: Josh Yates
text: Perfect!

name: Carl Norman
text: Fantastic place for daycare and boarding! My Great Dane was clearly treated well during his week-long stay and seems to really enjoy his daycare play time. Very clean. Very professional. Highly recommend!!

name: Caitlin Warburton
text: I can’t express how grateful I am for Port City Pups. It was our first visit, and we kept our dogs there for almost a month. From Day 1, Archie and Brodie were treated like family. They went above and beyond to ensure their comfort, including sitting with them while they ate and walking my older dog to get him some exercise. They even took Christmas pictures! They clearly love animals and it shows in their work. On top of the amazing care, they’re family owned, military friendly, and affordable. What more could you ask for?!

name: Tara Wells
text: I was so grateful that Port City Pups was able to accomodate me as I was traveling with my greyhound and needed help with day care while I was visiting the city. They made it so simple and smooth to get her in for some play time and much needed time outside of the car. The service was impeccable from my phone calls to make sure they could take her until the time I picked her up. I couldn't be happier with the service.

resp.text: Tara, thank you so much for this review! We really enjoyed Taz and can't wait to have y'all back!

name: Drama Moye
text: Love love love everyone here! It’s a family owned business and they put their whole heart into it and caring for our pups! I recommend Port City Pups to all of my friends now😊

resp.text: This is so sweet! Thank you. We love having Nala and will always fill up the swimming pool for her! :)

name: jonesb25
text: Just a wonderful establishment. They seem to know all the dogs personally no matter how often the dogs are there. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. If I could give more stars, I would.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this kind review!! This made us all smile. :)

name: russ copeland
text: Port City Pups is awesome!! Bailey and the rest of the staff truly love the dogs and it shows.  Ollie jumps out of the car when I pull into the parking lot!

name: Hilary Harless
text: I boarded my dog for the weekend, and let me just say, I have never felt more at ease boarding my dog. The staff's communication is superb. The facility is clean and organized. They didn't seem overrun with dogs. They remembered exactly who I was when I picked up my dog after meeting me only once. They have a no aggression tolerance. Usually, I worry the whole weekend wondering if my dog is getting let out and if she able to socialize safely, but this was further than the case. Do not hesitate taking your pup here!

resp.text: Thanks, Hilary. This makes me so happy! We strive to make the boarding process as stress-free as possible, and dogs like Luna make that so much easier. She's awesome and we can't wait to have y'all back!

name: Toni Duplantis
text:
Wow, just wow!! Bailey and her family are incredible!!
I have the MOST spoiled, demanding chi-weenie and he loves them!! Rudy comes home so happy and calm. Bailey treats him like he is the “boss”.
And he loves it!! We love Port City Pups!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for this review! Rudy is definitely the boss around here, and we love it that way. Y'all are such sweet clients and we appreciate you very much!

name: Allyson Fulcher
text: We love Port City Pups! Bailey and her staff are incredibly friendly and we trust them completely with our pups. The location is convenient, clean, and we always know our dogs are well cared for while they are there. Our dogs always come home from daycare exhausted from playing all day. Most of the time they are snoring as we pull out of the parking lot. A+++

resp.text: Thanks Allyson!! Birdie and June make our day 10x better as soon as they walk in the door. Y'all rock!!

name: Mick Biggs
text: Great place to take the fur babies.

name: Kat Kennedy
text: The pups had such a good time they didn’t want to leave! Great people who love the dogs. It’s wonderful to know your pets are in great hands when you have to be away!

name: Harrison Pearl
text: Great place to let our dog socialize and get some energy out. The owners are very nice and treat the dogs very well. We always feel comfortable dropping our Airedale off for the day.

name: Erin Hughston
text: The people at Port City Pups are truly animal lovers. I needed to board my dog.  My dog is difficult to work with, but they agreed to take him in anyway. They worked with him and he began to bond with one of the owners! I am so happy! Love Port City Pups and will definitely be back!

name: C Lynn
text: Very clean, convenient to my work, super friendly owners/staff. My dog went here for doggy day care and I was very pleased. We will return.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this kind review! Can't wait to have ya'll back!!

name: ERICA MILLER
text: So excited for Port City Pups to officially open! The owners are so dedicated to caring for animals and I feel so comfortable leaving my puppy with them! Downtown Mobile has been needing a pet boarding and daycare facility for sometime and Port City Pups is the best company to fulfill this need!

name: Rebecca Hindman
text: I am so excited for the Port City Pups opening! This is such an amazing addition that downtown mobile has been lacking for such a long time!! The owner has such a passion for pups of all kind that I can’t imagine trusting anyone more with my fur baby!! Having someone on site 24/7 also gives me a sense of ease that none of the other dog daycares in mobile have been able to provide for me!! The location and prices that Port City Pups are offering are honestly unbelievable! Can’t wait for my baby to be a regular!!

name: Zane Patterson
text: The owner went to South with me, and there is no one that is more patienate about what they do than Bailey. She pours her blood sweet and tears into Port City Pups, and there is nobody that I would rather have provide daycare for my dog.

name: mary Meyer
text: I love this establishment. They do a amazing job!! Always on point and exceed my expectations. They are amazing with my dog and really care. I will not go to another. They have a amazing booking website and super fast with responses of anything. WOW like wow. I love them.  They even contact you back to make sure you don't need anything after.

name: Jan Ellison
text: As this was my furbaby's first bath I was apprehensive about how it would go. They were gentle and made Izzy feel safe. She came home soft and smelling nice. I will definitely take her there again.

name: Misty Bonner
text: I can't say enough wonderful things about this business and their employees.  I was very hesitant to leave my puppy anywhere because she was having a hard time interacting with strangers and other dogs.  In no time they had her relaxed and making friends.  The employees would text me pics and videos without me even asking. My pup LOVES going to daycare now. HIGHLY recommend them for your fur babies.

name: Jovet Alejandro Sanchez Martinez
text: They treat my dog like one of their own. Prices are reasonable and customer service is amazing.

name: Frantina Wilson
text: I have to say I had heard negative things about Piper's from friends, but I continued to use them because we had always had good experiences with them. However, I really can't give Piper's a good review after my 4 babies latest visit over Thanksgiving weekend. We took more than enough of everything that our 2 dogs and 2 cats would need for a stay that spanned from Wednesday night - Sunday night. When we picked them up and got home we noticed left over food for the dogs, we took separate bags for each dog for each day, so was there a day that the dogs were not fed. In addition, MOST of the food we took for the cats was still in the bag...that concerns me as well. My 18 month old cat came home extremely jittery and has been jumping at the slightest noise. I can't say that Piper's did anything wrong, but I will say that our furbies did not come home happy this time. The cats will probably never go back and I will have to think long and hard about taking the dogs back too. The staff, as always, was great in their interactions with me.

name: Lydia Higgins
text: We love Piper's Playhouse and have utilized their services when they were at their old location in Saks. We absolutely love taking our pups to them, as they take awesome care of them and provide us with pics of playtime when we are away. We will always take our pups there for grooming and vacation getaways!

name: The Lott Spot
text: They were truly a blessing and helped us when we were in a bind. My dog was labeled as aggressive by my veterinarian when I tried to board with them. I called Piper's playhouse and the owner personal helped calm me down (I was furious with my vet for not even really trying!!) and allowed me to come visit the facility and my dog loved them and it was great!! We would of had to cancel our plans to go out of town if I didn't find them. They were awesome to me and with my dog. Forever grateful!!

name: The Loc Kingdom By Endless Design Braiding LLc
text: Yess love them

text:
Great doggie daycare and Great people !

I would recommend Piper’s Playhouse to anyone who has the need!  A special thank you to Shannon and the other staff for making our boy feel loved and welcomed!!!  We will use Piper’s again!!!  Thank you for being so great and professional!!!

I can travel with ease, and not have to worry about how my baby is doing 🥰 They're reasonable priced as well.

resp.text: We love that handsome yorkie!!! Thank you for the kind words! We can't wait to see you again!

text: Positive experience.  Will definitely board dog there again.

name: Marissa Manfre

I like to Thank the Owner & Shannon for coming in early to help accommodate my schedule. Again, I truly appreciate the staff for making my babies comfortable while we were here in Anniston, Al. on assignment.

I love that they post pictures and videos of the dogs every day on Facebook, it really eases my anxiety. I definitely recommend this place over any other boarders in the area.
