I am so thankful for the staff, especially Connie, and the care they take of my dog! The love these people will have your dog is truly unconditional. The prices are extremely affordable and they offer daily deals! I highly recommend Piper's Playhouse!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!!

name: Melinda McElroy
text: I have been bringing my puppies, Jazzy and Jagger to Piper's for two years and we LOVE it! We've used grooming, daycare and boarding and we've never had any issues. They are always exhausted after a fun filled day at doggy daycare!  The staff truly care about the animals and do everything possible to ensure the animals are fully taken care of properly. We would never dream of going anywhere else or trusting our pups with anyone else!

name: Tia Stambaugh
text: Absolutely fantastic! My Husky's loved the groomers and they did a great job! Very friendly staff and we were given advise on how to properly take care of their coats and such. Great prices and awesome daily deals! Highly recommended!! We will definitely be making this a regular routine!

name: Cade Somers
text: Our family dog is well-behaved for our crew that includes 3 kids ages 5-11. He loves to fetch baseballs, run, play, and frolic in the occasional Alabama snowfalls but he doesn't get out to socialize often with other people or dogs, so he can act territorially aggressive when kenneled once or twice a year. We've kenneled him other places before, but he came home the happiest when we used Piper's. He came home clean and happy, and the staff seemed upbeat and positive both at drop-off and pick-up. I know he's likely not the most easygoing dog for which they provide services, but our family appreciates them for their professionalism and care.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We can't wait until Homer comes to see us again!

name: Nicholas Shelton
text: I have three hyper-active brindled rescued dogs that absolutely love this place, they begin going nuts when we are still blocks away. When my dogs are there for daycare, boarding, or day school they come home completely worn out and sleep/lay around for the next two days. They groomers do wonderful work. I cannot begin to express my gratitude to the wonderful people who work there for giving me peace of mind while I am away. I highly recommend entrusting your pet with these wonderful people for all of your pet care needs.

name: Tessey Johnson
text: I am very happy with everyone from Piper's Playhouse. They had my babies Casey and Daisy for 3 days, I was able to see pictures of them on their facebook page to see how they were doing. But the most impressive to me was how when my trip home got messed up because of the weather, they stayed late so I could get my babies back instead of having to wait another day. I had missed them so much so this meant the world to me. I would gladly take my babies back to stay with them. Thank you all so much

name: kala mitchell
text: My pup has been going to pipers for almost 3 years now. Even though my pup started daycare at an early age she isnt very social towards other dogs. However she isnt aggressive. The staff at pipers recognized this right away and made accommodations to make her feel safe. While she is visiting she is allowed a safe place to withdraw when the interaction of other dogs is just too much. At the same time she has just as much freedom to join the group and observe or if she is in a really good mood play! The fact that they treat each dog according to each dogs personality and temperament speaks volumes! It is above and beyond and average doggie daycare! My pup is always excited to go to day care! She starts crying from excitement as soon as we turn off quintard. She is always extremely excited to see the staff, especially Alisha! 😉 (her second mom) Thank you to Alisha, Shannon, and all the Pipers staff for 3 years of great service!! 💖🐶

name: Elizabeth Blue
text: They took such good care of my dogs when we boarded them there for a long weekend. As part of their boarding price doggy day care, playing with other size-appropriate friendly dogs, is included!

name: Lisa Amerson
text: Good prices, easy to get reservations. Dog is always excited to go. Love that they take pics daily and I can see how Scout is interacting.

name: Stephen Mann
text: They've kept my dogs on several occasions and have always done a great job.  They are also very reasonably priced.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text: My fur babies look so awesome after their visit and the staff is wonderful. Found my new groomers

name: Erin Calvert
text:
This local Dog establishment is violating multiple heath codes. The owner of this facility and the manager were told on multiple occasions by employees and were aware of the following: Fire extinguishers (they only have 2) being extremely out of date, last checked back in 2015— also no evacuation plan, or safety drills, air vent maintenance doesn’t take place— vents/filters not properly maintained can easily catch fire, this company works with LIVE animals, the safety of your dogs are not being considered as you can tell from the images.... everything is layered with years of dog dander and hair.
When the heater gets turned on the smell of burning hair lasts for days and the company uses wax melts up front to mask the smells. They also stuff the vents they don’t clean with smell good beads to mask the smell.
Even daycare dogs are kenneled. Employees hang around upfront until around 9 when they decide to start putting dogs in daycare—- this means if you’re paying for a full day or even a half day of doggie daycare starting in the morning your furbabies are missing out on 2+ hours of socialization. This facility doesn’t properly clean the daycare room. And weeks worth of hair is noticeable near the drains in the daycare play areas, this is extremely unsafe for your animals/the employees. The smell in this building that’s separate from the building your drop off your dog is horrific. Dogs are left unsupervised in daycare, and the daycare supervision in maintained outside of the daycare rooms- so instead of dogs getting that one-on-one attention they are only monitored when barking has increased. Because of that, rooms aren’t cleaned right away causing burns on paw pads from dogs playing around in urine. Most dogs have to be ran through Grooming to be spot cleaned before leaving. Bored dogs have started eating the walls of this establishment because of the lack of social interaction they receive. This facility illegally mentioned to employees that they can not pay overtime to them when they have worked 40+ hrs. Because of this, I believe the care of the animals that go there are being affected.
During the recent snow storm an employee managed to chase a already nervous dog around the front lobby of this establishment causing him to run out of the front door. This dog was missing for a week and found with his hip shattered, and he had ate an entire toe off of himself.. this establishment paid his vet bill which included the cost of utilization. Clearly the proper training of employees is not being conducted. This facility also does not clean kennels often and when they do they use a dirty mop to wipe out the kennels. This is probably a factor to the outbreak of kennel cough they are currently battling.
Many times employees just feed  dogs breakfast without even bothering to clean the kennel first or move the dog to a clean kennel.. that means that they were eating breakfast in their own filth and kenneled with it until daycare started up. In It’s hard enough trusting someone, let along finding out an establishment you’re paying LOTS of money to is neglecting your animal. This establishment recently caused the death of a small 4 lb dog, and they are trying to cover it up. By deleting comments and blocking any negativity they receive. I refuse to be silent. This facility is anything but transparent!!!

name: Shannon gilmore
text: I wouldn't take my two babies anywhere else!! They love everyone there! My oldest dog is nervous around strangers and he doesn't hesitate to run up to everyone there. The groomer is amazing and I have never been disappointed. I have a 6 year old male dorkie (dachshund/Yorkshire terrier) and a 1 year old female schnorkie (schnauzer/Yorkshire terrier), who are both rescues. I recommend pipers to everyone

name: Faith Wright
text: Great place for our fur babies! They pups love to play and the staff all take good care of pets.

name: Rebekah Shierling
text:
They kept my lab for a few days. She has never been boarded or been to doggie daycare. She came back to me just the way I dropped her off. They were very understanding as to her walking for 15 minutes. They posted pictures of her playing daily! They said she enjoyed herself and they loved her. I would bring her back because for the first time in 6 years I didn't worry about picking my dog up and them being under stress, no walked enough, kept in a crate all day, or not being checked on plenty.

Thanks to piper's dogowners can rest easy knowing their pups are being pampered to the fullest in a clean environment!

I even called and ask if my lab could stay one more day one the day I was supposed to pick her up from our trip and they were happy to let her stay in her room!

resp.text: Can't wait to see Mocha again!

name: wild rose
text: It is a daycare ONLY!!!! THEY NO LONGER ADOPT DOGS OUT!

resp.text: Piper's Playhouse is a boarding, daycare, training and retail facility, but you are correct about the rescue. We had to close the Piper's Rescue in 2018 due to the lack of income to keep it running. We do work with other local rescues in order to continue helping in the community as much as possible. Piper's also holds drives for the the local animal shelters at least once a year to help in that aspect. Piper's Rescue a

name: Rachel Bonnett
text: Wonderful with my Tod his hairstyle always looks amazing.

name: Marilyn Hart
text: Piper's Playhouse has been a lifesaver!!! We recently got a very sweet but very high energy rescue...Smokey:)  They were not scared off by his hyper-self and have been a wonderful help in helping me make his entrances and exits not so wild LOL;). I live and work in Gadsden so add 3 hrs and 140 miles to each work day for Smokey to go there...it's worth all that extra effort bc I know he is well taken care of(they welcome me calling to check on him), having fun, and will be toast when I pick him up, which makes nights much more manageable;). This place of business is clean, professional, helpful, loving, and a blessing for dogs and dog owners!!!

name: Kate Upchurch
text: Prior to this past visit I'd have written a great review but when I picked my little guy  ( a shih tzu )up on Christmas Eve I was horrified! Shaking, limping and handed dirty bedding with no explanation as to how he was injured, why we weren't informed  when it happened plus finding out he'd been very stressed by being kenneled every night in the large room with the large dogs with big dog barks! When I first boarded @ Piper's 2 years ago I requested that he be kenneled at night with only little dogs and was shown a room off the hall on the right where I was told the small dogs stayed. When I asked why he was put in the big room this time with the big dogs she said "well, you didn't request that he be separated". If my file had been consulted I'm sure it would reflect my wishes. There was no I'm sorry we didn't contact you about his injury, etc. He literally had to be carried that night and Christmas day every time to potty, to food bowl, etc. While I understand this may not be the norm @ Piper's, ( had never happened to me before) since it happened this time, I'll be making other arrangements next time. Beware. Things are not always as they seem. Ask to see where your dog will be put at night. I was told they  NEVER allow tours! That's shocking! I've ALWAYS toured where I board my dog. Ask what their policy is if your dog becomes injured or sick. I asked when the owner would be there as I wanted to speak in person with them and was told the owner was never at the Anniston location. Really? So, I've emailed the owner to express my concerns.

name: Wilson, Brandon David
text: To fire one on leave seem real... despicable. More care is given to pups than those mental. If you've paid the piper you know who I am. The management's a joke, but current employees are grand.

name: Leisa Cole
text: My dog loves this place! People working here are GREAT!

name: Alabama Zephyr
text: Wonderful staff and a wonderful doggie day care! Thank you!

name: Lawanna Wade
text: Thanks to Pipers Playhouse  for taking care ol Handsome  for the Wades !

name: Shawanda Edison
text: Prices aren't what they advertise. But it's a nice place to take your pet and know they are in good hands.

name: Micah Morgan
text:
Highly recommended! Never had a complaint! My babies have been groomed here, boarded here and had play dates in daycare! If they were misbehaved I would have them in the training classes as well. There prices are very affordale plus they have just lowered the prices! They always have some new homemade nutritional snack for sale on the counter and tons of things to buy for your fur baby. Ranginger from shampoos to clothes to toys to collars and leashes. You will not be disappointed. Thank you Pipers for making it easier for me to go on vacation without being weary of how my babies are. Yall are awesome!

Also I would like to add with being a former employee of Pipers Playhouse. Know that your baby is well watched and takenjoy care of. Blankets, kennels and play areas are washed daily with non harmful chemicals.  They have very interactive play during daycare, someone is always watching and spending time with your furbaby. Medicine is well charted and given correctly.  Staff does their very best at making your pets stay as easy and comfortable as possible. The owner is the most compassionate person I have met and treat every animal with respect and love. You must check out Pipers for yourself!

name: NameIs Private
text: Great people great service.  Thank you

name: Ms. D.
text: The front desk worker helped me a lot.

name: Cory Clifton
text: Great place for doggy day care

name: Toni Bell
text: My dog was boarded the weekend of July 4th. He was picked up today and reeked of urine as well as his bed that was sent. Highly disappointed and will not be using pipers playhouse again.

resp.text: I am very sorry you were disappointed with our services. Rudy (still being a puppy) did have accidents in his kennel at night. He also played VERY hard in doggie daycare each day. His bed and blankets were washed each day - but in the rush of dogs leaving today (July 5th) it was overlooked. I have addressed it with my Boarding Supervisor and it will not happen again! We would like to offer him a free full-service bath.

name: Maia Canning
text: The place smells strongly of urine.

name: Teresa Craven
text: The daycare is the best!!!!!!

name: Lisa Lang
text: I have just started using them and just boarded my 2 pugs with them while we were away for 5 days. My pups were clean, super soft and smelled so good when I picked them up. Even though they were super excited to see us when we got there to pick them up they were very calm so I know they were happy while there and not stressed out. I left them at another place several months back and they were shaking and nervous acting when I got there to pick them up but Not here so I definitely recommend and will definitely stick with them!!

name: Ryan Ware
text: A lot of the previous reviews have spoken for me. I would not recommend this clinic to anyone. We had a VERY BAD experience, but the follow up to our concerns were even worse. Attitude of indifference as bad as I have ever seen it. An extremely unorganized drop off, poor communication at best, pick up was obviously bad as my dog was in horrible shape (he was just fine when we dropped him off), and then like I said- couldn't have cared any less when I followed up with them for help on an avoidable $650 SPENT AT ANOTHER VET'S ER RIGHT AFTER LEAVING THIS PLACE!  Do not recommend!!!!!

name: Tiffany Newman
text: 1st time vet visit for my newly adopted pet. This vet was rude. Cut me off in mid-sentence when I was explaining my pets past history. I won’t return back here. Do not recommend at all.

name: Lauren Anderson
text: The front desk workers were very nice and professional, as well as the veterinarian that saw my puppy Draco!

name: Cathee Gipson
text: We use RRVS for daycare and boarding as well as veterinary care.  The are simply the BEST!  Dr. Myers truly loves her patients and always gives us honest advise on a level we can clearly understand.  Our dogs love the boarding suites and enjoy staying at River Region as much as we enjoy our vacations.  The daycare is AWESOME!  We all get to sleep soundly at night after they play so hard all day.  The photo shows them relaxing after a fun day with their friends at River Region Veterinary Services!

name: Kerri Fontaine
text: Just a warning for people who select River Region Vet Services.  The Vet. is very unprofessional and very rude.  I will never again recommend her services nor will I be returning.   Three different times she has shown her true colors of blaming, scolding, and almost yelling.  Nobody deserves to be treated that way.  A new customer was sitting in the lobby with me and after the Vet went back to the back the customer asked who was that?  Clearly seeing her rude bedside manner.  Her prices are too high for the horrible customer service.

name: Sierra Evans
text: Trust that you won’t know the full truth of the low star reviews. Unless something is documented and handed to you first, the price or services might change. Posting under a different name for my own protection, because I don’t think I should be threatened for stating facts.

name: Jeff Brosius
text: Started taking our new furbaby here. Vet is amazing and funny. Took care of our baby very well....

resp.text: Thank you so much for trusting us to care for your baby!!

name: Brittany Little
text: Dr. Myers is the BEST. I have complete trust in her veterinary knowledge and abilities. She knows what the best course of action is for her patients, and is terrific at explaining everything in layman’s terms. We don’t take our fur babies anywhere except RRVS!

name: Terry Farmer
text: Caring and professional,  always excellent communication from veterinarian

name: Carole Dozier
text: Dr Myers and her staff at RIver Region Veterinary Services have been taking care of my dogs (babies) for almost 9 years. I can not say enough about how amazing Dr Myers is!  You can't fake how much she truly cares for animals and has their best interest in mind.  I have been through everything from new puppy care, stomach trouble, spay and neuter to kidney disease and having to let go of one of my babies. Dr Myers would not give up on my dog with a rear condition, even calling Auburn several times to confer with other veterinaries. When it was time to let my baby go she was so caring and hugged me while i cried, reassuring me that we  had done all we could. Just this past weekend one of my babies had to be hospitalized at another clinic with 24 hour care, Dr Myers called the staff there to make sure they had all the information on my dog as well as called me to check in. Above and beyond, even on her weekend off. Dr Myers will always be straight with you about your pet. Yes, some people don't like this but i would much rather have a doctor, people or animal,  tell me the truth no matter how hard it is to hear. I respect this about her. As an owner of two fat Beagles i have gotten several talks on their weight.  But i know this is because she cares about my dogs and does not want to see them suffer with what can happen to them  from being obese. It is not you are wrong and i am right, it is lets work together to help your dogs.  It is not just my husband and i that love Dr Myers and her staff, it is also my dogs that love their vet!

resp.text: Thanks, Carole, for your kind words. We have been through a lot together! We appreciate your trust in us, and love taking care of your babies.

name: Linda King
text:
Dr. Amy Myers at River Regions Vet Services is just the Bomb!!! She is always smiling and I never have to wait long to see her. The quality of care my furry babies get there is terrific!
Dr. Myers staff is wonderful and always so helpful. Ashley, her main technician, is so knowledgeable and informative. Everyone is attentive not only to my pets needs but to my needs as well.
I have other family members that take their pets to River Regions Veterinary Services. I highly recommend you do so as well!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Linda! We appreciate the kind words, and your trust in us.

name: Scott Smith
text: Awesome as usual.

name: Scott Frederick
text:
If you care about how you and your pet are treated, don’t use this Vet.

The staff seems heartless and very uncaring, especially Dr. Myers. After boarding my dog there for 2 days, she came home with bumps all over her body. When my wife called to questions this, she was told that they would not being seeing our dog anymore and that if she had bumps, that this was our problem. Dr. Myers then proceeded to curse my wife out on the phone. The treatment we received from River Region Vet Services was unprofessional and appalling.

name: Chelsea Foradori
text: I'm not sure how this place is even still open with the horror stories I hear about this "veterinarian". The fact that my family member left in tears because you refused to help a dog and instead of professionally explaining anything you just demanded the dog be sedated before returning. Without even the slightest explanation. Unprofessional to say the least.

name: CGF
text: Visited with our pug for the first time after moving to this area.  Dr. Myers took the time to explain needed treatment and made recommendations to consider.  She was mindful of costs and wasn't "pushing products."  She and her staff were pleasant and professional!  I'm glad to have found a veterinarian we can trust so close to home!  Definitely would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We enjoyed meeting you and Link this morning. Can't wait to get him better!

name: ALICE JACKSON
text: Best Doctor and staff within 100 miles! Dr. Myers is the only vet that will take care of my pets. She treats all patients with loving care — she is the best!!!

name: Lori Roy
text: We have been clients of River Region Veterinary for well over 5 years. Our children are grown and our pets are our children.It is such a blessing to have an animal lover like Amy to care for them. We have had many various veterinary hurdles over the years but she was always there for us and treated our babies like they were hers. We have had surgeries which were critical and she spent the night with them when we could not, we had overnight emergencies and she met us at the office before we could get there and stayed with us, we had difficulties giving medications and caring for one of our pets after a surgery and her caring and compassionate staff came to our home to help us, when we and our grown children have lost pets we were called and sent loving and understanding letters. We are older and have had many vets over the years, but no where have we received this level of not only professional and intuitive veterinary care but genuine love and care. Thank You so much for being such an important part of our family.

name: Justin Coleman
text: This place is great! My dogs board here basically every day. Dr Myers is very knowledgeable and helpful. It is also great to walk in and have a friendly staff member like Ashley Coleman greet you as you come in. 5 stars! Excellent!

name: Melissa Stiles
text: Dr Myers and her staff are absolutely amazing! They always greet my fur babies by name. They have been there for me for routine treatments all the way to very serious emergencies.  I recommend this facility to my friends all the time. There are two veterinarians closer to my home and I couldn’t imagine not using Dr. Meyers. River Region Vet Rocks!

name: Britney Josey
text: If I could leave 10 stars I would! I can’t tell you how much my dogs love going to see Dr. Myers and her wonderful staff!! I have been taking them to RRVS for over five years and I know I can always trust them to take the best care of my pets! I will never use another vet, they are stuck with us forever😊

resp.text: We love seeing you and your babies coming through the door!

name: Missy Piatt
text: Amy is DEFINITELY the best vet EVER!!!

name: Niki Treadaway
text:
Dr. Myers and her staff have taken great care of our pets. We were out of town when my dog had a medical emergency and Dr. Myers took excellent care of her in our absence, and even took momma dog and all 5 puppies to her house until I could have my new pet sitter pick them up from her that evening. She has gone above and beyond for us and we love and trust the care she provides.

It’s unfortunate to see some of the negative comments on here by disgruntled patients. Please form your own opinion by giving this office a call for your pets needs.

name: Mil Member
text: I had a horrible experience with this veterinarian today! Dr Myers was most unprofessional during my visit and I am appalled at her behavior.   I was berated and yelled at while Dr Myers was examining my pet this morning and this occurred in front of her staff!  I was paying for the pet exam not the attitude and personal feelings.  Needless to say, this will be the last time I use Dr Myer's services for my pets.  I have been using her since 2011 and spent plenty of money in her office.  However, there are too many other qualified, competent and caring vets available in the local area to put up with this.  I chose her because she is in my community and close to my home.  I wish I had done a better job at researching her; if I had, I would have found other reviews similar to mine which would have led me in another direction.  I am a responsible pet owner and care for my pets like they are my children.  I would never knowingly do anything to cause discomfort or harm to my pets.  There was absolutely no need for her conduct today.  Now I understand why there are flyers in her office requesting her clients to leave reviews on specific sites (this is one of them) to counter the bad reviews she has received in the past.  Please, please do your own research before selecting Dr Myers as your vet.  I don't recommend her under any conditions.

name: Connor Headlee
text: I started taking my pups here a couple months ago. It has been a great experience since. I am a first Ike dog owner and this place has made it so easy. We rescued a dog and she is in perfect health. I recently rescued another puppy who looked like he was left for dead. He had all types of worms and just poor health. This vet has helped me get my puppy healthy and they call often to check on his health. I love boarding them here as well!

name: David Williamson
text: We love Dr. Myers. And our furbabies love her also.

name: Amy Tyner
text: I love River Region veterinary services!! Wonderful staff who will take such good care of your animals! I especially love Ashley and Dr. Myers, they are the best! Take your animals there! ❤️

name: Becki Roberts
text: Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver are excellent vets. My cat has had several urinary blocks. They have been caring and dedicated to finding a solution for the problem. When they needed to refer him to another vet for surgery there was no hesitation in their referral. Thankfully things have gone well and we are in the recovery phase now. Thank you Dr. Myers and Dr. Caver.!

name: Cameron Lawracy
text: The service that Dr. Myers provides is superior to almost every vet I've ever been to. She's thorough, kind, and willing to explain her treatments. They know my family by first name, and I know they care about my dogs. The only negative is this vet is kind of expensive, but I feel like you get what you pay for. So I believe she is worth it.

name: Terrie B
text: Dr. Myers will go above and beyond for your pet.  She has been treating my pets for over 10 years. She has helped my babies in multiple emergency situations and very kind while assisting two geriatric pets over the rainbow bridge.  I highly recommend Dr. Myers and River Region Veterinary Services.

resp.text: Thanks Terrie! It is clients like you that make us love what we do.

name: Kayla Brown
text: Dr. Myers, the veterinarian, is AMAZING! She has been taking care of allcof my animals since she opened her clinic. She has saved my English Bulldog's life mamy times! The staff, even though has changed, is still extremely nice. They have a doggy daycare that you can take your dog to while you are at work. I can't stress how amazing this place is. And comparatively pricing, she may not be the cheapest (even though you get what you pay for anyway, but she is certainly cheaper than a lot of other vets! Thank you Dr. Myers, for everything!

name: josh smithart
text:
Wouldn’t recommend this veterinarian to anyone. There are many other vets in this region who will love your animals like you do. This isn’t one. BEWARE!
**i have never and will never go to this clinic**
Take a look at the reviews and responses to reviews before you settle on a vet in the prattville area.

resp.text: You have never been to this hospital.

name: jerrold Haskin
text: Well I am in the process of looking for another Vet.  To many strikes in just 3 short months of using this facility.  (1). I boarded my dog for 3 to 4 days and he developed Kennel Cough.  They prescribed medicine that I had to pay for, but he developed Kennel cough at their facility.  He’s 8 years old and never had this happen before.  (2) Took my dog in for grooming at 7 am.  Told it would take 3 hours, after not receiving a phone call I followed up at 1pm, only to be told my dog was groomed, except nails.  He would be ready after groomer retuned from lunch.  Why not finish him, nails take 5 mins???  Well then I go pick him up a hour later and he still not ready.  So the person working the front counter goes back and cuts his nails and now he is bleeding from that experience as I take him home.  (3). While I’m waiting at front counter for my dog another gentleman brings his dog in who is barking quite a bit.  I happen to look back at the Counter Rep and catch her look of disgust of having to deal with this dog. (4) I call on Weekend because my dog has ear infection, Doc calls me back after second message and says it will have to wait till Monday.  Gives me remedies I had already looked up, but no option to get medicine after hours.  I brought my dog in Germany and he has lived in and been cared for Vets on Turkey, Tucson Arizona, Chicago, and Alaska.  Never have we had any of these experiences, and I have all these in 3 short months..  Time to move on and I tried to give benefit of doubt.  Just cannot keep doing it and they really need to have people work the front counter that displays a loving attitude toward pets.  They faces don’t say I love doing this for a living.

name: Melissa Bazzell
text: Dr. Myers has always been professional and taken good care of our animals.  Dr. Myers and her staff were very kind and caring when we had to put our Boxer down because she had cancer.  They are very down to earth and easy to talk to and always answer our questions.  Thanks Dr. Myers and Staff!!

name: T.J. Conwell
text: Dr. Myers and her staff are my first choice to provide care for my pets.  They always get top notch treatment at the clinic, and the staff is exceptional in their knowledge, explanation, and their compassion for not only my pets - but for my family as well.  Thank you for all you do!

name: Kirby Thompson
text: Superb people, awesome facility!  Our puppy, McCue gets the greatest care.  He loves going to DayCare so much he meets us at the door after breakfast.  Once on the property we have to hold him back as he charges for the front door.  We love y'all, keep up the good work!

resp.text: McCue is always a bright spot in our day!

name: Kayla Mason
text: This facility is so nice! All of the staff members were helpful, courteous, and a joy to be around. I would definitely recommend this clinic to other pet owners!

name: Sylvia Coleman
text: Awesome! Very helpful with whatever my dog needs. Great staff especially Ashley Coleman!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love seeing Tux come in the door.

name: Gipson's Tire Bob
text: Always great and timely service from the friendliest people!

name: Jeremy Pease
text: Vet service is great.  I would not recommend boarding though.  Sunday pickup person was 20 minutes late and not very friendly.  Food we portioned for dogs was not given as instructed and to was urine soaked which leads me to believe they were confined too long.

name: Kathleen Daughtry
text: I have always had a wonderful experience at this clinic. The staff is wonderful and Dr. Myers is always willing to go the extra mile to help her human and animal clients.

name: Alex Ray
text: I took my dog here to be groomed due to the convenience to my house and the price difference compared to other groomers ( other were 80-90, river regions confirmed TWICE it wouldbe $60) They tried to charge $75 when he was picked up claiming they did not know who told me $60. Since my husband picked him up he just paid them $60 and didn't question the cut. The cut looks nothing like the reference picture, I asked to blend the fur so there would not be choppy lines (he is a Great Pyrenees's)  the cut was choppy, uneven, and to WAY to short (he was not matted)

name: RaBin Kim
text:
The doctor is extremely ignorant and unprofessional.

I took my puppy to this vet about a week ago. When I got out of the car the doctor was going to her car saying hello to me. And she left. Went inside and there was a young lady at the counter asking me and my husband “what can I help you?”, we said “our puppy keeps throwing up all day”. And now she says “Actually the doctor is not here for today. We can’t help you” so we said we just so her in the parking lot but it’s okay we will leave.

A day later my husband got an e-mail from the doctor basically saying “Your wife was rude. Please find another vet. We can provide your pets data.”

We were so upset with the doctors ignorance and unprofessionalism but later on we just felt pitty for her bad behavior. We are changing the vet. Please do not use this vet.

What is the point if a vet is open without doctor? This is a totally stupid situation.

resp.text:
We are a single doctor practice, so we work by appointment. We were leaving the clinic to make a house call when you arrived, and I spoke to you in the parking lot. You said nothing about your puppy being sick, and he was running around like he was fine. I assumed you were there for boarding or something else that does not require my presence so I left to see another client.
When my receptionist offered to call me and have me return you were rude and disrespectful. I do not tolerate people mistreating my staff, and that is why you got the email. None of this has anything to do with me being "ignorant and unprofessional", and everything to do with your repeatedly being rude to my staff.

name: Marion Crutchfield
text: We have been using Dr. Meyers since 2012.  We initially had 2 senior dogs who passed in 2013 and 2014.  One of them developed cancer and Dr. Meyers amputated the cancerous leg and gave her another year with us.  We adopted another rescue from the shelter Thanksgiving 2014 and took her to Dr. Meyers who immediately found parasites and identified a broken hip that hadn't healed.  Dr. Meyers said the surgery wasn't absolutely necessary but we scheduled it anyway.  Jan 14th she will get her hip fixed and I look forward to long walks with our new companion because right now a walk completely does her in for a few days..  I have complete trust in and respect for the staff at River Region Vet Services.  They handle every situation with so much grace and make you feel so special.

name: Jason Bryant
text: These folks were very caring and really went the extra mile to look after my cat.  Thank you very much.

name: Lewis Shepherd
text: I was in from out of town and my Shih Tzu started having problems with her eyes. The vet took me right away as a walk in, even guided me in on the phone. Not only did she diagnose the issue correctly, but pointed out some early warning signs of other issues. I'm extremely happy with my experience, and highly recommend this office.

name: TERRY Tanner
text: Excellent people, always take good care of my dogs!

resp.text: Thanks so much Terry! We love taking care of your rotten babies.

name: Roscoe
text: First off I will say I like Dr. Myers.  Used her as my only vet when we first moved to Prattville, a bit on the expensive side.  This being said.  I changed vets due to the fact when I needed her for a new puppy that had parvo, I was told on a Friday to call back on Saturday.  We were told to call on Monday because Dr. Myers was off that weekend.  So now we are using a great vet with better prices and has 24 hr care right here in Prattville.  And our puppy is alive and well.

name: Leslie Donovan
text: I visited this clinic because of the location, convenient to my home.  I realized immediately that the veterinarian wanted to add every service she could think of to my visit to rack up a big bill.  This was almost laughable, because she made a comment about my purse and that she had one just like it.  It was a designer bag that she took to mean I had all kinds of money, and proceeded to try and take advantage of the situation. My dogs have always had continuous care with a vetrinarian and I knew they did not need all she was prescribing. My dog had some allergies and outbreaks on his belly, and all he really needed to start with was a good allergy shampoo, not antibiotics and a special skin condition medication.  I would NOT recommend this clinic.  I always recommend questioning medications and doing alot of your own research.

name: Bill Crum
text: Great for your pets. Mine love paws at play

name: Sandra Hines
text: Dr. Amy Myers has always been very helpful and taken great care of my animals. She has been our Vet. since she started her work in Prattville, AL.

name: L W
text: If I could leave negative 5 stars I would. EXTREMELY unprofessional, non caring. No passion for Veterinary medicine from anyone employed here which is needed to perform in a humane fashion in this type of field. DO NOT take your pets here.

name: Midori Matsumoto
text: My experiece with River Region Vet Services was amazing. We have recently purchased a wonderful puppy named Spike and our visit to River Region helped us alot. The staff was wonderful and the receptionist knew us from our last visit. She remembered Spike and was very kind, helpful, and made us feel as if we were family. I am not sure of the other reviews, but I can honestly say that I couldn't think of a better vet service to go to. As far as being to expensive I really can not agree. When I compared the prices just for Spike's vaccination we would have spent over $200 just to have them see him and do a physical. At River Refions our bill was no more then $75.50 for all his shots and physical combined. I suppose everyone have their opinions but in my personal opinion, I will go no where else for Spike's check ups and vaccinations. My experience there was more then I expected.

name: Chelsea Ethridge
text: If I could give 0 stars I would! Possibly the most unprofessional and rude human being I have ever met.

resp.text: We spent a lot of time with your dog trying to just get our hands on her, even though she has already been banned from one facility. I was nice to you until you laughed about your dog shredding my arm. Your behavior was less acceptable than your dog.

name: Melissa Carden
text:
The vets at RRVS are phenomenal. Some reviewers have posted negative reviews based on the vets "trying to make money by suggesting more services." To these reviewers, I say, they are the ones with the veterinary degrees--don't you think they know what your pet needs? If you just want a vet who will give your pet the bare minimum (basic yearly vaccines), then, by all means, go somewhere else. If you want a vet that will take care of your pet proactively, then this is your place.
The staff at RRVS are wonderful as well. With a very low turnover rate, the front desk staff know us on sight--myself, my husband, and our pet--and always make us feel welcome and cared for.
RRVS is the only vet in Central Alabama that I will use.

name: Jude Crelot
text: This vet, specifically Dr. Myers, did and unnecessary surgery, without my consent on my dog. She lies about prices of things saying a cheaper price so will say ok then when you go to pay its almost double what you were told, I have personally seen her drinking \using drugs. She spreads lies about her patient's owners on social media, and she told someone close to me after a major surgery she had a machine that would help her heal, but for her not to tell anyone. Thinking OK this can't hurt she let Dr. Myersdo this treatment which caused more harm to this person. People stay away from this vet, I do not want unnecessary unethical things done to my furbabies!

resp.text: Jude Crelot has never been to River Region Veterinary Services. This review is intended to retaliate for us taking her friend to court to receive payment for treatments done to her pet. The courts found in our favor, shortly before this review was posted. It is a shame that people can post complete slanderous garbage on this site.

name: Steven Perry
text: Very friendly up to date on new types of vaccinations and treatments

name: Sue Herbert
text: Great veterinarian and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Sue! We are glad you trust us to care for your fur babies!

name: Kelly Brand
text: Rude and snotty. Won't go back!

resp.text: Kelly Stroud has never been to River Region Veterinary Services.

name: Trey Poole
text: Great people

name: Terry Brown
text: I am so pleased with my BIG DOGs grooming at Paws and Whiskers! Awesome job, great with my very active "puppy". I highly recommend them for all your grooming needs! We will not go anywhere else!

name: Sarah Knight
text: She is the best!!! I’m very pleased with my furbabies bath and cut. I already made their next appointment!!!!

name: Willie Mason
text: It was really a great visit she was efficient & professional I would want everyone to give her business

name: Kelly Parkhurst
text: I will never use this grooming service again. I have an Alaskan Malamute and what she called 'matts' was actually his undercoat. She not only shaved part of my dog, but there were bald spots from where the hair has been ripped out. She shaved his underbelly and the back of his legs. These dogs have a special coat that keeps them cool and now his is gone. She also trimmed his nails too short and one is bleeding. When asked about it i was told she doesn't trim them she uses a grinder and that something  must have happened on the way to the car. My dog is miserable and his beautiful fur is gone. He doesn't even look like a malamute anymore.

name: Ben Williams
text: Always does a wonderful job...thanks

name: Deborah Burch
text: Amy always does an amazing job on my hard to groom fur baby!!

name: Andrianne Adams
text: Fast and efficient. They love their job. Which means they'll treat your pet as their own. Kodah loves it there! He always comes out happy and fresh and cute!

name: Kevin Payne
text: A fantastic cat grooming service, with very affordable prices. Very kinda and polite, they take care of your pets like family. I highly recommend their grooming services!

name: Jim Richards

name: Jonah Leclair

text: one of the best pet grooming services in town would recommend to anyone!

text: My little baby was a hot mess, and now she looks like a beauty queen.  Thank you Paws and Whiskers!!

name: Randy Byrd
text: I found the puppy I was looking for.

name: Cindy Palazzo
text: Bought our boy from them. He is very healthy and extremely smart. Totally recommend their pups!

name: M Smith
text: My dog seemed to have a great time at doggy day care. He was happy and tired when I picked him up. The staff is incredibly knowledgeable and kind. The facility appears clean.

name: Matthew Mayo
text: We take our dog rascal here for grooming and daycare regularly. He’s always so happy and excited to go, and comes home tired out at the end of the day, which is quite a feat for a jack russell. The groomer always does a great job with him, and he looks (and more importantly smells) like a million bucks after. I’ve recommended JHH to all of my friends.

name: Wendy Montealegre
text:
I LOVE Just Happy Hounds.  First, the facilty is spotless.  And their stellar staff truly love these animals.  It's genuine.
I do quite a bit a rescue, and sweet Sarah Mills, Katelyn and the rest of this amazing staff have boarded several rescues. Teaching these dogs basic manners training and socialization.  This work helps ensure they will have a successful adoption later!
Just Happy Hounds not only provides excellent care for your personal dog, they do extensive community outreach, and have saved countless dogs.  I can't say enough good about them!!!

name: james meredith
text: Very nice people. Stayed late to meet me so I could drop my dog off on a sunday!!!

name: Brittany Stephens
text:
My dog began daycare at JHH at approximately 6 months old and attended at least 2-3 times per week. I always thought she enjoyed it as she seemed excited to pull up and be dropped off. At around a year old, I started noticing a lot of staff turnover at the facility. Although I should have taken heed, I did not and my dog continued to attend day care regularly. I began noticing that my dog was very timid of the staff. In particular, she was called by one of the managers/trainers and immediately backed up, tail between her legs, and laid down in a submissive position behind me. This time I took note and my dog never returned to the facility. I still have pre-paid day care days that will go unused. When I inquired about my dog’s reaction, it was explained to me by staff that my dog was regularly kept separate in a kennel in the back during the day. AND, that her “training” involved being taken into the yard, on a leash, while other dogs were allowed to approach her and she was given commands to obey. THIS RUINED MY DOG. She has dog aggression issues to this day, largely due to her extreme anxiety which I believe was engrained into her at a developmental stage while at JHH. Please do not take your dog to this facility for daycare.

Also, please note that most of the favorable reviews were posted at least a year ago. While the more recent reviews question the dogs well-being at the facility.

name: Emma Tolbert
text: Terrible! I paid $74 per night for my 2 senior-age shelties to be boarded in the “Beach House” suite while I was out of town. When they were picked up they were soaking wet and filthy, as if they had been left outside in the rain. They were also hungry, and an excess of their food was left that should not have been if instructions were followed. Definitely would not recommend if you are looking for your pets to be well taken care of!

name: Christina Fortugno
text: Just Happy Hounds needs to be your first and last look at daycare for your best friend. I moved to Birmingham a few months ago and did not know a soul. I came for graduate school with my best friend (Oliver) and the center of my world. I shopped around for daycares like my peers do for their human children. I chose Just Happy Hounds because the staff was friendly and I loved how my dog was always playing. He does not spend hours alone in a kennel like he would at home. They have far exceeded my expectation for customer service and outright exceptional care for my puppy. Oliver had a scratched cornea from playing a little hard and required surgery. I was stressed about what to do. I thought I could not take him to daycare while he recovered for surgery. He required extensive medications and needed to watched more closely in the cone of shame. The JHH team took care of Oliver post-op just as well as I would have at home. I never have to worry about my best friend while I am at work/class all day. I know he is being loved and played with as he is at home. I could not be more thankful for such incredible care of Oliver during his time of extra need. As a nurse, I am always caring for everyone else. I have been incredibly thankful to have someone help me out and give me peace of mind. Never bring your baby somewhere else! Sarah and her team are incredible. JHH is the best home away from home you can bring you furry friend to.

name: Abigail Martin
text: I have been trying to contact them for the last ten days after my dog was groomed here. I have called and emailed to no avail and have heard nothing back. I have many concerns with how well he was supervised the hours he spent here.

name: Drew Griffith
text: I took Buddy for grooming Savannah the groomer did a excellent job in grooming Buddy. Buddy smells wonderful.  He was full of matts when I dropped him off and know he is not. Savannah has done the best job of any grooming place I have ever talking buddy to

name: Kayla Rivera
text: They are wonderful with my dog. I have needed to leave before on fairly short notice and they have always been accommodating. My dog comes back happy. I will always feel comfortable leaving my dog there.

name: Anna Waters
text: I take my dog here once a week,  and he loves it. He hasn't always gotten along with other dogs, but he is so much more sociable now after a few months of weekly daycare. The staff at JHH is so nice and helpful, and I trust their judgment. Their services are also really affordable. I can't recommend them highly enough.

name: Cj Paxton
text: I have a giant breed dog ( Cane Corse  @ 160 lbs. )  Sarah and her crew have been great with him. He loves going there to play and hang out. No other place want to work with him because of his size. Wish I lived closer to them we moved and he isn't able to go now but I will have vacation soon. And he will be there for 12 days.

name: Raphael Cohen
text: Pasta and ambiance are both good. Great lunch place

name: Matthew Spivak
text: My dogs HATE getting groomed, but JHH was incredible! I could tell they genuinely cared for my boys and went the extra mile to make them feel comfortable. My dogs were in a much better mood when I picked them up compared to other places.

name: Stephanie Agee
text: It was okay I had to keep calling for the groomer, after she was reached I took my puppy in for a bath in a couple of days he was oily

name: LaBrena Friend
text: I have found out that Sarah is no longer at JHH. I will not be returning my dogs to JHH. I always knew my dogs were in the best care when Sarah was there and no longer trust that my dogs will be in good care without Sarah being there

name: mylilgigi2018 Mills
text:
Mrs Cole
Sorry you feel like this about JHH, but I can’t  imagine Sarah ever yelling at anyone her companion for what she does is above all.
The  dedication  she puts into running to JHH  is fabulous I wouldn’t put my baby anywhere else.

name: Bethany Cryder
text: Gracie loves her day care days.  I love the staff.  They treat her so wonderfully. Cannot recommend them enough.

name: Taylor Stroud
text: We have been taking our dog here for over a year now. She absolutely loves it. She gets excited whenever we ask her if she is ready "to go to daycare". They love taking care of our pup and do a great job. definitely recommend, especially those working close by at UAB and Children's

name: Terry Pribyl
text: Great service my dog loved the people. Kept my Lumpy for a day in a pinch, and didn't even charge us for the first visit.

name: Bryan Reed
text: Attended the Birmingham Bowl on the way home to Texas on a road trip.  I needed a place to keep our dog during the football game.  The folks at Just Happy Hounds were great.  My dog was actually sad to leave her newly acquainted canine friends.  I would highly recommend Just Happy Hounds!

name: mark gotfryd
text: The dog returned happy but lost weight. From being active all day or under fed??. She was returned with multiple bumps... insect bites... Flea?.. Gave her bravecto. The people are very very nice and obvious dog lovers...

name: Julie King
text: Friendly staff. 1st class care for your furbaby. Easy to find. Groomer does a great job. It's easy to get an appointment and prices are comparable to other less fancy places. There's a great vibe at Just Happy Hounds and I will continue to take my little beloved furbaby there! She got a groom that was precious but not as short as I needed for her comfort due to hotspots and they didn't hesitate to fix it for free. Great place!

name: Julie King
text: They do a good job and love my nany

name: Caywood Yamnik
text: I took my dog here for a year and a half and still they did not know her name, and called her a boy almost every time. The staff has very high turnover, and there seems to be a big internal communication issue.

name: Mark Reeder
text: Great way to get the extra energy out of our puppy plus learn socialization skills. Great place for boarding as well.

name: Kelly King
text:
I would like to say I’ve been to several doggie daycares and Just Happy Hounds by far is the BEST!!!!
You can really tell they care about your baby! I have to tell you about my experience with them today. I dropped my baby off for the first time today for her boarding I
was greeted by Sarah and Josh with warm welcomes. The others staff wanted to know exactly want Annabella need during her stay food, bath how much when. I have to say JHH has it together and I can tell Sarah is there because she loves the babies. Now I can go on my trip with no worries! Thank you JHH staff for all you do.

name: Shay Hoffman
text:
Very friendly staff however the groom on my Pomeranian wasn't quite up to snuff. I took him in at the end of March 2017 for an all over trim down to 1/2" (tail included), specific attention to his ears, and a sanitary cut.
The overall cut was uneven around his face, legs, and tail - it looked chunky, spots were missed and others cut too short. The sanitary cut was what I asked for but I noticed a razor burn/cut on the inside of his leg after we got home. They did a great job on his ears which is usually a tough spot so it seems odd that the other stuff was so spotty.
This groomer just doesn't seem to have the skill for my dog's coat or their prices. We won't be going back.

name: Leah Moseley Papp
text: My dog loves coming here and the staff is great.

name: Yashna Patel
text: My dog received an injury, it was hard to contact anyone who knew about the situation and management did not cooperate or empathize. My dog suffered a large bruise and blood spot on her back left leg. I had to call several times and finally got ahold of management. They did not find out how the injury happened and I finally had to take my dog to the vet. Also, I requested nail trimming while my dog boarded and they forgot to do so. I scheduled a drop off for my dog for boarding and no one was in the office to receive her though I let them know ahead of time. I definitely do not reccommend this place.

name: Dona Bonnett
text:
"We are so pleased with Just Happy Hounds Midtown.  The dog groomer did a fabulous job on Trouble, our 11 year old rescue dog and we definitely recommend Just Happy Hounds Midtown in Birmingham for anyone needing dog grooming, boarding, dog daycare or training. This is a wonderful new dog facility and the staff is great - thanks so much for taking such good care of my baby!  Dona Bonnett-adr Business & Marketing Strategies

We have had both of our dogs groomed several times and have been very pleased each time.  The dog groomers do a great job.  They are courteous and love the pups.  Copper loves to play at doggie daycare with the other dogs while he is at Just Happy Hounds.  I would highly recommend Just Happy Hounds!

name: Rachel Popwell
text: I have taken my Cocker Spaniel here for over a year now & we love it!

name: Cory Truett
text: Dog grooming did not come out well. I recommend going elsewhere.

name: Crystal Trinidad
text: Dog grooming is fairly priced and reliable

name: Anne Marie Miller
text: My pup pepper is beyond hyper!!! We do everything to wear her out! Every time she visits happy hounds she comes home tuckered out and happy!!! Forever a fan!!!!

name: Sarah Mills
text: At Just Happy Hounds they love them Like they are there own.....

name: Kyle Pérez
text: Not only do the folks at JHH really care for your pup like you would but their trainer, LaDale, is absolutely fantastic.

name: sandy lawrence
text: Horrible mangagement  fed my one year old lab a half cup of food for four days.   STAY AWAY

text: Awful service. I would never go here.

name: Emily

name: Ashley Tate
text: The best doggy daycare EVER!!!!!!

name: Ravin Mooney
text: Love the staff at JHH!!!

name: Jeff Mills
text: Love, love, love JHH!

name: Deborah Moon
text: My dog loves this place. It's the only place, other than home, that he jumps out of the car ready to go! Staff is all great and loves you animal. My dog never comes home dirty or smelly, so where he sleeps is clean. When he gets home from a stay at the kennel, all he does is sleep because he has had so much fun.

resp.text: Thanks Deborah!!!!  We love you and Rambler!

text: The wonderful staff at Shoal Creek have been taking wonderful care of our pets when we are away since 2005.  They have been excellent and attentive!  Both people and pets are very grateful!!!

resp.text: Thanks, Patience!  We love and appreciate all of you.

name: Barron Latta
text: We recently left our Sydney with them for a few days and she loved it. This kennel deserves 10 stars. From now on we won't leave our pets anywhere but Shoal Creek. Great staff and very nice facility!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: I'm literally Unknown
text: We won't leave our Big Al anywhere but Shoal Creek!  They love & spoil him as much as we do!

resp.text: Thank you.  That's so sweet.  Big Al is hanging out with us in the office right now!!!!  We love our Big Al!!!!!

name: Ricky Phillips
text:
Paula and Robin are so sweet. This is the only place we trust to take our sweet bulldog wrangler when we go on vacations or a trip out of town.
They know him by name and have always remembered his meds, feeding times and how much he eats, allergies, and everything else we told them the first day we took him. We never remind them when we drop him off they just know.
They have given us updates on wrangler when we ask about him while we are gone on long distant trips. Which makes us feel so much better about leaving him. Also they understand that our bulldog is our baby and they treat him like a king.
Me and my wife will always use Shoal Creek Kennels.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ricky for the stars

name: Kaylee Schmidt
text: They are great. Greg loved his weekend away while I got one myself.  I was worried about leaving him, but they were awesome with him and he liked them before i was even out the door.

resp.text: Glad to hear. And we look forward to next time! Thank you for the 5 stars!

name: Scott Michael
text: My dog is always happy to go there

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Amy Hyatt
text: Excellent place to board! They took care of our 2 small dogs for 10 days like they were their own. I highly recommend Shoal Creek Kennels!

resp.text: Thank you Amy!!

name: Bama Salto
text: The best of the best, my dog loves staying there. The owners are more careful about my dog than I am!

resp.text: Thank you soo much. We love our pets!

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Jacob Maples

resp.text: haha We love it! Thank you for the kind words!

resp.text: Thank you for the stars

name: Patrick Holmes

resp.text: Thank you Patrick for the 5 stars!

name: Gwen Wilson (Rescue Hearts of Alabama)
