resp.text: Thank you sooo much Gwen!!

name: Matthew Dennis
text: Took great care of our puppy

resp.text: Thank you !!

name: dominique boyd
text: I had the best experience with Classy Pup. She was very professional, and did an awesome job grooming My puppy Gizzee'. She also has wonderful fragrances for puppies. I was very pleased, and I will definitely return for services in the future.

name: M Lowery
text: My dogs love Lisa and her assistants! Icee and Coco are always so clean and sweet smelling after a bath! Lisa does such a great job on the grooms- absolutely adorable!!

name: Rachel Seaborn
text: Lisa is wonderful! She loves what she does and always does a great job with grooming our two dogs. We have a toy Poodle and toy Australian Shepherd. She’s reliable, friendly, responsive, always accommodating making appointments and always takes care of our two dogs. We’d definitely recommend her!

name: Sandy Bain Moon
text:
I use Classy Pup in Hoover for my schnoodle Macee.  Lisa gets it done right! Never have to worry about a bad cut,  I highly recommend her services.
Sandy Moon

name: Leslie Shadwick
text: I’ve taken my Shih Tzu several places in town and I knew the minute I dropped my puppy off we would continue to use Classy Pup. I know she takes care of my puppy and does a great job grooming him. I will not take my puppy anywhere else. Classy Pup will forever be my groomer.

name: Sara W
text: Today we took our dog to Lisa at Classy Pup for the first time. Previously he has had some grooming anxiety, but Charlie ran right up to Lisa with no issues. He was also napping and very happy when I picked him up. It means a lot to us that he feels comfortable there. Lisa was extremely nice and I was very happy with his haircut. He had not been groomed for some time and I knew it was going to be a big job. You can tell that Lisa and her staff love the dogs they work with. Furthermore, this business is taking every necessary precaution to protect themselves and their clients from covid-19. Their space is very clean and decorated so nicely. We will definitely be coming back on a regular basis!

name: Lindsey Dobbs
text: The young lady is a talented groomer and the owner and staff were super nice and polite! The best grooming I've seen and had done for my dog in a long, long,  time! I definitely Recommend there service to anyone!!!ask for Lindsey if you want the best groomer in Birmingham!

name: Julie Orr
text: I called ahead to ask if they could just trim my dogs nails bc I have a large breed, short haired dog that I can bathe easily. They said no problem, when we got there they talked my husband into getting the dog a bath also. Our dog wasn’t ready to be picked up for 4.5 hrs and they didn’t even trim his nails! So, I have spent far more than originally intended and I will need to spend more money to have his nails done somewhere else. Will not be returning.

resp.text: We did not  talk your husband into a bath for your Rhodesian ridgeback! .When asked if the dog was here for a bath AND nails service your husband went outside to ask someone and came back in a few minutes later and said yes. We had bear scheduled for nails only and graciously found time to bathe him for you. Typically nails  are an in and out service for us. That is why he was here for several hours. Bears nails did NOT need to be done.... you were only charged $50 for a bath on an extra large dog.. You could have given us a call and we would have gladly waived the bath fee before leaving an untruthful post but not now. By the way he tipped us $10.00

name: Michael Chelewski
text: I called several places this morning to see if I could get my Great Pyrenees bathed, groomed, and hair cut with no availability.  I contacted Classy Pup and they told me to bring her right in.  The process took less than 3 hours, which is amazing for this breed of dog.  The cost was right in line with everywhere else I've brought her to.  Very friendly staff and they made my Great Pyrenees look wonderful!!!  Thank you!!! I strongly recommend Classy Pup!!!

name: Madie Taylor
text: If I could give Classy Pup zero stars, I would. I called and they said if I dropped my tiny dog off between 8am-10am they would fit her in. To my surprise when we arrived at 9:15am, they said she would be ready around 4Pm. This should have been the first red flag for me. At 4pm we drove to go pick her up. When we arrived, they said she would not be done until 5:30pm. My poor tiny pup had been put in a cage for over 8 hours! I can only pray they gave her water because when she got home she drank almost a whole bowl. She was one of the first dogs to arrive, but yet was the last dog they groomed. When I made the appointment they told me it would be $49. That sounded reasonable and fair. When we picked her up after asking for a teddy bear cut, her haircut looked awful. There are random clumps of hair that are twice as long as the other pieces. She still has hair in her eyes from the side where they gave her bangs? When a teddy bear cut does not have bangs on the sides. When she was picked up. It ended up being $60. Much more than they quoted me. If I were you, I would never ever bring your pet to this shop.

resp.text: Hi Ms Taylor!  We are trying our best to fit everyone in because of the covid19 virus.  That being said we have a lot of new customers we are trying to help , along with servicing our regular ones. If you would contact us we will do whatever it takes to fix your concerns. It would have been more courteous to contact us about your concerns before posting something like this.... because I cannot find your name anywhere on our schedule within the last 2 weeks to call you. We also warn EVERYONE right now that their pet might be here almost all day . We do the dogs in order of arrival and our drop off time is between 8 and 10 am. it is not unusual if your dog was dropped off at 915 it was one of the last dropped of, and one of the last to finish up with.  Also.. we have no grooming packages priced at $49.00. Our bath and tidy's are $48 for our small dogs, and $58 for a full groom. we charge a $2 convenience fee for payments made with a credit card. Debit cards no convenience fee. Also keep in mind that it sometimes takes a time or 2 to get your puppy styled exactly as you because we don't know them , especially if you are new! We have been in business 37 years and if we were poor groomers that wouldn't be the case. Our longevity speaks for itself!

name: Survivor Girl
text: I have been taking Maxx to Classy Pup for least 6 years. Lisa is always professional and she does a wonderful job grooming Maxx. I have no worries when I drop off because I know when I pick him back up, he will well groomed and smells 10 times better. If you are looking for a professional dog groomer then Classy Pup is your place. I know it is mine!

name: Terry Hall
text: Lisa has been so patient with me. I had to cancel on her after her going to work my fur baby. I called her back and she set my baby up for today. I am so excited, I can’t take my eyes off of him he is so cute. My mother took care of my dog for many years and she would be crazy about his new look. Thanks Lisa for making him so beautiful today! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

name: Sheri Arnold
text: First class service!  I have a (big) standard poodle and they did an amazing job with my 9 month old boy.  He is still new to grooming and they were very patient and caring with him.

name: Kathy Petro
text: Just started taking my dog here - and I love it!!! I have an older dog, and they were so sweet to him. Very impressed with the service and friendly staff.

name: matt harel
text:
I made a first attempt at an appointment for my two small poodle mixes on Friday 4/10 to be groomed on Saturday 4/11. Seemed easy enough. They asked me to have the dogs at the shop between 8-10a.

My mother fell ill Friday night, and I immediately took her to the urgent care Saturday morning, which was the morning I was scheduled to bring the dogs in. With the current health pandemic plaguing our country, and specifically Jefferson county, I immediately focused on getting my mother the healthcare needed. Unfortunately, I failed to inform Classy Pup, and missed my appointments.

I called this morning, Monday April 13th, and I apologized and tried to explain the predicament I was placed in on Saturday. Whomever I spoke with was extremely rude, and would not let me finish speaking without overpowering and overwhelming the conversation. She at some point mentioned I’m required to pre pay for both dogs (mind you I’ve never used their service and don’t know how I feel about prepaying), as well as for the appointments I missed? Because I didn’t give them a 24 hour notice? My mother fell ill the evening before the appointments were scheduled, it would be impossible to give a 24 hours notice for this.

It was all very bizarre, and confusing. I’ve used the same groomer for five years, and she recently went out of business and moved states; I’m certain I can find another groomer to take care of my dogs’ needs, but it’s shameful Classy Pup is so tone deaf and belligerent. Terrible customer service. The lady I spoke to even hung up on me. Again, with COVID-19 shuttering businesses left and right, you would think Classy Pup would be happy with two new clients, but unfortunately that doesn’t seem to be the case.

resp.text:
Hi Matthew, well wishes to your mother. You spoke with me the owner.  As I remember our conversation it was several days after your appointment you called to make another one.  No mention of your mothers illness and a very lighthearted  attitude about your missed appointment.  That is a huge deal to a small business, being that we had a hole of 2.5 blocked off hours in our schedule due to your dogs not coming in. Businesses cannot operate that way! And it was an appointment blocked off for 2 dogs... not one.   Our business model requires a prepayment deposit to be make after 2 missed appointments, that will be credited to the following appointment. Two dogs no showing is 2 appointments missed and lost revenue for us. We are not always able to fill those appointments last minute, as was the case. This is only our way of insuring that we will not have an empty slot in the future, not a  harsh personal attack as you infer.
Regards, Lisa

name: Jessica Stodden
text: We just rescued a Pomeranian and needed a place to get her groomed. Lisa and her helper were so friendly and did a great job! We will definitely be back! Thank you!!

name: Mara Okshteyn
text: Lisa is great! My dog loves her!

name: Alyssa Branton
text: I had a great experience at Classy Pup! Lisa was so helpful and personable. She kept my little dog safe and cozy while I was stuck at work. I also love the cut she gave my Yorkie!

name: Tammy Holston
text: I love Classy Pup!  I've taken my dogs there for years.  Lisa, the owner, always does her best to accommodate my schedule- even when I schedule an appointment last minute.  Good cuts at a good price too! ❤️

name: Grace Arello
text: They did such an amazing job on my dog and were so friendly and prompt !!! I have been bringing her back ever since I loved them so much I brought my moms dog too!!

name: Diane Burns
text: Lisa, the owner, is very friendly, professional and loves my dog! she is an excellent groomer and knowledgeable on dogs' health as well! Thanks for taking care of my dogs all these years! she has seen me through 3 dogs!

name: Matthew Martin
text:
We rarely leave a review on google, but decided I would since we never received a call back from the owner. My family and I moved to the Hoover area earlier this month and decided to try this groomer out. The owner was very friendly and the staff was great at arrival. Once the doggy cut was complete we went home and didn’t think anything about looking for imperfections with the groomer’s work. Once we got home we noticed that he had been severely cut around his face and has been bleeding for a week since the cut. His haircut  was also patchy and not cut to the standard we are accustomed to. The following week my wife tried multiple times to get I touch with the owner and was unable to get her on the phone or by visiting the salon. We spoke to her sister and left a message, and to no avail have we heard back. The haircut was around 65$ after tax and the matting fee. I as very disappointed in the lack of follow up and quality of work done. My dog still has scars on his face from the haircut. Please use this groomer with caution.

I wish we could upload pictures but google will not allow. We tried to handle this in-house for the past week and a half, but have heard nothing back from the groomers.

resp.text:
We rarely get bad reviews, but we do not look at it negatively.  On the contrary, we look at them as a chance to improve and enhance our business practices and take your suggestions.  This one has us very perplexed.Accidents do happen, but we would never send a dog home knowingly injured without notice and explanation.
I have checked out client sheets and have not found a Matthew M. signed in or  a charge for $65.  We are not in the office when we do not have clients scheduled, nor do I have a sister who works here. I have a small smooth coated dog and I know every  bump, swirl or wrinkle on that dogs body, and would immediately know if there was a cut or any abnormality on him . Once a dog leaves our care however, we have no control over what happens to him... but after a week????  We also have a waiver  clearly stating out policies on our client sheet that must be signed before drop off. We carry insurance and also have cameras installed. It is distressing that something happened to your dogs face. but if we didn't see. it we couldn't point it out to you!

name: Sharon Daniels
text: Lisa at Classy Pup has always taken such good care of our dog, Coconut.  We never think of going anywhere else.  We highly recommend her!

name: Kendyl Webb
text: First impressions mean a lot, and my first impression was horrible. The business is located in the downstairs of a building which you access from behind the building. There is no sign indicating this at the front of the building. When I arrived I parked up front and opened the front door to find an abandoned filthy building. I quickly closed the door and ran back to my car. I almost left then, but decided to drive around behind the building. That is when I saw the downstairs door. The upstairs door should be locked with a sign instructing you to go around back. When you get inside everything looks dated, but that's not the problem. I dropped my dog off at 1030. I was told that she would be done around 2 possibly 3 but that I would receive a call 30 minutes before she was ready. I was also told that she would be taken out of the kennel to walk and for a potty break (although there's no grass for this that I saw). At 1:30 I called to check and was told that it would definitely be 3 but that she would call 30 minutes before she was done and she sounded aggravated that I called. At 230 my husband and I decided to leave to pick up some lunch before picking the dog up, and at 309 I still hadn't heard from her. At that point my dog had been there almost 5 hours so I just headed straight there. I got there and she was still working on my dog but only for about 5-10 more minutes after I got there even though I hadn't received a call that she was 30 minutes from being done. Almost as soon as my dog was on the floor she peed which leads me to believe she was never walked or taken out to potty. She was shaved WAY shorter than I asked for her to be. I asked for a simple trim and instead she was shaved with a #5 blade. The lady argued with me and told me that I told her to cut her short, which I did not do. I was also told that it would be 50$ and I was charged 55$. We will not be back here.

resp.text: Hi Kendra!  Gee.. if you had a problem I wish you would have taken it up with me before you proceeded to write many inconsistencies!  First.... the upstairs building does not belong to me..... and Lorna Music just moved out with in a weeks time... and is in the process of cleaning it up! Our sign clearly shows the entrance to our business is the bottom level!   Secondly.... we were nice enough to take your Maltese withOUT an appointment and work it in around our other regular customers.  Our regular price for our small dogs is $55.00 and I usually charge a bit more for people without appointments .. so thats what we get for being nice to first time customers! Thirdly.... your dog was the LAST to come in... so it was the LAST to go out. It wouldn't have been fair to the other owners now.... would it?  Lastly... your dog was not in good shape so it had to be taken down short as I explained when you picked her up. Your dog also pee pee'd and poo poo'd in her cage as soon as you  dropped  her off so yes... she was walked thoroughly after that..... and Yes.... we have a very large dog run right next to the shop which you again did not observe... and plenty of grass out back!  I'm sure you can find another groomer that is better suited for you.             Lisa

name: Mallie B
text: I have a very nervous and scared little 7 month Yorkie because of her past groomer. Bella Rose is a very difficult baby to deal with. Instead of saying she would not groom her again, Lisa is working with me and giving me recommendation to talk to her doctor about. That is amazing and shows she  really loves what she does. Do not pay attention to any bad reviews. I'm hear to tell you that Lisa was in constant contact with me all day and even tho my baby was a terrior, she looked amazing. We will not use anyone else.

name: Sandra Slate
text: I have been using Classy Pup for over a year with my Shihtzu/Bichon. They do a great job and always call as soon as he is ready. He is not scared to go in which says a lot to me after some experiences at other places that he did not want to stay.

name: Jessika Ashlee (Hip and Simple)
text: New to the area and first tried a chain pet store for grooming and they were terrible. On this next grooming I tried Classy Pup today and it was great. They shaved our Pomchi, she looked great and they listened to our requests to have a short tail trim and to leave her face whiskers which was very appreciated but most groomers forget when we specify that request. We did a bath and nail trim for our other dog. He looked and smelled great. They were friendly and really seemed to care and like interacting with the dogs. Pricing was very comparable to other places I have looked into. We will use them again.

name: Megan Schrimsher
text: I drive from Trussville to Hoover just to take my fur babies to Classy Pup. The owner is so attentive to my scheduling needs and loves my fur babies as if they were her own. I definitely recommend you making this your go-to groomer!

name: Katrina Knight
text: Friendly staff my baby was gorgeous!!!!

name: laurie lawson
text: Highly recommend.My dogs coat was a mess when I brought him in and he looks AMAZING now!! Sweet ladies and you can tell they love what they do.

name: Tricia Holl
text: The best dog groomer in Hoover!

name: Georganne Canterbury
text: The folks at Dog U have done a great job with my Welsh Corgi puppy. She boarded and trained for a week with Calvin, who did a wonderful job training her to walk on a loose leash. Before her training, she was constantly pulling me and since her training, she behaves and is a joy to walk now. Their facilities are wonderful and my dog loves to go to daycare there. I especially like the different training and daycare packages they offer. It makes this investment much more affordable. I highly recommend Dog U for any training and/or daycare needs you might have. In my opinion, they are the best in town!

resp.text: Hi, Georganne. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Madison Williamson
text: We have taken our dog to Dog U for over 2 years. We initially did their one week training bootcamp and have continued with weekly daycare. The staff is so kind, attentive, and willing to answer any questions! Our dog is always happy to jump in the car and go when we ask if she wants to go to daycare. Andrea, Calvin, and Nick helped train her, and they were incredible. Gabe, Abby and the other staff members are some of the kindest! Our dog loves the Dog U team and so do we!

resp.text: Hi, Madison. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Bobbi Gould
text: We have taken our Akita to Dog U two different times now and our boy seems to have a good time while he is there. He comes home tired and usually a little damp. The crew there has shared with me that our dog really enjoys the kiddie pools during the recent warm weather. I love that they are so closely located  to our dogs vet. So I feel confident leaving my baby in  their care.

resp.text: Hi, Bobbi. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Sarah Whaley
text:
We Love Dog U! We adopted our dog when he was 2 years old. We brought him in right away! We started with educational daycare which was a great way for him to socialize and learn basic commands. Now, he goes to daycare to socialize and stay active.

Everyone is very professional at Dog U, which is why we keep coming back! They know Cash by name and love him like he is their own! Dog U feels like family now and we recommend them to everyone.

resp.text: Hi, Sarah. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Ryan Ramage
text: Absolutely love this place!! Dog U changed our lab puppy in the week long training from driving my kids nuts to almost perfectly behaved!  I can loose leash walk her with ease and she loves going back to school to play with some friends!  I would highly recommend Dog U

resp.text: Hi, Ryan. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Maria Vargas Morcilio
text:
I have a 5 month Yorkie  and Andrea has done an outstanding job with her. I have noticed her behavior at home has changed drastically, she is much better following commands.
I am so pleased with her progress that I have Enrolled Chanel for two more weeks.
The staff is very kind and always with a positive attitude,  it makes me feel good knowing that Chanel is well taking care of.

resp.text: Hi, Maria Vargas. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Amy Bradham
text: Please check out Dog U! My two puppies have experienced both the educational and regular daycare options; they come home tired and happy and I like the socialization they get with both humans and other dogs. The staff clearly enjoy working with dogs of all ages and sizes and it’s fun to watch the dogs waiting for their turns to be relayed inside. I recommend Dog U every opportunity I get.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Dog U Birmingham

name: GandE2016 Thomas
text:
My family and I had bought a puppy from a breeder.  All we wanted in a dog is great behavior.  When we got our puppy, he was jumpy, mouthy, and generally a rambunctious puppy.
We sent Charlie to DogU for the 1 week undergrad training which conveniently coincided with a family vacation.  After 1 week, we got a totally different puppy — one that walks right beside us, hasn’t been mouthy and has generally great.  We haven’t even had the four follow-ups!

Thank u, DogU!

name: Heather Hinton
text: I LOVE Dog U Birmingham and so does my pup! The staff is just so friendly, helpful and accommodating - and they adore my dog (which makes my heart happy). For a few years I lived farther away and the trip to Dog U was a lot longer (with other daycares closer by) - but I chose to make the long trip every day and I would make that choice again. They are so good to me and my dog - I wouldn’t take him anywhere else!

resp.text: Hi, Heather. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Jennifer Hood

It’s so nice to have a place we can bring her for play, boarding, training, vet care and grooming where she has no anxiety getting out of the car. Everyone we interact with is friendly and helpful. Love DogU!

resp.text: Hi, Jennifer. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

We did the Education package to train, (for about 4 months) and do the Play package on going. He loves all of the staff, and is so excited when we get near the facility.

resp.text: Hi, Ellison. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about Dog U.... let's put it this way:  they're the opposite of everything you don't like about your current doggie socialization center. Yes!  A live, cheerful human answers the phone when you call!  I'm so blessed to have found out about Dog U.  🥳🥳🥳

name: Tamera Lea
text: We have been students at Dog U for 8 months and just signed up for another six months of continuing education.  We enjoy all the people there and my dog looses it when she realizes where we are.

resp.text: Hi, Tamera. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Amanda Rafferty
text:
We picked up our 4 month old German Shepherd puppy Wednesday afternoon only to notice that something was off about his eyes. As soon as the staff member brought him out, I could see how red and swollen his eye was. I asked if something happened and they stated no. They repeatedly acted like they could not see anything wrong with his eye until I kept insisting that it was not right (very bright red, bloodshot, swollen and bulging). He has bursted blood vessels in both of his eyes.

I still do not understand how this could happen to a dog that was in EDUCATIONAL daycare. If he is on a slip leash, he should have someone who is a trainer with him; someone who could (and should) have corrected any behavior that could have caused this to happen.

resp.text: Hi, Amanda. At Dog U Birmingham, we aim to provide positive experiences at all times. Is there anything we could do to make it better? Please call us at (205) 967-3648!

name: Maya Pace
text:
I love bringing my fur baby, Sophie, to Dog U. She has so much fun playing with the other dogs. I also get to see pictures of her on Facebook playing with other dogs, which is a big plus for me.
I told the owners that Dog U is like a Disney World for dogs 😊. I also like that I can request doggy ice cream for my fur baby during her visits.
The staff at Dog U are very courteous, friendly, and professional. I feel at ease leaving my Sophie in Dog U care. I would definitely recommend Dog U to anyone looking for a great place to bring their fur babies. I absolutely ❤️ Dog U!!!!

resp.text: Hi, Maya. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

Dog U Birmingham

This place is awesome. Link likes it and the associates are experts.

name: Sharon Stuart
text: After a week at Dog U, our 17 week old puppy was responsive to basic commands and walked well on a leash. Very professional staff.

name: Shannon Powell
text:
I foster dogs. My current foster has very sensitive skin and was in need of help.  I have to give it to them. They let me drop her off and Dr. Williams call me to see what she needed. After exam I was called and given a plan of action. Then dog u gave Daisy a spa day. Nails and bath. She is much better.
I should mention they have also done dog training for another one of my fosters. Highly recommend them. You can also see photos of them on Facebook is you like that. Fun pics.

name: morgan tucker
text: I talk to a trainer about my dog being reactive and this lady who obviously isnt a good trainer told me that cause my dog wasn’t a puppy that she was hopeless and that there isn’t anything that can be done for me her. So i left and called creative dog training which is across the street and they said she mind can be retrained it would just take awhile but it is doable .

name: Kelli Brasher
text: Absolutely love these people.  They are polite and professional but show a genuine love and concern for the dogs.  My dogs have attended training and daycare since they came home with me.  I have and will recommend Dog U (Birmingham) to anyone looking for a good training, boarding and/or daycare facility.  Another plus is they are located next to the Vet...so you can know there is a medical professional in the event there is a problem!

name: Andy Bernstein
text: Everyone was so kind to our new puppy Willow!!

resp.text: Hi, Andy. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Meredith Parker
text: I trust Dog U completely with the care of my two dogs, Lady (2 years old) and Maggie (12 years old). Lady was a 6-month old puppy when she was first introduced to Calvin and Andrea. Lady has attended intensive day care and group classes, and I do not have the words to express the positive changes in Lady’s behavior through working with Calvin and Andrea. Through group classes, I have seen first-hand Calvin’s knowledge, patience, and passion for dogs and their well-being. In addition, Lady and Maggie attend regular day care and always come home happy and tired from a full day of play! I also have the peace of mind that their amazing vets are on-site, and I have the convenience to add-on grooming/baths/vet services all in one place. There is no better place for my dogs than Dog U!

name: Jamison McClurg
text: Nice new fences. Real good job at keeping dogs separated

name: Brandi
text: Super friendly and professional staff. They helped train my German Shepherd and socialize him which helped tremendously with his anxiety

name: pedro martinez
text: We are really pleased with this place

name: McCall Rizzo
text: Love this place! Great trainers and staff. Super professional and great with our dogs!

name: Cynthia Howard
text: Our dogs seem very happy there!  We do not have to worry about their comfort or welfare if we have to go out of town.  It’s a wonderful place for them!

name: Renee Vest
text: These people are  so caring  and loving glad they are here to have our puppies 🐶 to have something to  look forward  to

name: jeremy barron
text: Great place to leave your fur-baby when you can't take them with you! Our dog had an absolutely wonderful time playing with the other dogs and they post pictures to Facebook so you can see them while you are gone. Good prices, great service and will use them again!

name: Debbie Thornsberry
text: One happy dog!

name: Laurie Kite Barron
text: Excellent care for my fur baby. Thank you Hsppy Tails crew.

name: Freddie Clark
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. Reasonable price for overnight stay. Dogs have room to run.

name: Kim Davenport
text: My dog gets sooo excited when I bring him here! We love it!

name: Pink Flower
text: Wow, great service and my dog was serviced in a timely manner

name: Mike Turner
text: Great place, my Mollie loves it there. The owner and her staff cares about the animals that are left I'm their care.

name: Daniel Beuoy
text: Great staff, dogs love it.

name: Vicki Cooper
text: Good food

name: Kricett P
text: Love Julie!!

name: Brantley Wilson
text: I am new to the Daphne area and chose the Dog Ranch based on proximity to my house as well as the wonderful customer reviews. My dog was groomed at the Dog Ranch, and they did a wonderful job! However, my dog was diagnosed with Kennel Cough one week after getting groomed. This is the first time this has happened to my dog, but it makes me hesitant to return.

name: Connie Cummings
text: My Basset Hound has been going here for 4 months and we absolutely love it, the staff are friendly, and professional, we use grooming for his nails very often and find they do a great job. I love getting feedbacks about how his day has been and whom he played with, when we pick him up, he is sometimes muddy and dirty, this just shows me that he had a great time playing. My pup loves coming here to play, no complaints on our end.

name: Stacey Kulp
text: Absolutely astonishing establishment! My dog gets excited just going to the car these days assuming this is where she's going & she can even tell when we don't make the turn. We would never take Millie elsewhere. Dog Ranch Resort is unbelievable in every aspect.

name: Brandy Morrison
text: I love that the dogs don't pace in a small area. My dog is always exhausted when we go home.

name: jesse olive
text: My dog loves this place! He gets to play a lot and comes home tired but happy.

name: Kassidy Ferrie
text: I had never taken my dog, Bardi, to daycare before and was super nervous about it. Bardi takes some time to warm up to other people but after 2 days of daycare at the Dog Ranch I could tell she LOVED it. All of the staff are friendly and professional and you can tell they love dogs! We also took Bardi to the puppy training class at Dog Ranch Too with Ben (the owner) and he was so helpful. If you’re looking for daycare/boarding for you dog this place is the best!!

name: James Kretz
text: Never been , but I hear that this place is great 👍

name: Ray Hudson
text:
Delilah loves Dog Ranch Resort. Especially Doggy Daycare, the entire staff is exceptional, no matter if she is being groomed, boarded or being trained.  There is a great Comfort to know they  really care about my baby girl.
I really appreciate that.

name: Tera McGill
text: Absolutely horrible business!  I had my dogs booked to be boarded while we went on vacation.  They had already been to the facility a couple weeks beforehand to be tested and spent a whole day there and passed the test.  I brought them on the morning we were leaving and before I finished filling out paperwork they brought my dogs back to me and told me they could not keep them because one was being aggressive.  This was 4 hours before our flight was scheduled to leave.  I asked what was the purpose of the test, why didnt they figure this out then?  It was absolutely ridiculous. I had to make last minute arrangements and it almost ruined our vacation.

resp.text: We are sorry for any inconvenience we may have caused you. Dog Ranch Resort is a dog social environment where all dogs are interacting with one another in some capacity. We do a Temperament Test and Trial Day to give your dogs an opportunity to acclimate into our daycare environment. Most of the time we are able to catch if your dog is a good fit or not. It is not uncommon for a dog to get worse during future visits. They did significantly worse when they came to board. When introduced to the group they were snapping and growling at the other dogs. For the safety of your dogs and all of the other dogs we made the decision to remove them from the group. If your dogs are reacting in a way that jeopardizes the safety of everyone else, it is our policy that they be removed from group and sent home. Safety comes first at Dog Ranch Resort.

name: Kathleen Taupeka
text: WOW! Our furry babies LOVED the Dog Ranch. You are greeted with red carpet service as soon as you pass through the gate. The staff is so friendly and are truly happy to see you and your pups! It's clean and organized and oh so spacious!! You get some amazing photos of all the dogs having the time of their lives!!! We know our babies are in good, loving hands here!!! Give your Dogs a TREAT!!!

name: Josh Bradford
text: My dog has gone here for over 4 yrs.  His care & training is exemplary due to the excellent trainers & Ben Schulman.  I trust Ben implicitly.  Ranch hands are friendly, & professional.  My fur babies love this place & are exhausted when they get home.

name: Crystal Anderson
text: This place is the best place ever to take your pet.  No hassle.  Dog actually wants to go inside! For the first time ever!

name: Haley
text: My dog loves this place!! He always comes home exhausted and I love the Facebook photos they post, so I can see my pup while he's there.

name: Gary Knutson
text: Wonderful doggie daycare, boarding, grooming and training.  Our dogs love this place and the staff.  Maggie and Sadie cannot wait to go there.  We are happy to find a place where we can leave our dogs worry free.  We have boarded them 5 times now for up to a week each time.  Grooming charges are very reasonable for our 2 chocolate labs. 2 thumbs up and five stars to Ben and his staff.

name: Keith Hobbs
text: Top notch place. Very professional and caring. Highly recommend this business.

name: Jessie Quarterman
text: The Best place for your four legged family members to stay or to get a lovely pampering!

name: Megan McKinzie
text: I had previously used Dog Ranch for boarding many times and loved them, but because it had been a year since I last used their services they refused to let me bring my dogs in for day care or to let me board them over the thanksgiving holiday even though spaces were available because and I quote "I am not a valued customer" and services are only available  to their "valued customers".  Their customer service has clearly gone down hill and I am sad to report due to how I was treated by staff I will NEVER use their services again. I cannot support a business that does not value all their customers, not just their regular ones. Disgraceful.

name: Kacey Cook
text: Weve been customers of The Dog Ranch for over 3 years up until today.  Ever since the new administration at the front desk took over, the service has been awful.  I made an appointment for grooming over a week ago, which at that time, I was confirmed  to bring my dog in.  I’ve ALWAYS been hesitant to use their groomer- they really aren’t known for their grooming services but wanted to try them.  They called last night at 6 pm to confirm the appointment and asked me to make sure vet records were faxed over. I questioned why they hadn’t called the vet for them. It’s after hours!  I NEVER had to do that as the staff always did this for us. No biggie, right?   I called the vet this morning, they informed me the Dog Ranch had already called and they received the documents yesterday.  So I called the Dog Ranch as I was walking out of my house to verify they received them.  Apparently they KNEW my dog wasn’t eligible for grooming YESTERDAY but never told me last night when they confirmed his appointment.  When I questioned them on this I was totally blown off and directed to Email the owner with my concerns. Ok, I get it!  I’m 4 days past due on a vaccination. But they knew this yesterday morning!  No call to let me know. Nothing!  Ever since Carly left, the Dog Ranch service has been horrible. I will NEVER be back with our dogs. Common courtesy was avoided. This relationship is over.

resp.text: Mrs. Cook, We are sorry to hear you are so disappointed about your experience. However, it is our policy that all dogs be up to date with our required vaccinations. As we stated over the phone several times, Bentley did not have his vaccines current. Please understand this is a necessary safety precaution we take with all clients due to the high volume of dogs we see every day. When you sign our release form you state that your dog is up to date with their vet records upon arrival at our facility. We are not a veterinarian and can not administer vaccines. It is your responsibility to ensure that your dog is current on all vaccines upon arrival. Please understand that pet safety is our number 1 concern. There are many other grooming options in our area to try. We wish you the best of luck.

name: Lauren Lavender
text: They do a fantastic job with taking care of our furry friends! Our dog gets so excited everytime we arrive and is always so sad to leave!

name: dave rotach
text: After a lengthy move we needed to find someone that we could trust with our fur babies,  the Dog Ranch has fit the bill for us. We have boarded two dogs for a week at a time, a couple times. My  fur kids come home like I used to come home from summer camp. They want to sleep for a week. They are super excited every time we come back to the Dog Ranch for either grooming or another stay.

name: Brenden Tarver
text: Trustworthy an awesome staff. To watch over our fur babies.

name: nicawi46
text:
I have to definitely agree with the reviewer  regarding Dog Ranch’s poorly delivered temperament test. At least, because I saw that review, I was not so shocked when they brought her out within less than two minutes and said “she failed.” The test, as the ranch dude explained, involved taking her into a room, on a leash, where there was already a dog; so she did what I could’ve told you she would do—she barked & cried at the dog.  You definitely have to know what you’re doing if you’re going to introduce dogs on a leash. These guys certainly don’t. When I got there, he just called over the loud speaker “Bring Jackson [their test dog] into room [blah, blah, blah];” then he took my dog on a leash all the sudden and in approximately two minutes he came back out saying that my dog just “snapped at the other dog the whole time.”

My dog definitely barks and cries when on a leash when she sees other dogs—she wants to do what’s natural to her (sniff the other dog’s butt and go play). However, she does well, on or off the leash, meeting other dogs if properly introduced.  I’ve boarded my dog before in several places; she’s had dog sitters and even walkers that come to pick her up with other dogs;  I’ve have always been told how sweet she is with other dogs—those other places probably know more about dog behavior than these guys.  I take my dog to different dog parks regularly and I see myself that she does well with other dogs in her own terms or with me guiding her if needed.

I didn’t really care in the end whether they accepted or not.  It’s their loss in the end. They turned away a perfectly sweet dog and loss hundreds of dollars plus future business. I was looking to board for 11 days while I’ll be in Europe and then again later this summer for a shorter trip.  It’s their loss, not mine.  And if they have no record of my being there—well I did take my intake sheet after they failed my dog so why would you have my info? I called to verify my appointment the day before, though,  so I would certainly hope that they have some record that my dog was there and was “failed,” lol!!

resp.text:
The Dog Ranch Resort is a dog social environment, our temperament test dog has met over 3000 dogs of various sizes, and breeds. Our process is proven to work and is comparable to doggy daycares around the country. The reason we use a leash is to simply get your dog back into the temperament test room. Once your dog gets back there they are simply free to sniff one another.

However, your dog did not want to interact and showed extreme signs of separation anxiety. When Jackson attempted to approach she snapped at him. Due to the fact that she was anxious and reacted in an aggressive manner shows that this environment would be too stressful for her. If she can not handle meeting one dog then it is not fair to subject her to a pack of dogs and jeopardize the safety of our other clients. Safety is our number one priority, there are many other wonderful options in Baldwin county for your pet. We are happy to address your concerns over the phone at any time. You may reach us at 251-929-4899.

name: Matt Mullis
text:
Have taken my husky once recently for grooming services. Staff was very friendly and eager to help. The groomer sat on the floor with my nervous dog until she was comfortable enough to go back. The quality of the work was excellent. The building appears to be TOO plush, IMO. I get what their intentions are but it seemed like over kill (aesthetically). Pricing was slightly higher than what we used to pay by the quality was above expectations. Will absolutely be back.

Would suggest that location possibly partner with local vet to offer same day services like check ups, shots and minor treatments. Anything more involved could be handled elsewhere.

name: Christina Ricks
text: After losing a dog due to a mistake at a kennel, we are super picky about leaving our Vizsla, Honey. However, I feel completely confident in the staff at Dog Ranch Resort! The facilities are clean and well thought-out. She loves it there more than she does at our house, thanks to all the play & fun they have at day care. Keep up the good work, Dog Ranch Resort!

name: Anita Taylor
text: Our dog likes visiting Dog Ranch Resort so much that he never wants to leave. He pulls us in wagging his tail and is never terribly happy to leave. He would live there if he could.

name: Jennie Chafin
text: I have been taking my dog here for a little less than a year now and I couldn't be more pleased. The staff is absolutely amazing and kind (both to me and my fur baby!) and they take amazing care of my dog when I send him to daycare. He gets so excited when I tell him "let's go to daycare!" and when I pick him up at the end of the day he's always happy and exhausted. I have boarded him a few times as well and used their bathing and grooming services and I would recommend any and all of the things they offer in a heartbeat. I can't imagine entrusting my pup with anyone else. Love them!

name: Mark Stovall
text: We were visiting friends at the beach for three days and kept our puppy, Abby, at the Dog Ranch Resort.  It's a wonderful place!  The staff are great with the dogs and Ben sent us video of Abby playing in the large yard.  The entire experience was perfect!  We'll be back!!

name: Brian Henry (WHS ABC)
text: We visited our parents in Daphne and decided to put our Dachshunds at the Dog Ranch for a few days.  The were very pleased with the service, cleanliness, and "amenities" they provided.  We will definitely use them again next time we come down.

name: Paul Oldenburg
text: The Dog Ranch Resort is fantastic!  I think our dog, Tess, likes being there more than being at home with us!  The staff is friendly and professional.  The facility is spacious, clean and bright.  I highly recommend the Dog Ranch Resort!

name: Floyd Bartholow
text: It's a amazing looking place I can't wait To put my furry baby there

name: Troy Bookout
text: They take care of your dog.  Nice place.

name: sonny b
text: Great place to take your dog or board

name: Kay Mecke
text: Daisy and I love Ben and his ranch hands. We have done it all.....obedience,grooming,daycare and boarding!!! Five stars across the board!!!

name: Amanda King
text: I hate leaving my dog in the hands of strangers. But my dog WANTS to go to the Dog Ranch Resort! She can't wait to get out of the car when we get there. That gives me confidence that she's in a great environment when she's away from home. You won't find a more comfortable environment for your dog!

name: Earl P. Underwood, Jr.
text: Friendly experienced staff. My dogs love it.

name: Heather Delker
text: My dog loves it here. They take good care of her.

name: Fletcher Wright
text: Dog Ranch Resort in Daphne is literally a horrible place for a dog. My dog boards at Camp Scotty in Pelham sometimes and it is awesome. I saw the Dog Ranch Resort website and it looked similar. I visit Fairhope help my Mom who has Parkinson's and at times I need a place to board Bailey while here. There were unfriendly on the phone, and very business-centric, not customer-centric, and certainly not dog lovers. I arrived with my 3 year old Cockapoo, immediately heard someone yelling at an employee to keep the dog behind the line??  Then a woman walked briskly up to us, said I have to take her for the "temperament test", took my dog before she was comfortable or acclimated, came back 5 minutes later and said "Your dog was very frightened of our test dog. Sorry she cannot board here, we have lots of big dogs." So I said "let me get this straight, you immediately (in an unfriendly way) take a young dog away from its owner, walk down the hall, open a door where a large Doberman is waiting and because she gets scared you won't take her?" I also explained that she has boarded plenty of times and does great. I even offered the phone number of the place she boards. The woman says "Sir, your dog failed the temperament test."  All I can say in summary is that NO person or place that knows ANYTHING about dogs would design THAT as it's temperament test.  One more thing: I have my data analyst at work check out the reviews and he stated that all but about 3 are bogus owner generated.

resp.text: We are sorry you had a bad experience however, we have no record of your dog coming and visiting our facility. Everything you have described seems off. The Dog Ranch Resort is a very dog social environment and it is suited for active social dogs. All of our dogs are out in separate groups socializing with one another and they are supervised by our ranch hands. We do not just throw dogs in a dog run or a crate. Our Temperament Test Dog is a Chocolate Lab and not a Doberman. Everyone who meets him sees how calm, easy going, and sweet he is. The way our temperament test works is we want to make sure that your dog is good with a new person, a new dog, in a new place while the parents are away. Since you will be leaving your dog in our care we want to make sure that they are okay without you. What we look for is any signs of aggression, anxiety, and overall temperament of your dog. If they show any signs of aggression then our facility can not accommodate a dog that could be potentially dangerous to the other dogs. If we see a lot of fear and anxiety we always suggest a trial day to allow your dog to get acclimated to our environment. We want to make sure your dog is as comfortable as possible prior to boarding. It is also our policy that a "Temp Test" be done at least 2 days prior to boarding in order to allow for a trial day if necessary. Boarding your dog in a new place is very stressful for a lot of dogs so we try to take all of the necessary precautions to make sure that they aren't too overwhelmed. Before jumping in a pool most people test the water, that is the way our temperament test is designed. Our receptionist are required to treat everyone with respect, integrity, and kindness.

name: Brian T
text: Great place. Our dogs love going!

name: lakeguygb
text: 25 a day, But dog seemed to like it. Staff was very nice.

name: David Burton
text: They are very knowledgeable and experienced.

name: Tommy Pate
text: Great place

name: Polly Moonwater
text: Front desk hung up on me while asking questions about boarding.

name: leonor jefferson
text: Love this place!!  They took my rescue puppy right away.  She was matted so bad😭but they was able to clean her up to perfection ❣❣❣.. She is well on her way to getting healthy and a new family that loves her.  I highly recommend this place for your pets.

resp.text: Leonor, thank you so very much for your 5 star review! We are so happy that we were able to get your puppy in right away and clean her up to perfection!! We look forward to seeing you all again very soon!

name: Debbie Shepherd
text: I couldn’t be happier with the service at K-9.  Tim, Denise, and their staff give our sweet Hershey the best care ever!  He LOVES to go there!  It is so reassuring when we leave him, to know that he will be so well cared for.  He has special needs since he is diabetic, and they are so attentive and loving.  Recommend it to all!!

resp.text: Debbie, we are glad to have you as our customer. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us. It means a lot to us and our entire team! We absolutely love having Hershey come stay with us and look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Cathy Sumner
text: They're awesome with our pup Tina. She comes home from her spa day smelling great, looking great, and has her nails done.

resp.text: Cathy, thank you so much for this review. We really appreciate you being a customer. We love that your pup always smells amazing after spa days!! We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Wesley Sparks
text: These folks are great! They give excellent trims and services. We have used them for boarding also. Our dog almost jumps out of the car as soon as we pull up because he loves it there. Sometimes I get text updates about him playing while there. Great business owners providing excellent service.

resp.text: Wesley, we are very excited that you guys come to see us! We absolutely love George W and are thrilled to hear that he loves coming to see us!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Beth Mumaw
text: The groomer did what I asked on my westie.  She has very long legs and I do not  like her clipped too short.  The facility is very nice and clean.  I also liked the idea that she was not there all day.  My dog has anxiety when left too long and they notified me as soon as she was finished.

resp.text: Beth, thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are so happy that you are pleased with your westie's groom. We look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Alvin Irizarry
text: Amazing grooming! I have two miniature schnauzers, and I have never seen them look so good after grooming. This will be the place I get my puppies groomed from now on.

resp.text: Alvin, we truly appreciate that you have chosen to have your schnauzers groomed here. We aim to have all our grooms look amazing and super happy that we accomplished this with you!! We can't wait to see you guys again very soon!

name: Susan Comperda
text: We gave K9 a try after having used another location for the past few years with our doodle and yorkies. We provided a picture of our doodle from a past haircut that we liked. We were happy with the results and the price! We also find them to be very professional in their communication with their customers. The place we previously used was not very professional and pricing had gotten ridiculous. We are happy to have found K9!

resp.text: Susan, thank you so much for such kind words. We are so happy that you guys have chosen to come see us for your doodle and yorkies!! We  look forward to seeing you guys soon!

name: Ashley Wilson
text: I called and scheduled boarding and training for my dog back in March. The appointment was made for May. I call today to see if I can drop my dog off a couple days earlier. I was told their is no longer a trainer at this facility and that I will have to call and talk to that trainer. No one called me before hand to tell me these changes have been made. I talk to that trainer and she has none of my information and had no idea about my appointment that was made. So now I have nowhere to board or train my dog because this trainer is already booked. Tim is the one who took my information and scheduled the appointment. I call to talk to Tim about the issue and he is rude and says he can't do anything about it. I would not recommend using this place. They have Horrible communicating and not helpful when it comes to their mistakes.

resp.text: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and miscommunication on our part!  We personally do not train; however, we refer you to a trainer. We have had trainers at our facility in the past that we felt were not giving the clients what they needed.  We have found a trainer with 12 years of experiences with all dog training needs.

name: Barbara Arends
text: They do a great job grooming my Yorkie plus she doesn't mind going.  I've boarded her here too and was pleased.

resp.text: Barbara, thank you so very much for the 5 star review! We love seeing you guys!! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Eric Brugman
text: Best groomer I’ve ever been to. Excellent service and quality work. My dog Noodles has never looked better. Great prices and friendly staff. Definitely going to make them my permanent groomers. I highly recommend their services for anyone looking for a great haircut for their dog.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Eric. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to seeing Noodles and you again in the future!

name: Melissa 4r5 Bautista
text:
I LUV THIS PLACE FOR MY PUPPY (ROCKY).HE LUVS DAYCARE!!
IT MAY BE OUT OF MY WAY ,HOWEVER I WOULD DO THE DRIVE BECAUSE I TRUST THIS FACILTY WITH MY DOG.KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK !!(THE DAIRY QUEEN AROUND THE CORNER GIVES A PUPCUP OF ICE CREAM )HE LUVS HIS ICE CREAM TOO !!

resp.text: Melissa, thank you so much for such a wonderful review!! We love seeing Rocky who is such a sweetheart! We truly appreciate that you come out of your way to bring him to see us at daycare!

name: Cynthia Beaudry
text:
Oh my word! I am so amazed by this place.

1. Availability: every other grooming place is booked until February. K9 has openings/availability and was able to get my dog in right away!

2. Affordable: absolutely great pricing and a variety of services.

3. Agreeableness: the whole staff was so friendly. I could tell that my dog in good hands. They were so efficient, my dog was done in just a few hours.

This will be my go to place from now on! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback. We try really hard to provide a great experience at K9 Bath Body & Boarding and are really happy to hear that you enjoyed it!

name: David Waring
text: Great boarding service.  Very friendly owners.  Always willing to work with us on late requests.

resp.text: David, thank you so very much for the 5 star review. We are super happy that we are able to accommodate you guys!! We look forward to seeing you guys again soon!

name: Erin Coffey
text: I've been on the search for somewhere to board my dog for quite sometime. My lab, Max, tends to be reactive towards men (making it hard for me to find places that will take him). I brought Max out for a doggy daycare trial run at K9 BBB, and even though it started out a little rough, Tim did everything in his power to make Max comfortable with him. The staff is awesome! The trainer there, Angel, has worked so well with Max and given me so many helpful tips. Now Max is always super excited to go see Tim and the staff and play with all of his friends all day! I highly recommended this place for your fur babies, because your pup will be in the best hands!!!

resp.text: Erin, thank you so very much for such kind words!! We are so excited that Max loves coming to see us. Angel and all the staff are the most dedicated to our customers and pets!! We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Luis Vera
text: Amazing service and my babies look so cute. Thanks K-9 Bath Body and Grroming for an amazing service.

resp.text: Luis, thank you for the five star review. We take great pride in making sure that we provide amazing service and are super excited that you guys chose us!! Hope to see you guys again very soon!

name: Nick Mewbourn
text: I carry my dog (Cooper) here ever weekday and he loves it and they are a awesome group. I wouldn't even think of taking him anywhere else!!

resp.text: Nick, thank you for the 5 star review. We absolutely love seeing Cooper, especially at daycare! He is such a sweetheart!

name: Matthew wilson
text: We put our 10 month old lab in for a 2 week board and train, it was like night and day when we got him back. He would always bark and pull towards people and other dogs, and my 10 year old could not hold him back. Now he walks beside you does not bark nearly as much as he used to and also does not pull away while barking. They went above and beyond to help with our lab. And to top it off they are very friendly and helpful even if I have questions or issues they told me to call and they will help.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. It’s always so refreshing to hear that we are doing a good job! Everyone here at K9 Bath Body & Boarding loved reading this!!

name: Jessica Walters
text: Talk about going ABOVE and BEYOND! The owner, Tim, personally took time to work with my puppy and guide me through a number of behavioral problems. They were incredibly accommodating with last minute daycare and boarding needs, and their trainer, Angel, was SO knowledgable and professional. I don't usually leave reviews, but I was blown away by their kindness and expertise. They GENUINELY CARE. Cannot recommend enough!

resp.text: Jessica,  we are honestly so grateful for this wonderful review! Thank you for being so positive and putting that positivity out into the world. We can't wait to see you guys again soon!

name: Karen Withrow
text: Love this kennel! They have cared & groomed my pup since they opened & I won't take my schnauzer to any other kennel when we are out of town! Great family & employees!

resp.text: Karen, we truly appreciate your wonderful compliments!! Thank you for your 5 star rating!!

name: Erica Burleson
text: Loved our experience with the friendly staff at k-9! Our sweet dog looked and smelled incredible. Will definitely be returning soon!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for the 5 star review!! We truly appreciate your business. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Andrea Brown
text: The owners and staff went out of their way to make our dogs feel at home! We were so pleased that we booked additional boardings! Stop by and check them out!

resp.text: Coco and Tycho were well behaved house guest and a joy to have spent time with those sweet fur babies!  Looking forward to to our next visit.

name: Jennifer Smith
text: I have a very unruly almost 100 lb doodle that thinks he is a 5 lb puppy! These kind people take care of him from Kaitlyn who is an awesome person who cares for his hair and nails etc. to Tim and his wife. Time has taken an interest in my doodle and currently trying to help me break his male aggressive tendencies. These people are wonderful, economical, sweet and friendly and truly care about the pets under their care! The place is exceptionally clean and I have boarded my demanding dog there one time and going for round two this weekend. They care for him when he is not able because of his behavior to join us on our camping trips or other activities. I highly recommend them to anyone needing to have their pet taken care of you will not be disappointed.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer,  thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback. We are so delighted that you rate our service as 5 star as we strive to provide just that for all our customers. We always look forward to seeing you and Clifford!!!

name: Christopher George
text: A little off the beaten path(for me but that's my problem and definitely worth the drive) but I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.  Ms. Kacy took great care of my pup!! Shaped him up nicely so he won't be so hot on the hiking trails. Bath and de-shed definitely helped with his shedding. Will definitely be back!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christopher. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us—and we agree, Ms. Kayce is truly a gem to have on our team! We count ourselves lucky for customers like you. We look forward to seeing you guys again in the future!

name: Matthew Christopher
text: Nice folks that run this place..5 star miss clicked great place

resp.text: And you only give us a 4 Star?  Ugh that has to be a mistake! We strive so hard to keep the 5 star streak.  What can we do to have you make it a 5 star?

name: Amy Foster
text: My dog, Lucy, has been going here for a little over 2 months. She RUNS to them ready to start her day! She comes home tired and I can tell she’s had a great time. Tim and Denise have been so flexible with my work schedule, it has helped me out tremendously. I can’t recommend them enough! The dogs have plenty of space to run and a clean facility to relax in between play time.

resp.text: Amy, thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. We're glad that customers like you are having a great experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We absolutely love Lucy and miss her when she is not with us.

name: Lisa Lebon
text: My little guy, Sonny, has been going to daycare twice a week here!!!!  He is SO excited to get there and so exhausted when he leaves!!  I can tell they take great care of him by his enthusiasm when he sees the staff.  I’ve also had him groomed a couple of times and looks so handsome afterwards!!  Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Lisa, we're happy to see that you had a 5-Star experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We love seeing Sonny and getting to spend time with him! Thanks for sharing.

name: Mrs. Jennifer McDowell
text: Had to board our sweet puppy for an extended amount of time Tim and Denise made sure she was truly loved on while we were away. Zoey loved her home away from home. Would highly recommend them for boarding or grooming!

resp.text:
Jennifer, it's always a pleasure seeing you guys. Thanks so much for your positive feedback and good vibes. It was our pleasure to take care of Zoey at her "home away from home" and she fit right in with our pack.
We're happy that you're happy, and we're looking forward to your next visit.

Hurry back!

name: Elizabeth Neumann
text: Our puppy Wesley absolutely loves his time at K-9’s Doggy Day Care. We’ve utilized the service twice now and will definitely be going back. Wesley is only 5 months old so he needs a place to expel his energy; This place is a no-brainer. I’ve also been told that he’s made some new friends! The staff is helpful and knowledgeable. The atmosphere is welcoming and nurturing. We just love it!

resp.text:
Elizabeth, it's always a pleasure seeing you. Thanks so much for your trust in us. We absolutely love seeing Wesley and spending time with him!!

We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review.

name: Galina Dukes
text: We boarded our puppy there recently the staff was excellent!  They treated him like he was their own dog.  He was well groomed and happy when we picked him up!  Kennels are very clean with wide open spaces to play.  Definitely a repeat customer.

resp.text: Buran is too cute, can't help but love him like your own.  Looking forward seeing him as an adult playing in our 2 acre outside play area.   Thank you for trusting in us with your beautiful babies.

name: Tracey Scott
text: The owners are very nice and you can tell they truly enjoy what they do and they love animals. Buster was treated very well. He looks and smells so good! We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Tracey, seeing that you had a 5-Star experience is the best thing we could hope for! Your review means a lot to us. Thank you for choosing K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We look forward to serving you for many years to come!

name: Meagan Godwin
text: The owners are so nice and very informative, they treat your dog like their own. My dog Riley comes here multiple times a week for daycare and loves it! I used to have an issue with other places where she would be scared when I dropped her off but it has not once been an issue here. She runs straight to the door and doesn’t look back at me. She gets excited the second we pull up and is worn out when she leaves (love that part)! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Meagan, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their experience.We love Riley and look forward to seeing her every week!!

name: Brandon Jennings
text: Owners were very friendly, and you can tell they are in this business because they love animals. Facility is clean and they took the time to get to know my dog Kobe. He was very well taken care of and their prices are very reasonable.  Will definitely use again.

resp.text: Brandon, thank you for such a wonderful review!! We are so grateful for your business and enjoy our time we get to spend with Kobe. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Thomas Evatt (Rocketman978)
text: This is by far the best boarding, grooming, etc. Company in Madison County.  The owner and employees love pets..they are highly recommended by Tasha Yar and Scamper..

resp.text: Thomas, we are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review. Can't wait to see Tasha and Scamper again very soon!!!

name: Rebecca Shelton
text: They did a great job of fixing my dog’s grooming mishap from another place.  He was shaking with fear on the car ride there, but when I picked him up a few hours later, he was so happy- tail wagging.  Took him back there to board the next week and he had zero anxiety about it!  They went out of their way to wait on us when we were delayed picking him up.

resp.text: Rebecca, thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the team to let them know to keep up the amazing work.

name: Greg
text: We are very happy with the way they took care of our York and standard poodle, it was very pleasant to pick up fresh cleaned and well-groomed dogs after a weekend away. We'll be using this business again!!  Great job on the poodle's hair!

resp.text: Greg, the team here at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding is thrilled to receive such great rating, thank you.

name: Haley Jared
text: We had a great grooming experience here! The staff was extremely friendly, easy to work with, and accommodating. My pup Kooper loved the environment and enjoyed time playing with other dogs. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We can’t wait to have you back at K-9 Bath Body & Boarding.

name: Tracy Pierceall
text: I’m so pleased with the quality of service my babies received. I would highly recommend them and I’m thrilled to have them as my groomer. I have 3 dogs all looked fabulous and smelled wonderful. ❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much for this great 5-star review. We really appreciate your business and helping to share the word about K9 Bath Body & Boarding!

name: Amanda Riddle
text: The owners and staff were so friendly! We were very pleased with the care and services provided. Hazel looked wonderful after being groomed!

name: Tiffany kimbrough
text: They did amazing on my yorkie the only is the nail needs to be a little shorter other then That they did amazing, it was also our first time.

name: Kaitlin Carter

name: Jason Hopkins
text: They do wonderful work grooming and have reasonable prices.

resp.text: Jason, thanks so much for the wonderful review!! Look forward to seeing you again soon!!

name: Ashlee Eastham
text: Loved their services. They were very easy to deal with and did a great job with Thor. I loved the bandana he came home wearing, too!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an excellent rating. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Tamyra Sampson
text: Great staff/owners.  Very pleased with the care (they kept her all day), grooming, and pleasant attitude of the staff.  HIGHLY  recommend K-9 Bath Body and Boarding

name: ashli Jennings
text: Kobe had a great time boarding here.  He says he really liked the staff and so sorry that he barked so much. He will do better next time.

name: Karen N.
text: They groomed my two and did a great job!  I was impressed, and they are so friendly there. I will definitely be back!

name: Gary M

name: nicholas rushton
text: The staff is fantastic great. It is a great little family owned place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

Tim and Denise Edwards
