name: Charles Jones
text: Our dog loves it here. He goes to daycare everyday!

resp.text: Seeing that you had a 5-Star experience is the best thing we could hope for! Your review means a lot to us. Thank you for choosing K-9 Bath Body & Boarding. We look forward to serving you  and Bailey for many years to come!

name: Chris and Laura Hester
text: Daisy was well taken care of during her stay!

resp.text: Daisy was easy to please.  She enjoyed playing outside with the other dogs.

name: Nicole Lansdown
text: Was looking for a new groomer and I'm so glad I found k-9 Bath & Body. My dog smelled so good when i picked her up, I couldn't stop smelling her.

resp.text: Nicole, we are super happy that you were pleased with the groom and that she smelled so good! Thank you for the 5 star review!  Hope to see you guys again soon.

name: Debbie Kimble
text: We consider Joseph a great friend as well as an awesome trainer. Our girls (3 Shelties) love him! He knows how to read a dog's unique personality and adjust training methods accordingly.  He incorporates behavior modification for issues such as barking, jumping, and building confidence in a fearful or shy dog.  He goes above and beyond expectations; he has made a free house call and given us helpful information and products even when we were not paying for a class. Top notch!!

name: kim keene
text: Skeptic? Well I was too at first. Took me about 5 minutes at best to see that Joseph Honeycutt was truly a very knowledgeable and talented dog trainer. He will blow your mind with knowing your dog within the first 15 minutes and teaching them to do things you never thought were possible. I would recommend Joseph to anyone in need. Dare to be amazed, as seeing is believing.

name: Adam Hamaker
text: Had a great experience. My dog loves the staff who is very experienced and are  knowledgeable about what they do. No second guesses about going back I highly recommend going to them and I will be back museld.

name: Kenlee's Creations
text: We have been training with Joseph since our GSD was 10 weeks old, she is almost 7 months now. I can't emphasize enough the amount of help he has been. We HIGHLY recommend him to everyone we know.

name: Pam Mayes
text: There are dog trainers, and then there is Joseph Honeycutt of CCE.  He goes far beyond the basic commands by recognizing each dog's basic needs. His intuition is incredible, not only with the dogs, but their owners as well.  Amazing experience!

name: Laura Tidwell
text: Fezzik and I had our first session today and it was awesome! Not only did Fez learn a lot, I did as well!

name: Dana Molan
text: Joseph is the best dog trainer.  He has done a great job with my service dog

name: Shannon Latona
text: Joseph is one amazing dog trainer!!

name: Tia W. Vaughn
text: I came home to visit for Spring Break and a friend suggested The Barkery. I'm so glad he spent the week there! The place is lovely and he left healthy and happy. Definitely bringing him back!

name: Jade Barone
text: Excellent first experience with The Barkery! They are very nice and easy to work with. Had my dogs cake ready in less than 24 hours. I definitely recommend this place!!

name: Tia Williams Vaughn
text: Took care of our puggle while I was home visiting from Dallas. Definitely going back!

name: Donni Crozier
text: This is hands down the best place to take your dog in the state. I just read some negative  reviews on this great business. It looks like these people don't have there facts straight. You could not ask for someone to love and care for your pet better than Kimberly. She is the only person i have ever known that truly 100% of the time put the pets and the customers first each and every time. I can't say enough great things about Kimberly and her staff.

name: Stephanie Smith
text: Absolutely in love with this business and their staff. They constantly amaze me with how they treat my dog like their own. They know us and our dog by name, they constantly are sharing their accomplishments and experiences with us. My dog is absolutely in love with the staff, some days I worry my baby won’t even come home with me! Love this place!

name: Stew Hayles III
text:
Took my dog to the Barkery in October 2020. It was z horrible experience.  I blame myself because I waited until the last minute to make a boarding appointment at my usually facility, which is Golden Animal Hospital in Pike Road(great service and care everytime!). We boarded our 18 month old golden doodle for 10 days. He was supposed to be groomed the last day he was there. We keep his hair long so he was only supposed to be washed and trimmed.

When I dropped him off, the receptionist was nice enough but the place smelled very bad. I've used several dog care facilities since we're new to Montgomery and the Bakery was by far the worst in cleanliness.  The dogs and the administration area are all in one. This created a very unorganized check-in since the receptionist was moving, picking up and pushing dogs off the counter the entire check-in. I looked over this because we were literally flying out of town the same day.

10 days later, I called to the Barkery know I was headed to pick my dog up. They told me that they had to cut his hair down low because he had a few matted areas on his legs. I didn't like that but its understandable. I arrive to the counter and the owner hands me a bag of hair to "prove" how bad the matts were! They brought my dog out and he was literally shaved down to skin😥 It was so sad! They didn't even grind or clip his nails. It was clear that they had no clue what they were doing. They couldn't find his collar and leash. They said that I must have taken it with me. I usually take them with me at my normal grooming place but I thought I remembered leaving them. I didn't take the time to debate the point because I was almost numb at the sight of my dog. I just kept telling myself, "This is your fault for waiting too long to make an appointment and taking him to the ONLY place that had an opening" Now I know why they had an opening. For the life of me, I can not figure out how people are giving this place good reviews.

When I get home and the family and I console each other, lol.....I find my dogs collar and flea collar buried in his door food that I had left with the Barkery. My dog also wouldn't eat for days after we got him back and he was sick for at least a week. He sneezing and vomiting. Btw, he smelled horrible. I was trying to figure out what they used to wash him and if they actually bathed him the day before I picked him up.

This was the worst experience ever and I would learn to groom my own dog if this was the only place open. On top of all of this, the receptionist and owner never apologized for the haircut. They basically blamed me because I let him get matts.

Worst experience ever!

name: Jonathan Bowman
text: This place has helped my dog tremendously with his separation anxiety. The staff was amazing and took a lot of time making sure he was comfortable and okay being there without his family. He absolutely loves going now and tries to fight me to leave. I cannot say enough amazing things about this place!

name: Amber
text: Love the staff and they are so good to our pups! I get cute pictures of my babies and they always remember me when I come in!

name: Dan Knotts
text: The staff at the Barkery are awesome!  When I first brought my Jax in they ask a lot of questions at first and realized they just cared about him. He has anxieties and they made him feel good enough for me to leave without much fanfare. He must have played hard because he was out not long after getting home. I see why you ask questions like  allergies,  a jumper, aggressive etc. They cleaned him up and obviously took good care of him. Thank you Kim, I can see you are a true animal lover.

name: Monica Apps
text: My baby Pebbles loves her friends at daycare, every time I say let’s go to daycare she starts jumping around. I love the whole staff there, wonderful place of business.

name: Leigh Ann Bowden
text: Today I brought in my pit mix to get her nails clipped. She has never been a fan of having her paws touched, much less letting us clip her nails. Kim & her staff at The Barkery went above & beyond to make it an easy (instead of terrifying) experience for my Harleigh Girl. I even rewarded her with some of their delicious homemade dog treats. When Harleigh got some she was all smiles & absolutely loved her Banana Cupcake and Zebra Cookie. I would definitely recommend The Barkery to anyone looking for pet grooming, doggie daycare or even just a nail clip.

name: Sydni Bing
text: I bring my 3 fur babies to The Barkery for daycare and grooming. My dogs are always so excited when we pull in the parking lot they’re already trying to get to the doors!! The staff members are the sweetest things and i just couldn’t ask for a better second family for my babies.

name: Joy Melton
text:
Hands down the best in business!!!! We love the owner (Kim) and her staff!!!
I would rate a 10 out of 10 if I could

name: April C
text: They are always sweet with my fur baby, and he comes home looking and smelling amazing😍😍

name: Esmeralda Paap
text: Took both my dogs here and they did a great job! I definitely recommend this place!

name: Sandra Norris
text: I bring my 2 basset hounds for grooming and daycare, my girls Lily and Molly. The pull me into the doors, they love Mrs. Kim and all of the staff. They are always exhausted whenever they come home!

name: Maryla Webb
text: My dog is the best testament to the Barkery. He goes absolutely nuts when I take him there and yesterday didn't want to leave to come home.

name: Makayla Washington
text: Can’t say enough good things about how compassionate the staff here is!! My family recently had our four-legged family member, Nala, pass away. Nala used to have regular appointments with Kimberly and when they hadn’t heard from us around the time of her next one they reached out to check in. When we informed them of her passing you could tell the staff members were actually upset as well. Then a few days later in the mail they had even sent us a card apologizing for our loss. Whenever we decide to add another four legged member to our family, we will be returning. Thank you to The Barkery for treating all your clients like family!

name: Amanda Rowland
text: Recently started bringing my babies to doggy daycare at The Barkery. The girls at the front were very professional and took time making sure my babies were comfortable before starting to allow my babies in with the others. The environment is fun and happy. It was a joy seeing just how happy and excited the other dogs coming in were. We will most definitely be returning!!!!

name: Alexandria Harvest
text: Pet Parents BEWARE! On July 2, I dropped my dog Midnight off at The Barkery, we planned to go out of town, so we let the staff member know that we would want to do daycare and boarding, because we planned to go out of town and would be back late. We ended up not going out of town, so my sister called The Barkery  at 5:35 to inform them that we would not be boarding and we were coming to pick midnight up, she said okay, everything seemed normal. My sister got to The Barkery 6 minutes later and call and through tears told me that the Barkery allowed my dog to get out of their gate, around 5:00pm,  THIRTY MINUTES AGO. Apparently Haley the staff worker, did not want to upset her and tell her over the phone. Mind you, they thought we were boarding, and at no point did they reach out to either Emergency contact listed on the paperwork, had my sister not unexpectedly showed up, it looks like they had no plan to reach out. We were told that Haley was in one room(making mop water), and Kimberly the owner was in another room(cleaning) while the dogs were outside, and unattended. They heard a loud noise, and a customer who was coming to pick up their dog came in and informed them that a black dog with a blue collar had gotten out. They had no idea because they weren't watching. One Hour later, me and my siblings were out looking for my dog with NO ASSISTANCE from The Barkery.  No one called either of Midnight's listed emergency contacts,  reached out to establish a perimeter, or even apologize and explain what happened. I had to reach out to Kimberly and request that she call me via text. When she did call, she did not apologize, she simply blamed us because he jumped the fence, all while not looking for my dog that she lost. My dog has been coming to the barkery since they were on Woodley rd, and he's never jumped. Around 7 I went back to Barkery, and Kim

name: Kaleigh Culver
text: My yorkie,Oscar stayed all week for boarding while we went out of town for work and he loved it so much I didn’t think he was gonna leave and come back home to me!!! Stopped and got him a pup a chino afterwards:) We will definitely be back! Thankful to find someone I can trust with my fur baby! Thanks to,Kimberly and staff @TheBarkery

name: NaTasha Williams
text: My experience with the whole staff was absolutely amazing, they took care & loved my baby Rue.

name: Micheal Waters
text: Ordered a birthday cake from The Barkery. They had it ready the same day and my dog absolutely loved it!

name: Patricia Macon
text: My dog Lucy goes here for daycare and grooming and she gets so excited whenever we arrive. She always looks and smells so good whenever she gets groomed with Kim!!

name: Greg Hooper
text: Hands down would never take my dogs anywhere else. My dogs are ecstatic to come in and never want to come home!

name: Kim Tomberlin
text: You can really see how much they care for the fur baby clients and their parents. Their treatments are amazing, they do baths, messages, hair removal brushes them so well and does all styles and sizes  of grooming.  I was very happy to see when you board your fur babies they have someone there  with them  24 hours a day . That means so much to me. They make wonderful treats from scratch that look so good and healthy. I know that mine will be there quite often. You can trust that when you take your fur child there they get the best care possible!

name: Zovi “Zovi” V
text: Pet Parents BEWARE! On July 2, I dropped my dog Midnight off at The Barkery, we planned to go out of town, so we let the staff member know that we would want to do daycare and boarding, because we planned to go out of town and would be back late. We ended up not going out of town, so my sister called The Barkery  at 5:35 to inform them that we would not be boarding and we were coming to pick midnight up, she said okay, everything seemed normal. My sister got to The Barkery 6 minutes later and call and through tears told me that the Barkery allowed my dog to get out of their gate, around 5:00pm,  THIRTY MINUTES AGO. Apparently Haley the staff worker, did not want to upset her and tell her over the phone. Mind you, they thought we were boarding, and at no point did they reach out to either Emergency contact listed on the paperwork, had my sister not unexpectedly showed up, it looks like they had no plan to reach out. We were told that Haley was in one room(making mop water), and Kimberly the owner was in another room(cleaning) while the dogs were outside, and unattended. They heard a loud noise, and a customer who was coming to pick up their dog came in and informed them that a black dog with a blue collar had gotten out. They had no idea because they weren't watching. One Hour later, me and my siblings were out looking for my dog with NO ASSISTANCE from The Barkery.  No one called either of Midnight's listed emergency contacts,  reached out to establish a perimeter, or even apologize and explain what happened. I had to reach out to Kimberly and request that she call me via text. When she did call, she did not apologize, she simply blamed us because he jumped the fence, all while not looking for my dog that she lost. My dog has been coming to the barkery since they were on Woodley rd, and he's never jumped. Around 7 I went back to Barkery, and Kimberly and her significant other, Jake arrived( how she had time to go get her boyfriend while she claimed she was looking for my dog, not sure). Kimberly ran inside the building, never spoke, never apologized and sent Jake, who is not an owner of The Barkery,  to "deal" with us. Apparently, Kimberly had lied to Jake and told him that she was threatened by myself on the phone and was called a b****h, which was untrue, I was actually quite pleasant all considered. When Kimberly finally came outside, I asked her was she ever threaten or called any obscenity and she said no that never happened. Jake went off to smoke his KOOL cigarette, because the whole reason he came was because of her lie.Why Kimberly would make herself to be the victim when she lost my dog is beyond me. Kimberly yelled us, blamed us,  cursed, and never once apologized. I understand that things happen, but if you're a dog sitter and you lose the dog, you need to take some form of responsibility and at least be sorry and try to help. Instead of being concerned,  Kimberly(owner) and her daughter, and another staff member keep screaming about their "Livelihood".  Thankfully, me and my family were able to go out looking at 6:00 am and posting lost posters and found Midnight near Huntingdon College. The staff members saw us looking for our dog, offered no help, and still no apology.  Today is July 9, and The Barkery has never followed up, or showed any concern for their negligence. My dog refuses to leave me or my sisters side since this event, so I'd advise you to find another place to drop off your four legged family member.

name: Tim Watts
text: I witnessed the entire staff act in a rude and extremely unprofessional manner . The entire staff allowed my sister's dog, Midnight, to walk away from the facility due to the staff not regularly monitoring the outside activities of the animals. Furthermore, they waited until a family member arrived at the facility to pick up the dog instead of calling the emergency contacts to notify of the situation, approximately 30 minutes after Midnight ran off. The owner, Kimbery, argued with us, accused us of calling her a derogatory term, admitted she lied about being called a derogatory term, and then refused to look for the dog. This incident occurred on Thursday, July 2nd. Today is July 5th and we have yet to hear from Kimberly on the status of the search for our dog. I highly recommend that you look elsewhere for your dog sitting needs.

name: Shantel Stewart
text: There is no doubt that there are plenty of boarding and grooming places to go to in Montgomery.  HOWEVER, The Barkery has a staff that is loving and caring.  I have been going here for about 6 years.  The staff is unbelievably loving and caring.  They become emotional attached to your dogs and become your friend.  Kim, Steve, and Sydni are all so very sweet.  If your dog is not the playful type, then they may not like this place.  The Barkery has a very dog friendly natural playful atmosphere where all of the dogs get to be dogs!  They get to play and socialize with one another and get treats and loved on by the staff.  Every dog owner is particular in their own way and that's understanding.  But despite them being our fur children, they are still dogs and want to play with one another and run around.  If you want your dog to have fun and be loved and for you to feel secure knowing that they are safe, then the Barkery is the place to go!!  I'll never go elsewhere.  My dog instantly gets excited the moment we pull up and is eager to run inside.  That lets me know that they too love going there.  And don't get me started on how amazing they smell when they get groomed.  As silly as it sounds, I could smell my dog all day after they get groomed.  I LOVE THE BARKERY!!!!

name: John Clark
text: Kim is awesome. I love that I can leave my Sophie and not worry. She always has a good time.

name: Jacoby Pace
text: Hands down the most unprofessional and inconsiderate group of people when it comes to the care of your four legged family member. Would not recommend!!!!

name: HALEY MCDONALD
text: I cannot stress enough how important it is to take care of your dog to the best of your ability. That’s why I take my dog here. I know that my dog is getting the best treatment and the best care here with Kim and the other staff. I strongly recommend taking your dog here!

name: Mardy Wilkes
text: Wonderful

name: Macie Sommers
text: Such a GREAT staff! My dogs have so much fun & I have never felt like people care about my dogs as much as they do at The Barkery. 10/10 would recommend to anyone with any kind of dog!

name: Jordan Daniels
text: My fur baby and I love The Barkery!! The staff is so friendly and so sweet! My baby loves it there! I love seeing his pictures on Facebook of him playing with the other dogs!! The staff truly has a love for their job as they care so deeply about each and every dog that comes in!!

name: Jake Melton
text: I love this place! Can’t say enough good things about it. My Dog Derk loves this place after being at several other places I’ve finally found his home! He knows when I’m about to pull in a mile away. Kimberly is extremely friendly and loves all the clients. Would recommend this place 10 out of 10 if I could

name: Garrett Baker
text: My english bulldog “Boomer” loves to come here. These people are very friendly and take really good care of the dogs. Boomer has so much fun coming here he doesn’t even want to leave .😉

name: Bella Williams
text: Would definitely reccomend The Barkery. Awesome friendly employees, great groomers, my dogs love boarding and coming there for daycare. They always come home exhausted and are so happy to go there.

name: Heather Webster
text: Love this place!  They are great with my pups!

name: Megan Baker
text: I love The Barkery! My dog always has the best time and the staff is so friendly. I highly recommend them for your doggy needs!

name: Lakevius Kirt-Simmons
text: I took my 3 dogs to the BARKERY for boarding for 2 days when I picked them up they was smelly wet of urine plus came home vomiting& having dirrehea

name: Madison Stokes
text: The best staff!!! They loved on my fur baby and you can tell they genuinely care! Would 10/10 recommend!

name: Jamal Williams
text: My dogs love this place

name: Kris Johnson
text: It's a dog fun place.  My first visit left me with the desire to be one of the regular customers.  Very personable, relaxed and welcoming.  Pet owners dropping off their fur babies to the day care would open the gate to the upstairs area and take off their leash.  Dogs would bound up the steps and the owners would leave without a worry.  I can't wait to see how my pups look when I pick them up today.  If you need a groomer or doggy day care - check them out.

name: jennifer crush
text: The ONLY place I would trust to leave my four legged babies at! Kim and her staff are absolutely amazing, always greet you with a smile and really care for your furry children!!

name: Yessenia Nino
text: This was my dog’s old daycare place and they let him out the other day without notifying me. He was lost all night. Found him the next day roaming around Huntington College. I was extremely upset.

name: Ann What
text: I took my sons dog here and my husband picked him up. The grooming was fine. They brought him out the wrong dog. They brought him the wrong collar. They made the dog walk through a room full of unsecured  dogs which terrified my dog. My husband was very upset I took the dog to this location. I cannot recommend a place that allows grooming dogs to mix in with other dogs they dont know.

name: Greg Wall
text:
Thank you Michelle and staff for treating Reggie so nicely last Friday.
I appreciate you allowing him to stay for such a brief visit.  If I were a local, we would surely use your services.  You have my highest recommendation- bonne chance!

name: josh Stevenson
text: The Barkery is and amazing place for fur babies they treat all the clients well and try to fit you in even when the packed. Kim and her workers are by far the hardest working grooming business in montgomery and will respect all your wishes. My dog loves going up there even when she isn’t getting groomed the have a amazing daycare and always have someone keeping close watch on there daycare babies they dont leave your dogs caged up and inside all day the constantly let there dogs in and out to keep the happy and my baby sure does come home tired and ready to lay down from all the playing i love it. I would trust my dogs there more than anywhere else in montgomery and not to mention my dog is in love with there hand made treats this place is an all in one you should definitely think twice before going somewhere else.

name: Jonathan Wilkinson
text: Did a wonderful job with our Keeshond dog with very affordable prices. Will most likely make it a monthly appointment.

name: Daniel Yu
text: Although the staff was very friendly, this was the first time my dog came to daycare and she got pretty beat up by the larger dogs during group play. This facility was referred to me from a friend and I'm strongly disappointed and angry that the staff allowed the dogs to play so rough. She had several puncture wounds all over her neck, shoulders and left arm. I assumed staff would look out extra for puppies when they group play with large breeds, but that's not the case. Will never return.

name: Vance MacLaughlin
text:
Kim has always been great.  She has groomed or dogs for about 10 years.  The dogs love her and she is the only one I have ever given carte blanche about grooming our shitzu.
Caring and a great personality.  Only place I'll go

name: Caleb Reese
text: Great Place for all services for your dog!!

name: Philip Cumbie
text: Excellent service for all your fur babies needs!!! Caring extremely for all. Everyone should stop by!!!!!!

name: cheyenne taylor
text: My babies Gina & Lady love going to daycare there!! - their exhausted every time they come home :)

name: katrina Beverly
text: This is a wonderful place that takes care of my puppy dog and does a great job grooming him

name: Desiree Atkins
text: Great little place. Lovely staff.

name: michael anderson
text: Great environment for dogs and a beautiful set up

name: Virginia Reeder
text: Barkery is a place to get your dog groomed at a reasonable price good atmosphere doggy snacks you'll love them they take very good care of your dog

name: Bridgit Griffin
text: Great place. Michelle helps you spoil your furry kids

name: Mallory Tadlock
text: Love this business!!!

name: Nathan Gibson
text: Great atmosphere and solid staff

name: Presley Blanks
text: Always polite and kind. Professional.

name: Elijah Lofgren
text: Great people, great dog daycare

name: Melissa Stephanie
text: hands down the best daycare out there! helped us out with some last minute stuff even though we were the ones who came unprepared. my pup had the best time and would get excited any time we pulled into the driveway! me and my family were calm throughout our trip knowing she was in the best hands possible. genuinely cannot say enough great things about this place <3

resp.text: We loved having little Luna come play! She is such a sweet girl ❣️

name: Kathy Pickering
text:
I have let My golden doodle go to daycare here and board too ! He loves to go play and is excited the minute we get there.
I just boarded him for a week and they took excellent care of him. I received several pictures of him while on vacation.
The owners are so nice and genuinely care about the pets that are in their care.
Great place !!

resp.text: We love BodHe! Thank you so much, and we can't wait to see him next time.

name: Todd Morgan
text: Our dog loves sea paws! He was scared at his previous kennel and always seemed depressed when we picked him up—when he sees we are heading to sea paws he’s so excited! I love that he gets to play with other dogs and is tired when we pick him back up. Staff is super friendly and you can tell they love animals—they even send pics of my dog playing. They are very responsive and helpful. Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks we LOVE it when Fritz comes to play with us!!!! Can't wait till next time.

name: Claudia Gray
text: We took our fur baby to Sea Paws while we were vacationing in Gulf Shores. The folks there were so very nice and even texted us a photo of our dog playing with another dog while we were out and about. He had a great time and we would definitely go back whenever we are in the area. We highly recommend this facility.

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was great to have Teddy come stay and play with us and his new friends! We'll see you next time you come back this way!

name: Joan LaMartina
text: Last minute trip to Orange Beach, they graciously accepted my golden retriever and treated him like their own. I received updated text messages and pictures throughout the weekend. He had a blast and I had peace of mind. The facility was clean and welcoming. Bonus exit bath. I will definitely be using Sea Paws again and recommend this family-owned business to everyone.

resp.text: That is so sweet, we loved having Mr Copper Fox play with us. He was such a sweet addition to our pack! We can't wait till next time.

name: Mike Webb
text: We are down here on vacation and wanted to bring our dog with.  Jennifer and Austin are amazing they allowed us to view the dog area and sent a text picture of our dog playing even gave us a report card when we picked him up. Loki definitely had fun today.  HIGHLY recommend them they are awesome!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We loved having Loki come play here and make new friends! It was a pleasure meeting y'all, have a safe trip home and we'll see you next time!

name: Danyelle Hall
text: We love Sea Paws! Our pup always come home exhausted so I know he’s been having a great time while he’s there! They are super nice and we love getting surprise pics of our pup while we are away. Thank you Sea Paws!!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We always enjoy having Mylo come play at the dog house with his friends! We'll see you next time!

name: Kim Koniar
text: We have been using the Foley Sea Paws Dog Resort for boarding and doggie day out for almost 9 months. Our 1 yr old golden Luke loves it there and we love how well taken care of he is!   I highly recommend Sea Paws and couldn’t imagine taking him anywhere else.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We always enjoy having Luke come play at the dog house with his friends! We'll see you next time!

name: Heather McCloskey
text:
We took our golden retriever Archie to sea paws in hopes to find a great doggy daycare. We are snow birds with a family & wanted a great place for our family pet to go while we explore the area. Sea Paws is fantastic from the minute you step through the door with your pet your taken care of. She showed us around allowed us to watch our dog get aquatinted with the other dogs and sent pictures during the day. These extra touches made us know this is a great doggy daycare facility. Archie was so happy both days we picked him up and she even had a report card to share what he was up to why we were away.
We’re looking forward to using Sea Paws for the remainder of our stay Archie loves it and we do too!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Archie had a blast running and playing with all his new friends. We'll see you next time!!

name: Amelie Shields
text: Love it here! They keep me informed of how my dog is doing and she seems more comfortable here than most places! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much! Koda has a great time with his new play buddies! Thanks for coming to see us again we really appreciate it!

name: Samantha Chapman
text: We have taken our pups here a few times and my dogs always return home, save and very happy. We love the picture updates and reports too. Everyone is so friendly and accommodating. They truly love what they do and love the dogs.

resp.text: Thank you!! We absolutely love when Ray comes to play!!! We look forward to his next play date.

name: Bonnie Enderle
text:
Called with very short notice, because we were from out of town, and they were happy to take my 3 month old puppy for a few hours.
Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We enjoyed having Piper come play at the dog house with his new friends! We'll see you next time!

name: Sarah Precup
text: Sea Paws is awesome! I was nervous to board my dog for the first time, but they made the process so easy. Piper had so much fun, and I will definitely be using Sea Paws again! I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Piper had a great time!! We're looking forward to some play dates or another sleepover!!

name: Christopher Bowler
text: Reasonable price. They were very sweet and we were in and out quickly. Highly recommend.  Will definitely use again.

resp.text: Hi thanks! We enjoyed having Jerry come hang with us for the day! Such a sweet pup. We look forward to seeing y'all again!!

name: Erin TeBockhorst
text: Wonderful place to take your dogs. My dog destroyed a crate and they were very understanding about it and said he could still come back. He had a great time playing and was all tuckered out lol

resp.text: We loved having Captain play with us, he is welcome back anytime y'all are in town!

name: Joy Donnelly
text: Cannot say enough about this facility.  They welcomed are dog with open arms, and being this was our first experience of board a dog they were wonderful and caring.  Sent pictures every day and assured us she was fine !  ♥️♥️♥️🐶🐶

resp.text: We loved having Sugar come play!!! We can't wait to see her next time!

name: Ami Blue
text: Love this place!!  They make it feel like my pets second home.  Very clean environment. Very friendly and attentive ownership! 💕

resp.text: Thanks Ami, we love when Hudson comes to play with us!!!

name: Emily Fletcher
text: Rustee had a great time at Sea Paws. They checked in regularly and sent daily photos. The owners are great - you can tell they take pride in their business and love what they do. We will definitely be back!

resp.text: Rustee was an absolute doll to have over! We can't wait till the next time she comes to play.

name: Mike Brisson
text:
Sea Paws in Foley is amazing! Definitely one of the best places to leave your furry family members. I enjoy getting photos texted to me throughout her time there. Highly recommend if you are looking for a professional and safe place to leave your pup while you’re away!

They also offer daycare services too!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love having little Ms. Oakley come play with us!! We'll see you soon!

name: Andie Bills
text: Our dogs had a GREAT time and we loved getting the personal updates! We’ll definitely be back!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Dee Dee and Pua had a great time!! We're looking forward to some play dates or another sleepover!!

name: Gerry Warwick
text: One of the best doggy daycare experiences we’ve ever had! Fantastically clean place; great run areas for dogs of different sizes. And they even sent pictures while we are away of our little one having fun! We will absolutely use this place again. All places should be held to such high standards I’m glad to see our local doggy daycare is quite truly an A+ experience!

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was great to have Mrs Bisbee stay with us over the weekend! We would love to have her back anytime!!

name: Corey Lane
text: This was my first time boarding my babies and I have to admit I was a nervous wreck about it. My boys are my whole world and Jennifer and Austin must have sensed that. They not only assured me they would be fine and offer me see out back but on Thanksgiving day mind you sent me pictures of them having a blast with with other dogs. They are amazing caring people and have a wonderful facility. ❤️❤️I hope y’all are reading this because I can’t thank y’all enough for the love of the service you provide.❤️❤️

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We loved having "Scooby" Doobie and Jack come play with us! They're welcome back anytime, just for the day or overnight again!!

name: Kaitlin Early
text: My husky Maverick and lab Mamba LOVE it here. The owners are so friendly, professional, and easy to work with. I’ve taken my pups to several day care options in the area and Sea Paws is by far our favorite!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love having your pup's come visit and play with us regularly!!

name: Leigh Perry
text: Amazing experience! I have boarded my Goldendoodle two times in 3 years so I get super anxious about leaving her. Jennifer was amazing sending me pictures daily and putting my mind at ease about leaving my my pup in her care. I will be taking my dog for doggie day care on my busy days so that she can get play time in. Definitely recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much!!! We loved playing with Ruby on her staycation. Can't wait to see her next time.

name: Jebeys B
text:
A+ experience!  Jennifer and Austin/their kids really make it feel like you’re leaving your dog with family.  They have an awesome spot, with a good amount of land for the dogs to make friends and play all day.
Dropping off and picking up is super easy, and their daughter will even bring your dog to the car for you when you’re paying for the day!  The rate they charge is a great value for what you and your dog get out of it!
Tucker (our dog) never wants to leave when we go to pick him up, and as soon as he gets home he is LIGHTS OUT from all the days play time (probably dreaming of going back to sea paws).

Thanks to the Sea Paws team!  We’ll see you next week!

-Jason/Dana AND Tucker 🤘🏼🤘🏼

resp.text:
Thanks so much!! We really enjoy having our new friend Tucker here playing with us!!

We just got a pic from one of Tucker's new friends who posted a lights out pic from their ride home today. Great feedback, we love seeing worn out pups after a play day!

name: Mark Hutter
text: I have a large breed older dog (12 years old). Sea Paws was very responsive whenever I called. Their daughters came and helped bring my dog inside and carried her bag of dog food in for me. They sent pictures of my dog enjoying herself almost every day of her stay. But the most telling sign for my dog is when I pick her up - usually after boarding, my dog would be pulling on the leash, anxious to get out of the door. The usual dog stuff. When I picked her up from Sea Paws, she was laying on the floor and she looked like she could stay right there and be perfectly fine for the rest of her life. If I could give them 6 stars I would.

resp.text: Thanks so much we loved having Mocha come play with us, she was great! She's welcome back anytime, just for a day of daycare overnight again!!

name: Julie Krews
text: Sea Paws was recommended by a co worker.  I wanted Kona(my adopted dog) to have the opportunity to socialize with more dogs...I took Kona to Sea Paws and was very impressed with their program.  Kona’s first day...Kona got a report card.  Austin, Jeniffer and their lovely daughters give Kona a very loving environment...and Jennifer gave Kona an amazing Birthday party.  You will know that things happen for a reason...Kona is my reason and I am thankful and consider Sea Paws as our extended family...Thank you

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We love Kona and enjoy our weekly play days!!

name: Anthony Finch
text:
Sea Paws is THE choice pet spot by the beach or the bay.

An 1,810 mile permanent change of station with my wife, two babies, and my six year old dog included a stop over in Gulf Shores area. Our temporary lodging was not pet-friendly and I wanted to ensure my buddy had an enjoyable and comfortable stay too.  After a quick search it was clear Sea Paws was the best choice. The owners were amazingly understanding of our needs and concerns with our dog. They have a thorough system to check-in your pooch that reassures you’re leaving your pet is capable and caring hands.

I would recommend them 10/10 times! Five stars and two thumbs up!

Thanks again, Sea Paws!

resp.text: Thanks so much, and thanks for allowing us to play with Winston while you were in the area.

name: Ina Van Sas
text:
Wonderful owners they seem to really care. They sent pictures everyday without being ask. As dogs do they will have disagreements and they let us know immediately.
Love this place.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We really enjoyed having Zeus and Jasmine come play with us. See you next time!!

name: Joshua Johnson
text: My family and I had a great experience with Sea Paws. Austin & Jennifer sent us pictures of our pup each day while we were out of town. We knew she was in the best care. We will definitely use Sea Paws again!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We loved having Dixie come play with us! She's welcome back anytime just for the day or overnight again!

name: Crystal Pengenika
text: We felt very comfortable and were able to enjoy our vacation knowing that our dog was being well taken care of. We got daily pictures and a report card when he left. Will use again

resp.text: Thanks so much! Jack had a blast running and playing with all his new friends. We'll see you next time!!

name: Lisa Crawford
text: This was the first time we had boarded Rudy. Thank you for taking care of our fur baby.  He was worn out which to me means he had a good time. And thank you for sending me photos.  Already booked his reservation for June!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We enjoyed having Rudy come play at the dog house with his new friends! We'll see you next time!

name: Hunter Murphy
text: My dog has the best days when shes here. Always so excited to be dropped off. Professional and kind workers. 5 stars from me and my doggo! Definitely recommend if you need to go somewhere, have to work, etc. Love it!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love our little friend Lilly. We have so much fun with her playing here.

name: Jeanne Rep
text: This was Coco’s first time at a doggy day care but it will not be the last. Plan to take Coco to Sea Paws often, it was a good experience for her playing with other dogs (she’s shy) also loved that she had children to interact with.

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was great to have Coco here. We're looking forward to more play days!

name: Stephenia Walker
text:
Austin, Jennifer, (and their precious girls) took wonderful care of our 3 pups over the Thanksgiving holiday! They had their own private room complete with lounge chairs!
I would highly recommend Sea Paws in Foley!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We loved having your precious pups come play with us! They're welcome back anytime just for daycare or overnight again!

name: Karen Williams
text: Sonny Boy has been going to Sea Paws Dog Resort since he was about 8 months old.  The facilities are clean and well maintained, and the staff is friendly and treats Sonny Boy as their own. This past spring in 2020, Sea Paws Dog Resort opened another facility in Foley.  I have been thrilled because now Sonny Boy gets to go more often to play with his doggy friends while being fully supervised. It is conveniently located just off of Hwy 59 and Keller Rd. Jennifer and Austin and their daughters give my Sonny Boy lots of attention which he loves! My husband and I use their boarding services, too!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support! We love our friend Sonny Boy!

name: Michelle Fox
text: Awesome Dog care and pooch fun!  We were helping family move and needed a dog sitter for the day, after reading reviews for several places we chose Sea Paws.  I'm so glad we did.  Our girl had such a great time that we took her back another day to have fun while we went to the beach.  We will be returning to Foley more frequently and definitely plan to use Sea Paws again!  Thank you!

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We enjoyed playing with our new friend Chobee while you were in town. See you next time!

name: Libby Maddox
text: If I could give them 100 stars I would! My sweet Dolly is a Rottweiler that LOVES daycare! I was nervous about her first day due to some health problems but they take such great care of her! Not to mention she LOVES going! Every single morning she jumps in my car ready to go play! They love her like she is one of their own. Seriously, if you are considering daycare or boarding look no further than Sea Paws! I promise you will love them just as much as we do!

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love our friend Dolly, she's so sweet!!

name: Beth M
text:
This place is a must!  I traveled from Randolph, AL to Gulf Shores for a quick getaway.  The first time I left my pup, I did it locally near my house.  This time, I took him to the beach and boarded him nearby.  The Foley location has a suite!  This gave me so much comfort.  Thanks to the Fi Collar, I was able to track his activity-over 30k steps per day.  He played like a champ. His big room had toys and a bed.  It gave me a great feeling that he we had an option (crate or suite) and the prices were shockingly reasonable.
Saving the best for last- THE STAFF!  They greeted me at the car, helped me get divO in and let me know what to expect.  This is the best place to bring your fur baby. 5 stars!

resp.text: Thank you so much we really loved having DivO!!!

name: Darren Wells
text: Our first experience was well above any expectations. We were texted a picture each day of our baby playing. We received a report card of how our baby acted. Easy drop off and pick up. Our baby was worn out when she came home from a 3 night stay/play!!  Highly recommended!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much! Lily had a blast running and playing with all her new friends. We'll see you next time!!

name: Tamara Page
text: We were in town for a soccer tournament and our fur baby could not go to the soccer fields. The entire team at Sea Paws made our Rosie feel loved and safe while ensuring she had all sorts of fun. We are so grateful to Jennifer and her team for help in us enjoy our grandchild's games without worrying about our pup. We would recommend Sea Paws to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We loved playing with sweet little Rosie this weekend, thanks for sharing her with us!!

name: Kim Trimble
text: Reef had a fantastic time at Sea Paws. It was his first time to board and I was nervous, but the staff was great and sent me photos of him having fun and playing with the other dogs. When I went to pick him up I don’t think he was ready to leave LOL. He was clean and very happy. I highly recommend Sea Paws and will definitely be using them in the future when I come to the beach.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Reef had a great time while he was here, thanks for letting him come play with us!

name: John Westendorf
text: Very caring people.  My pup seemed to love it.  Highly recommended.  Reasonably priced.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We love having little Miss Roxy come play with us!! We'll see you next time!!

name: Susan Urbina-Figueroa
text: I am so glad I found them. They were super nice and took excellent care of my 2 fur babies!!!! I got updates everyday and it kept me at ease. Next time I go on vacation I will definitely leave my babies here. I HIGHLY recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We loved playing with Chip and Toby, thanks for letting them come play with us!

name: Terri Butler
text: What a loving, safe and clean place for my sweet Bella! I especially like the natural environment. She comes home happy-tired after a day full of exercise, friends and fun. I think she’s found a second family, which is a comfort for me and I won’t hesitate to leave her here overnight when needed.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support! We love our new friend Bella!

name: Jill Arnold
text: Our dogs love to stay here. They always come home exhausted from all the fun they had with the other dogs. So much better than other boarding facilities that I've experienced.

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We loved playing with sweet little Bit and Sadie this weekend, thanks for sharing them with us!!

name: Larry Wygle
text: We love Sea Paws Dog Resort! It is a very friendly, professional, family-run doggie day care and boarding resort. We have been to Sea Paws in Gulf Shores and had a wonderful experience. When they opened a new facility in Foley, we were thrilled that they were closer to our home and now have the opportunity to take our dog, Maggie, more often. Maggie gets a lot of playtime and socializing with other dogs and comes home exhausted! We have also boarded Maggie overnight and we could not ask for better care. Jennifer and Austin, along with their daughters, offer our Maggie a safe and fun environment and a lot of love and hugs!!❤❤❤

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support! We love our little friend Maggie!

name: Catherine Gilmartin
text: My 3 dogs GG, Honey Girl and Lady Bug LOVE SEA PAWS.  They have stayed there twice for extended stays.  This last time we left and the girls rode out Hurricane Sally with Jennifer and Austin and their girls.  We were worried about everyone in the area but the family reassured us they were fine. We got updates regularly and put our mind at ease. This is the ONLY place in the area I would trust to take care of our babies.  My girls run into their house when we drop them off! They come home happy and relaxed. Thank you Sea Paws!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!!! We love when the girls come to play!

name: olivia vincent
text: I had to find a boarder for my 10 month old Yorkie last minute. I heard about Sea Paws from some locals. She had never been boarded before so I was very nervous. My baby girl loved her experience at Sea Paws. The owners were very attentive and even sent me pictures throughout the stay. I would recommend this pet resort to anyone.

resp.text: Thanks so much! It was great to have Chanel here with us!

name: David West
text: I am so glad we found Sea Paws! We just moved to Foley and needed a place for our boy to socialize as well as do occasional over nighters. These guys are awesome! Buddy gives a 5 paw review!!

resp.text: Thanks so much!! Your Buddy is our buddy too!! See you next time!

name: Azee LaBarre
text: I would give this place six stars if I could!! We love bringing our Kenny here because she gets tons of play time and we get updated pictures of her every day. Couldn’t say enough good things about this place!!

resp.text:
Thanks so much! We love having Kenny girl come play with us! She's welcome back anytime to play again, just for regular daycare or overnight again!
The girls say woof woof!

name: Abby McCarthy
text: Before moving down to Foley, My husband and I searched the area for doggie day cares. Sea Paws came up on my search. As soon as I reached out to them through email, I knew our dog would be in good hands. Jenn , Austin, and their girls are so kind and love Lincoln as their own. Their facility is warm, welcoming, clean, and there is plenty of room for the dogs to run around. They are very responsive and If I have a question or issue, I know they will be quick to get back to me. I can't recommend Sea Paws enough for your pup to run around and play all day!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support! We love our friend Lincoln!

name: Stephanie Meeks
text: We’ve been taking our 1 year old golden retriever to Sea Paws for 7 months now. She absolutely LOVES going to day care and playing with her fur friends! I would HIGHLY recommend Sea Paws for any day care or boarding needs. The owners Jennifer and Austin are the BEST!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your support! We love our friend Sandy!

name: Perry Ludlow
text: Our dog Bella, has been going here for about a month and is treated lovingly by Jennifer and her family. Bella is exhausted when she gets home, but is in a wonderful mood. Two thumbs up.

resp.text: Thanks so much!! We love our little friend Bella!!

name: Kay Frye

They got plenty of play time while I was away and I didn’t have to worry about them one bit. On top of that I was able to do Sunday pickup which most places don’t offer, and I it was nice to see how happy my pups were when I picked them up. I could see they enjoyed themselves. I will be using this place again later and the doggy daycare in the future.

**DO NOT TAKE YOUR DOGS HERE**
Our dogs came back to us looking skinny and hungry. I made sure to give the exact amount of food that would be needed for 4 days which was a little over 11 cups. They gave me 8 cups back. That means they fed them less than a cup a day. When my mother went to talk to lisa she was very defensive and didnt seem a bit sorry about what had happened.

text:
My experience at Barks and Bubbles with Lisa has been GREAT!  I have been to several groomers in Decatur and BY FAR Barks and Bubbles is the BEST!

Lisa also has noticed when he has had an ear infection before I even knew and also hot spots.  She has even treated him for those!  I love to share when I am happy and more than satisfied with a business and that is why I am posting this!  You will not be disappointed! text: I have not used this kennel but i was at the ball field across from them today with my son and i watched a big white dog constantly harassing what looked to be a smaller golden colored dog by constantly chasing it around and riding it. The poor smaller dog was unable to move or get away and every time it would try the other dog would just go after it and continue riding it. This went on the entire 45 minutes i was there and was still happening as i left. Someone i assumed that was in charge saw this and just hollered at the one dog and then walked on and the white dog went back at it and just wouldn't stop. Not sure why they wouldn't have at least separated them into different areas. Felt really bad for the smaller dog. I tried calling the number to say something to someone but an automated message is played and it gives a number that isn't even the number dialed and says it isn't working.

That last day you walked out, 2 dogs were waiting to be groomed by you.   I wish you'd have said something then,  we could have gone over it.

text: Love it

name: Emily Tarr
text: We Talk Dog is the best of the best! My dog seriously starts doing backflips of excitement as soon as I tell her we’re headed to WTD for daycare to “play with her friends!” The staff is so friendly and wonderful, and I am so thankful for their consistent kindness and care. They make it so easy to leave my dog for a few hours, and it’s such a weight off my mind, knowing that my dog is in the very best care. The facility is large, clean, and has so many fun things for the dogs to do! My dog gets so many compliments on how social she is, and I ALWAYS tell them—it’s 100% because of everything she’s learned at We Talk Dog! I cannot recommend this amazing doggy daycare enough. A perfect place!

name: Cynthia Kellum
text: “We Talk Dog” is the kind of pet-family-friendly places you would want to take your fur baby too. They have taken care of our five year old German Shepherd, Bruce Lee Kellum for his whole life. Bruce Lee is a family member that sleeps in our bed every night and rides in our car just about everywhere we go except on long vacations. His well done and reasonable priced grooming and cleanness is essential to my health since I have acute asthma and a lung disease called sarcoidosis. All we have to say is “ We Talk Dog” and Bruce Lee gets so happy and excited like a child does when they are ready to go to Grandma’s house. We love Bruce Lee. My husband died unexpectedly and suddenly on New Year Eve 2019 and when I  called, We Talked Dog they were so comforting to me and Bruce Lee we we came in. They gave us both a big hug and offered to help us through it.  I highly recommend them. ♥️

name: Bruce Eckert
text:
Definitely dog people !

Our golden loves to go here and always comes home tired and happy.

They all know her by name.

Squeaky clean after a bath - the best!

Highly recommend.

text: The staff is always nice and accommodating. They do a wonderful job grooming my clients dogs and allow the dogs to play in daycare since they stay most of the day.

name: AJ D
text: This is the best place hands down to take your let's to get groomed.

name: Scott Gardner
text: It’s fine. But it’s a dog daycare in Irondale trying to pretend it’s in Beverly Hills. I’ve taken my dogs here a few times, and they enjoyed themselves, but the hurdles to get in are insane and not worth it.  I’ve never been able to count on this place as a reliable spot to drop my dogs off for the day as there’s always some new bar/barrier I have to clear. If you’re a working professional that needs a reliable place for your pet during the day I’d recommend looking elsewhere.

text: Grooming here is excellent and affordable. Love how they cut my standard poodle 🐩 with precision and style. Grooming is clean cut and daycare is well managed. Cute to see the dogs peep through the doggy eye holes . Would recommend for dog owners!

text: Excellent customer service and the way they handle dogs in a social environment is outstanding. You can tell they truly care. The grooming is excellent, too.
