resp.text: Thank you for your review and for giving us the opportunity to take care of your fur babies!

name: Danny Wheat
text: need alawer

name: Wendy Carpenter
text: I have tried to get a referral for my dog to Auburn for a cancerous tumor. I have been given the run around, first it was Wednesday, then call back on Friday, and now Monday. Getting impatient and upset.

name: Qingfeng Chen
text:
(Translated by Google) I wonder if you remember iris? Yesterday, her amniotic fluid broke at about 1:35 pm. We called you around 5:30 pm to find out if her condition is normal. Your doctor is very sure to tell us not to worry. It will be around 1:30 in the evening. It ’s been 12 hours. When I called your doctor again and left a phone number for us, we called for a long time before contacting your doctor, but he still said everything was normal. He only helped to find the contact method of the pet emergency room, but during the two prenatal inspections of iris before, we twice asked you to help us find a contact method for the emergency room. You said that even if there is a problem, you can do it at night Calling you, you also have an emergency room at night, saying that she will have no problems with the second production. Even if there is a problem, you can help me at night. I believe you, because Iris has been here to check with you . But last night when we needed you most, I took a long time to contact you. I also thank you for helping me find the emergency room contact method at the end, but just when we were going to see the emergency department When Iris left us, I always wondered why during the two prenatal check-ups, we asked for an emergency room contact method. You only gave me your outpatient phone number, and I remember I told you that It ’s just that Iris can contact the doctor who can help her when the 1% you said needs the doctor ’s help. You said you can help her even at night, but when Iris needs the doctor ’s help most, where are you , Did you know that because we spent the time to rescue her in the most urgent time, if you can help me find the emergency room contact method, at least Iris still has the hope of survival, and May continue to be with us. Do you know that iris is like our daughter in our hearts? Do you know how helpless we are when we watch iris walk away in front of us? I want to ask you Where is the night emergency? I want to ask if your commitment is really so worth mentioning? Iris just had her two-year-old birthday last month. She is still so young, and the baby in her stomach has a total of 9 lives. Just say that it is gone? ?

(Original)
不知道你们还记得iris吗？昨天1:35pm左右她的羊水破了，在5:30pm左右我们打电话给你们，想要了解她的情况是不是正常，你们医生很确定的告诉我们不用担心，等到了晚上1:30左右已经12个小时了当我再一次打给你们医生留个我的电话号码我们打了好几久才联系到你们的医生，但是他还是说一切正常，那时我们已经非常的担心的说了iris的状况下，他才帮忙找宠物急诊室的联系方法，但是在之前iris的两次产前检查的时候，我们两次要求你们帮我们找一个急诊室的联系方法，你们说就算有问题在晚上也可以打电话给你们，你们也有晚上急诊，说她是第二次生产不会有问题的，就算有问题你们也可以帮到我在晚上的时候，我相信你们，因为iris一直到在你们这里检查的。但是在昨晚我们最需要你们的时候，我却花了很长的时间来联系到你们，我也感谢你在最后的时候帮我找到了急诊室的联系方法，但是就在我们准备去看急诊的时候，iris离开了我们，我一直想不明白为什么在两次产前检查的时候，我们要求要一个急诊室的联系方法，你们只给我你们门诊的电话号码，我也记得我告诉你们我只是为了iris在那个你说的1%需要医生帮忙的时候可以及时的联系到可以帮助她的医生，你说你们就算晚上也能帮助她，但是在iris最需要医生的帮助的时候，你们在哪里，你们知不知道就因为在最紧急的时候我们却把救她的时间花在寻找你们，如果当初你们能帮我找到急诊室的联系方法，最起码iris还有还有生还的希望，还有可能继续陪着我们，你们知不知道iris在我们心里就像我们的女儿一样，你们知不知道当我们看着iris在我们面前走掉的时候，我们有多么的无助，我想问一下你们的夜间急诊在哪里？我想问一下你们的承诺真的那么的不值一提吗？iris上个月才刚刚过完两岁生日，她还那么的年轻，还有她肚子的宝宝一共9个生命就这样说没就没了？？

name: David Paullin
text: Sandy cross is untouchable in her fields of work. She is the best with customer service as well as support. She brings top quality employees to the business and they do more than top quality care for animals. Absolutely outstanding atmosphere. Very clean and respectable facility. By far the greatest rates along with all of the amenities. With her you always get more than what you are paying for.

name: Bethany Clements
text: I have boarded my Schnauzers here several times over the years and have always been extremely happy with them!  They truly care for pets, and take the dogs out 5 times a day and they actually play with them (most places are only 3 times a day and the employees playing fetch with your dog would be unheard of lol).  I love this place!!

name: Corrine Steding
text:
I have utilized the services of Paws and Claws, for years for our three dogs, and was always very pleased with the care that they recieved while in the care of Ms. Sandy.
I do realize, that the New Management, following Ms. Sandy, left more than just a little to be desired, but that only speaks volumes to me as to the quality of Ms. Sandy’s work.
It is unparalleled.
Her genuine love for the animals is astounding.
No pun intended, but Sandy works like a dog to take care of the animals entrusted to her, and I know this first hand.
I am so thankful that Ms. Sandy has returned to us, and I would encourage all residents to support her business, by donating any old towels you no longer need, paper towels, laundry products, dog food etc. For anyone who is in aware, Miss Sandy not only runs a kennel for our fur babies, she also runs a rescue for homeless ones as well.
Let’s show her our love, and help her, in any way that we can, to insure that this precious woman is able to carry on her excellent work.
She didn’t just leave paws and claws in the hands of those who were not capable,
she came back to restore quality to her establishment!
So please, let’s all lend our support, and encouragement.
God bless you Ms. Sandy, and thank you for all that you do.

name: Chris Hoover
text: Used them many times over the years. Always had great service and have never once worried about the care my dogs were receiving while they were there. Great staff and amenities..

name: Sarah Bailey
text: I boarded my dog here for three days and came back to find that they did not know where she was. If she didn't have a GPS tracker attached to her collar for me to find her (she has escaped my yard in the past and they were aware that she digs), I would have no idea where she was (across the highway about half a mile up the road). Consider somewhere else to board your pets.

name: Annie Lyons
text: Sandy is back! And this place is awesome again. They take excellent care of my fur baby when I must be away.

name: Ward Howell
text: Great place to keep your pets , very reliable. Thanks

name: Kaitlyn Carroll
text: I would not suggest using this place. My dog stayed there and I had dropped off his own bed to put in his room. When I picked him up they had no idea where any of his stuff was so I just left without it. They also had a lot of young children handling the dogs there and my dog doesn't do well with kids so I was a nervous wreck. It just didn't seem like a professional place. I would try Branchville Animal Hospital across the street.

name: Donna Bowman
text: I worked there and i would never leave my fur baby there..  They don't get took out like the owner says.. The middle wing had no air and she charged all the customers full price and never told them there fur babies wouldn't be in the air conditioning.. Poor business..

name: Heather Kayne
text: Wonderful place! They helped us out with out kitty during the hurricane.

name: Sherri Perry
text: Kenzy an snooki always come home happy so I know they get treated well on their stay there

name: T Johnson
text:
I picked my dog up yesterday, 6/20/16 from Paws N Claws in Odenville, AL. after a 9 day stay and was told he had the runs. I've been leaving him there almost 8 years and this has never happened before. I had to get up with him in the middle of the night. ***This business has been bought and is under new management!!!  It would have been nice to know this prior to my dog's stay. I drive from B'ham to Odenville because I trusted the former owner and her business. I'm not so sure about these new owners. They never once inquired about whether my dog was up to date with his shots. That's probably one reason he was sick when I picked him up. Who knows if the other dogs are up to date with their shots.  I called at 7:20 am this morning to inquire as to how long my dog was sick before I picked him up. The new owner, Tony, was going to check with his wife and call me back. It's 3:30pm and I have not heard from Tony. I took my pet to the doctor. They are treating him with antibiotics and probiotics. I'm going to be looking for somewhere else to board my pet.

Beware, you have been warned.

name: wild rose
text: Did not groom my dog only touched up. I would not recommend them for grooming.

name: Wyatt Hunter
text: My dog loves that place! He gets excited every time we drive up!

name: Lee
text: Heidi always feels welcome.

name: Hayden H
text: Haven't heard good things

name: Katie Lucas
text: Neat place for animals

name: Beth Parsons
text: Extremely nice place

name: Rachel P
text: Read Facebook reviews before deciding to book.

name: william knight
text: Amazing people and amazing lovable animals.

name: Linda Hamilton
text: Wonderful place for all your pet grooming needs! The ladies are so nice and my dogs always look and feel beautiful!

name: Wanda Goolsby
text: Great employees. Took all types of notes on my dogs health issues.  He get ear infections if water gets in his ears so I think they put cotton in them but then didn't go back and clean them with a wet cloth like my previous groomer did.  I'm not sure if they ground his nails either.

name: Dillon Sullivan
text: The groomer was late for my Zoom Groom appointment but compensated by removing the upcharge for the Zoom Groom. She handled my senior dog well and did a good job on his haircut. We will be back.

name: Skyah Baker
text: I'm 14 and I was wondering if I could work here

name: akolang1961
text: I HIGHLY recommend for boarding.  I kept my dog there 3 days, and am completely satisfied.  The ladies are so nice, and they accommodated all of my dog's several "quirks."  5 stars from me.

name: Jessica Morris
text: As a brand new customer, I cannot say enough about Pet Spa and Play - they are the absolute BEST! Referred to me by a friend and pet professional, I couldn’t be more pleased! They are so kind and truly compassionate about working with animals - and it shows! My dogs look great and I can tell they were well taken care of. I have been using the same groomer for 5 years, but I am sold on Pet Spa and Play, from here on out! So glad to have found them! 🐾❤️

name: becky bright
text:
ZIGGY ALWAYS LOOKS SO GOOD.
NEVER HAD A PROBLEM WITH THE GROOMER.

name: Kim Melton
text: I made a boarding appointment for my girls and was given a time to drop them off today. When I arrived the place was closed and no one was there or even answered my calls or texts. We had travel plans so I had to make other boarding arrangements for them. No one yet has even responded to offer any explanations as to why they were not there to receive my dogs. This is not a good way to keep or do  business.  I am very disappointed.

resp.text: Please call me direcly at 205 317-7072.  Once again we are so sorry.

name: Isaac Rojas
text: Highly recommend she did really good and takes real good care of my pup like if it was hers

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!! Have a great day!

name: Patte Whitlock
text: Great local business and very nice people.  They do a great job. A little pricey.

name: Jason Patterson
text: The ownloves your baby just like her own. You get all the care and facility but without high prices

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review and comment..  it is our pleasure to serve!!

name: Robin Taylor
text: I took Rufio for a play day while I had a long work day. I misplaced my keys and could not find them in enough time to pick him up. They were very patient and helpful. He ended up  being  boarded overnight and they were very understanding.

name: Mark Hamaker
text: Love it here! great staff and i trust my babies are taken care of! They come home smelling great and looking amazing.

name: bobby adams
text: Very good people always happy with my pups when they are done

name: Lori Steward
text: Thanks for taking such good care of my boy Kujo. And his little BarBQ bow made my day! I'm thrilled to find his new Spa! I highly recommend Pet Spa and Play! You won't be dissapointed!

name: Rebecca Mason
text: Connie is not only a highly talented, not to mention affordable, groomer... She is also the kindest soul you'll ever meet. Her love and compassion for not only the dogs but also their owners is a rare thing!

name: Don Thomas
text: God bless pet spa and play great people

resp.text: Thank you so much! 🙏

name: Sandra Cagle
text: Great place to get your pet groomed.

name: Constance Williams
text: We offer professional grooming boarding and daycare for your pups! Hope to see you soon

name: Timothy Hall
text: I've only been once so far, but they took great care of my Cavalier Spaniel. I'll be going back.

name: Alexis Eady
text: Was desperate to find a groomer after reuniting with a pupper that had been lost for some time and quite matted. She took good care of him and did a phenomenal job. Would recommend to anyone. Thank you.

name: Omauri Whotlow
text: She is an extremely rude person. I called and she answered and said "Hello, I need you to hurry because I have someone in my car"! Very unprofessional. I wouldn't send my dead dog to her! DO NOT GO HERE!

name: Abby Owens
text: This lady is terrible! I would never send my babies there! I called to ask how much she would charge to do a big German Shepard and a medium sized husky all she said was I can’t see them so I can’t tell you. Then she proceeded to ask me if I was at her house??!! She was extremely rude and unprofessional. She clearly doesn’t care about her customers

name: Brianna Deerman
text: Terrible terrible hair cut on my Pomeranian nicked him 4 times he is terrified to be touched now to fix the chaos of a sad excuse of a hair cut on him. Just don't know how to cut period it looks like he basically is chopped up we're she didn't even try to fix it or fed his neck line down to his chest Worst $40 I've ever spent! Never take your animal here

name: Darlene Rembert
text: Ms. Pam does a great job grooming my dog, Drew.  She has boarded him at her state of the art kennel, as well. And if you get your pet groomed, she offers one free night of boarding, if you board within 30 days.  I completely trust her with my pet and know that she takes really good care of him.  He loves her as well.  I recommend her to anyone who wants to take advantage of her love of animals and expert grooming.  She also has a pet sitting service that I plan to take advantage of.

name: Nikki Rowell
text: I've been using Dirty Dog Saloon for the past 4 years and I Love It!! The quality of her work and just the love and care she shows my dog is rare. Its hard to find a place that grooms and boards your pet and the pet is always glad to see them or wants to go with them. This, to me, confirms that she truly loves and cares for my pet when she is in her care. Dirty Dog is hands down the BEST facility around and I would highly recommend them to ANYONE that truly loves their pet the way I love mine!!

name: F. A. Brown, Sr.
text: Ms. Pam is a Rock Star! She gave our girls, Jacy and Juno the a Royal Custom Cut!. We LoveLoveLove Her! I recommend her to the World!

name: LeighAnn Gray
text: Highly recommend! ALWAYS THERE FOR ME when we need (that need is to know my fur babies are well cared for) and Pam LOVES each and every one that walks through her door! Clean convenient and a lovable environment.

name: Christal Davis
text: I have been using Pam since 2007 and absolutely love her.  She really cares about each and every pet that comes through her shop. I highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Clarence Bigham
text: I have used Dirty Dog Saloon for many years. I am very happy with the work Pam does. I will use Dirty Dog  as long as I have my two Babies(Dogs). She does GREAT work!!

name: Denny Odom
text: Never beed unsatisfied with the dirty dog

name: Glenn Todd
text: Pam is a true professional passionate about her animals,fair prices kennels are spacious  animals are not in cages. If you love your pet let Pam do the grooming.She also picksup and delivery service for grooming. and offers pet sitting.

name: Jessica Costes
text: I'm very unsatisfied with the service I was given. The owner was very short and honestly rude when I explained to her how I wanted my fur baby groomed. She had him from 10am-2pm. He did not smell that great when I picked him up and the worst thing of all she completely butchered his haircut. She left him so uneven it is ridiculous! His haircut basically looks like she cut his fur with her eyes closed!! I would advise everyone to take your fur baby some where else with better customer service and quality!

name: Shawn
text: Great place to talk you dog for all your grooming needs. The owner is so sweet and passionate about the dogs. She always flexible with time and very reasonable $$$. This is the place!!! You have come to the right place!!!!

name: Malcolm Slaughtet
text: My dog name is buddy and everytime he goes to dirty dog salon he comes back looking and smelling wonderful I just love her

name: Sammy Rogers
text: love Dirty Dog Saloon!!. The best groomer in town!!

name: Frances Hilbish
text: Pams dog boarding facility is one of the cleanest places I have been to. She is also an excellent dog groomer as well.

name: Robert W. Lewis
text: I have been taking my one eyed baby to Pam for a while now she is really awesome with dogs her passion shows and she has a huge heart, my Lil maxx loves going to her and she does an awesome job grooming him, I would highly recommend her to anyone, she is always available when I need her, thanks Pam you rock!!!

name: Don Thomas
text: Great job on my dog

name: Aubie9 Chic
text: Dogs were traumatized when they left. You are not allowed to come in the shop, she brings the animals to the fence for you to pick up. It's in her words because of liability but in every grooming shop I've ever been in you go inside. My advise if you can't see where and what conditions your babies will be in just don't do it.

name: Gabriel T
text: I had to go out of town, and couldnt take my dog with me, Pam was very helpful and inmediately connected with my dog, who is a brat. The place was clean and the mood was perfect for my nervous dog. Great place around the Birmingham area to take your pets to!

name: Ed Jennings
text: Took my Yorkie and my Sheltie to Pam two weeks ago. Asked her to only trim paws, ears and butt on my Sheltie.  She trimmed the whole coat!  My Yorkie was basically untouched,  except for her back and her anal area was badly bruised and skinned with deep cuts from the clippers. She still has black bruises and large scabs.  I'm so angry, I haven't decided what to do.  My husband has taken my furbabies in the past to Pam, but I went with him this time.  The yard was nasty and smelled of feces. I would advise no one to go to her shop!

name: Barbara Hicks
text:
I have been having my Bichon Frise groomed with Pam Drexler since April 2014.
I had a bad experience with my former groomer and lost my long time groomer to marriage and moving far away.  I met Pam in Pet Smart and she was so friendly, so when I needed a groomer I called her.  She has been grooming Casper ever since.  She is a very caring, loving groomer to all dogs.   Bichon's are very tedious to shape, blow out and make fluffy. Casper loves his bath and Spa day.  An excellent caring place to take care of your four legged children.

name: Lenora Arnold
text: Sweet ladies working there who do a great job of grooming my dog.

name: Nathan Holder
text: Every time we're out of town Bark Avenue is the only place we trust to board our dog with. The owner treats our dog like it's hers and he loves going there every time. It makes our trips easier knowing that he is well cared for.

name: Nathan Martin
text: Great place to let your fur babies stay!

name: Kate Kelton
text: Nicole is amazing with my baby Bella, a long haired chihuahua.

name: Renee Culverhouse
text: My dog loves it here!

name: feliceyia vickers
text: Took my 8 year old Maltese in for a grooming and last minute which was amazing because they let him in on such short notice . The price was also great for a wash and the nails being clipped were included with the service. But my concern is about dogs behavior. My Maltese name is prince and he is normally very energetic when he goes for car rides. But, yesterday he was very drowsy and Extremely thirsty. Prince even threw up soon as he got inside of the car once I picked him up from the groomers. He seemed so out of it yesterday ! Not sure if this place gives dogs anything to sedate them but that should definitely be discussed if so! Especially on an empty stomach! I was told to bring him him at 10:30 am but was told that he had 15 dogs in front of him so he’ll be ready by 6 pm (closing) which is definitely no problem but That’s a very long time to go without food or water. My other concern was about my dogs cut, his back hair was choppy and the ears were choppy as well and very uneven. His tail also looked like it was left to air dry and not combed out at all.

name: Carl James
text: Do not take your pet there. Very unkempt in appearance dog cages stacked on top of one another dogs running around. The shampoo is over the counter cheap stuff my dog had outdoor dirt on his paws I picked him up and he still had the same dirt his coat is not well groomed all in all it not a good spot if you care for your pet. Southern Paw is by far the best.

name: Jenna Beattie
text: I've only used this facility for boarding because I don't have a dog that needs to be groomed, so that's where my review comes from. This is a family owned business that truly cares about their pup customers. They are located in a great area. They take good care of my dog when I have to board her. Their prices are low enough for me to afford which is always a plus. The husband and wife pair are friendly, caring, attentive to you & your animal's needs, and deserve all the business of this area. I have had no complaints with this business and would recommend to anyone!

name: Sharleen Baskin
text: They was great to baby and  I  know my little Miss Fendi is a hand full ... But they took care of her... I will be bringing  her  back....

name: Christopher Todd
text: We have a 1.5 year old Siberian Husky. We love to take him there for services and boarding. Prices are great, the owners have a heart of gold. Definitely recommend this place 🐕

name: Judy Flint
text: They really  love what they do and very friendly  family business.

name: Francine Sanders
text: They always do a great job grooming my dog and they know my dog by name. The only business that I’ve trusted my dog with and they have never disappointed us.

name: Tyler Sellers
text: They took care of us with a last minute booking and we're very accommodating.

name: Gene Emmerich
text: Great people and my dog loved going there.

name: Pat Corlee
text: I took Sha Sha there today.  The parlor was so clean.  Sha Sha was so pretty when I picked her up.  Was very pleased  how Sha Sha looked.  She will  go back😅

resp.text: Thank you so much Ms. Corlee! We love having Sha Sha here! She is such a sweet baby! We look forward to pampering your pup!

name: Timothy Grantham
text: Owners definitely do a great job. I would trust them with my kids/dogs anytime.

name: Katherine Richardson
text: Our dog is so happy to arrive at Walks and Wags every day! It’s extremely comforting to know our pup is having a great day and is well loved by a knowledgeable staff. Training and socialization are prioritized, and we love the open communication facilitated by Cindi and her team.

name: Stacy W
text: I cannot say enough about the great care that Walks and Wags provided for my Hershey while we were on vacation.  She has always loved going there for Doggie Daycare so I thought I'd give them a try for boarding as well.  They  did a fantastic job!!   I can honestly say that she loves this place as much as home.  Thanks to all of the staff for all that you do in loving and caring for our animals.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I delivered to this fine loving place a few times and I must say it smells good very clean and the staff be on top of things and the love I seen them show the pets won me over I tried to get my dog in there around Christmas time and they was booked up so that should tell you people love this place and trust it highly recommended

name: Jim Stokes
text: went by for lunch, but the dining room was closed. went to checkers instead, because they have outdoor tables.

name: Marilyn Taylor
text: My Golden Retriever just got the most fabulous groom from Bre. She came home looking like a million bucks and smelled fabulous. Bre is truly a dog grooming artist. Just look at my dogs smiling face.

name: Delana Ibsen
text:
Walks and wags has been such a Godsend to us. When we started bringing her a couple years ago we had a pup that we couldn’t give the proper exercise or life experience to. Because of walks and wags we have been able to finally establish proper pack structure at home in a way that makes all of us happy and able to enjoy life together.
The entire staff have been so incredible to us and I can’t seem to find words great enough to express my gratitude for all you have done.

resp.text: You are an amazing dog owner. Keep up the great work.

name: C Sells
text:
EXCEPTIONAL SERVICE & STAFF!! Sooo kind and generous! 💞💞💞
They cared for our fur baby for a week and he was right at home!

name: Lauren Parker
text: Our dogs love coming here and getting the opportunity to learn social skills as they interact with other dogs.  We like how personal the caretakers are with us and our dogs.  They know the dogs’ likes and personalities.  I can go away on vacation and not have to worry about the dogs.  I know they are having a blast and they are in good hands!

name: Karen B
text: As a puppy, our dog began going to a weekly play-date at Walks & Wags.  She is five years old now and still loves her day with her friends each week.  She comes home tired, but happy, from constant play.  We also board her with W&W whenever we travel and it is wonderful to be able to leave her with no worries, knowing she will be cared for by people she knows (and loves).  She is more than happy to enjoy her vacation while we enjoy ours.  Cindie and her staff are excellent trainers, as well.  I give W&W my highest recommendation!

name: The Knockout Ladysaint23
text: Great place for your dog to run, play, have fun and spend time with their friends or make new ones. After playing, your dog also gets to take a nap. After naptime, your dog also gets a bath, their nails trimmed and they also get a lovely bow before going home. Grooming and training is also available. You can rest easy knowing your dogs are well taken care of by friendly and knowledgeable staff, that love your dog just as much as you do. Don't forget to check the Walks and Wags Facebook page daily, you might get to see a picture of your dog playing.

name: Herder
text: Amazing place i know from personal experience the staff is amazing

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Mary Duffy
text:
This is a wonderful place for your dog(s) to come. Not only do they get socialized with other dogs but they get in some great exercise. Cindie Carter and her staff are who really make this place work. Simply put, they love the dogs.
My dog has been coming 1-2 times a week for 4 years. He loves Walks & Wags. . His excitement grows once he realizes where we are going, until he all but bursts from the car. I recommend everyone bring their dogs to Walks & Wags.

name: Lauren Perry
text: Walks and Wags have been nothing shy of absolutely amazing. They have provided more assistance in the care and training of my puppy then I ever knew I needed. Every staff member at Walks and Wags is educated and knows exactly what they are doing due to the amount of training that they provide their employees. I’m so glad that I found them!

name: Brian O'Hear
text: The people here are amazing and friendly! They take great care of your dogs! It's hard to find people like this who care for pets this much. They treat you like family.

name: Sloan Blaylock
text: As a former kennel employee and current vet tech (at another establishment), I feel qualified to give Walks &Wags a thorough review.  The staff is incredible. They all have an undeniable love for animals and are extremely dedicated to keeping your four-legged family members happy and safe.  Small, well-supervised play groups ensure your dog gets the proper socialization he or she needs, while careful supervision prevents any dogs from being over stimulated. They take great care to make your dog feel at home. To top it all off, your dog receives a bath and is returned to you fresh and clean.  Walks & Wags is a gem of a place. Your dogs will thank you for bringing them to board and/or play!

name: Christine Ford
text: Our experience with Walks and Wags has been phenomenal! My 9 year old, old lady dog started once a week day care with them several months ago. After several weeks of getting oriented to the facility and the staff, my old, lazy dog began to run and play at home again! She chases and brings toys and is clearly a much happier, more relaxed dog. I can’t say enough nice things about Alex, the lady who greets her in the mornings. The groomer at Walks and Wags does an excellent job with out stressing the dogs. These people clearly love what they do!

name: Katie Mallinger
text:
My dog went to walks and walks for a several years before we moved to Tennessee. When we moved I tried another daycare for my dog, but when I picked him up he was more stressed than tired.
My dog and I are visiting the Mobile area this week and I took him to walks and wags for a day of fun. I drove in the driveway and he knew where he was, and his reaction was priceless.
I would recommend walks and wags to anyone that loves their dog as much as I love mine.

name: Buddy Arensberg
text: Staff were very professional. Communication was excellent.  My dog loves Walks and Wags, and they are working with him to develop better social skills.  Much more than a boarding facility.

name: C Lynn
text: We tried this facility a while back, very bad experience. Owner was extremely rude and our dog will not be returning.

resp.text: I am the owner and I have not been working  on location. I’ve been wrapping up end of year and training. I would love to discuss your experience with you and  see if we can  figure out a solution. Of course our staff and myself apologize for any miscommunication. We have tried to locate your name in our customer mgmt system and have no record. Please reach out and we will be happy to assist . Warmly, C. Carter

name: Ilka Porter
text: The entire staff is fabulous. They all truly care about your dog(s). Our Molly also got a great haircut by Katie. Highly recommend!

name: mjill gee
text: My dog is a regular at Walks & Wags and I can't say enough great things about what a wonderful Doggie-Daycare place it is.  The outstanding owners, Cindie and Larry Carter, and dedicated staff are true dog lovers and have a great understanding of the needs and personalities of all  the dogs that come to play -and/or board- there. They have a great set-up for tons of outdoor play and lots of special dog activities as well. It is the ideal place to leave your dog when you are not going to be home as their day will be full of fun, stimulating activities, tons of exercise (broken up by group nap-time!)  and best of all, love and affection - oh, and a bath at the end of their day to boot!v If you are looking for a Doggy Daycare or boarding place for your pup, you won't want to look any further than Walks and Wags. We are so very fortunate to have it here in Mobile!

name: diane gibbs
text: Amazing people and a great place to take your dog for exercise, socialization, and they work with the dogs. They have pools for the dogs, hit tennis balls endlessly and the dogs are ALWAYS supervised. There is no rough play allowed and they come home cleaned and ready to sleep! Dogs are worn out. They take a nap at the hottest part of the day and then back out to play! It is great!

name: Lee Dunsmore
text: Took very good care of our little one and gave her a nice bath also.

name: Jake Rosner
text:
Training with Alyne has been so fun! We have only just begun taking our new puppy to walks and wags. Alyne is kind and patient and we can’t wait to come back again and again!
Will be boarding and training with walks and wags often! :)

name: Gusto Frazier
text: The best place for a dog my lab wouldn't jump in or out my truck but after being with walks & wags she now jumps your dog will get all the fun and exercise it needs and also a bath I've also left my lab here for a weeks boarding when on family vacation they're the best they love dogs and dogs love them

name: Kimberly Diane Rouse
text: They really care for your pup.

name: Patty Howell
text: Sophie had a great time at "camp" while we were away!  Alyne was great and she can't wait to go back!

name: Susan Newby
text: Love the staff and how much they care for my pup!

name: Sugarray Henry
text: This is a great place, and everyone who works there is amazing with the dogs. They are very professional and at the same time very customer friendly with plenty of excellent advice for dog owners.

name: Ann Corl
text: We and Willis love walks and wags. Tell him we are going to see Larry, and he goes absolutely crazy.

name: Megan Blosser
text: Walks and Wags got my dog to come out of her shell.  When Reagan began doggie daycare at Walks and Wags, she was beyond anti-social with dogs outside of her home pack.  She would tuck her tail and run in the opposite direction of strange dogs.  We took her to Walks and Wags to socialize her.  The results are amazing!  Now Reagan is a total social butterfly.  Her tail is held high and wags happily.  Its like she was in a cocoon of shyness and now she is a content fluttering butterfly!

name: Lyn Lankford
text: Good service

name: Phylena Babbitt
text: Dogs had a great time at there weekend stay !!

name: Brandi Luv Burns
text: They are Amazing my moms 2 dogs are crazy dogs and they were so sweet and calm with them! Thank you

name: Michael Johnston
text: Awesome people  👏 great place good with my dogs had no problems with them at all simple to call or to book. Great rates very caring people   wuz there for us when everyone else wuz booked up thank you  call them give them a try we did will book another stay for my dogs soon 😀👍

name: Debra Beadles
text: My dogs cane back from a week here clean and happy.  they were unusually calm for return from a kennel stay, we will definitely be back!

name: Jessica Logan
text: Outstanding service. Best grooming around. Amazing suites for boarding. This place is above and beyond any around. Clean, safe, boarding and daycare!!!

resp.text: Jessica,  We are always excited when your crew comes to visit.  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to do so!

name: Sean Reavis
text: They're great! My dog loves going there.

name: Amanda Ford
text: I really like them at first did great work. But when I couldn't make appointment and had to cancel they where very rude about it and never asked if I would like to reschedule. Was not happy with the attitude at all.

resp.text:
Amanda, rest assured I am checking into the situation you have written about.  At the moment I can only find one person with your name in our system.  The person with that name last checked in our salon on June 25, 2018.  I will not further any more details to protect the privacy of that client (and should it be you, your information).
I look forward to discussing your situation further.  Upon calling the salon tomorrow one of our team members can put you directly in touch with me.  I look forward to us resolving your case.
Thank you in advance,  Melody Basch

name: Carts Hancock
text: Our precious Havanese loves to go for day care!  She almost chokes herself as she drags me to the door!   She and the cat have also stayed for boarding both overnight and for extended stays.  They are given lots of attention and come home happy and healthy!   The entire staff are friendly, professional and dedicated to provide the best care and excellent grooming services for your pet.

resp.text: Oh my goodness, the pleasure is ours.  And I love that you can always feel comfortable discussing their specific needs with us.  Love those babies!

name: Local 360
text: We always brought our Tony here and they always took such great care of him. First class.

resp.text: We appreciate your confidence in us, thank you!

name: Nancy Hardin
text: Excellent groomer and our doodle loves her visits!

resp.text: Nancy, Thank you for putting your trust in us.  As we both know this is not your first baby we have had the pleasure to serve.  We are honored to have had the opportunity over all these years to pamper your pups!

name: Megan W
text: Debbie did such a great job on our doodle!  I was impressed when I walked in and she came right out to talk to me about what I wanted.  I showed her some pictures and she definitely delivered!  Thank you again Debbie for your great work and excellent customer service!

resp.text: Megan, we are thrilled you chose to trust us with your baby. Debbie loved working with you; see you again soon!!

name: masta t
text: Always done a great job grooming our pomeranian.

name: Belinda Paris
text: Morgan us a very good groomer

name: Donita Sheppard
text: This is a great place to have your pretty groomed! The staff is friendly and very knowledgeable. My furbaby looked awesome when they finished with him!

resp.text: Donita,  We are blessed to have such great clients !  Thank you

name: Brenda Gardner
text: Rescued a papillon we knew nothing about this breed, called and they had a groomer who was very knowledgeable about papillons our dog loves her great place

resp.text: Brenda,  We are very blessed to have a very capable, loving, professional team.  Each of them are adamant on giving the best of service and sharing knowledge with our clients.  Thank you !

name: Gus Thiele
text: Take really good care of pets

resp.text: Gus, it is our goal to always hear that from our loyal customers.  Thank you so much!

name: Christopher Smith
text: They went out of the way to talk about my dogs grooming needs and challenges.

name: Danielle Simmons
text: They always do a great job with our toy poodle!  And the girls are so sweet

resp.text: Thank you!  It’s very fulfilling to hear your confidence in us

name: Lauren McQuillan
text: Does an amazing job with labradoodles! Very sweet and professional staff!

name: Roberto Gay
text: Great place to leave your pets.

name: Teresa Sellers
text: They always do a good job with our dogs.

resp.text: We thank you for trusting us with your precious pet!

name: Roberto Gay
text: Awesome place, very nice all around.

resp.text: Roberto,  You have been a constant client for years and we love that you have allowed us to take care of multiple pets for you.  Thank you for your trust in what we do!

name: Dianne Johnson
text: Penny groomer is excellent.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Cindy Thomas
text: Great groomers

resp.text: Thank you for your trust & confidence in us! We look forward to seeing you again, real soon!

name: Randy Nelson
text: Awesome place!!!! Love melody!!!

name: Donita Sheppard
text: This is a great place to have your pretty groomed! The staff is friendly and very knowledgeable. My furbaby looked awesome when they finished with him!

resp.text: Donita,  We are blessed to have such great clients !  Thank you

name: Marilyn Green
text: So pleased with the service at Doggie Do's! My first time bringing my poodle, Piper in. She looks so good, smelled great and their prices were very reasonable. I will definitely be bringing her back. Thank y'all so much!

resp.text: Piper was a pleasure to work with! Thank you for your business!

name: Laura Sirles
text: I love the staff at Doggie Do's! They're always so nice and Clyde leaves looking adorable every time we go. We visited several other groomers in Hueytown before we tried this one - they're by far the best! I recently learned they also do boarding, so we look forward to giving them a try next time we're out of town.

resp.text: Thanks Laura! We just love Clyde and enjoy what we do! Thanks for the opportunity to serve you and we look forward to many more future visits with your sweet guy.

name: Robbie Norris
text: Our Babies seemed very happy when they came home, will definitely use again! Next trip I want them to get the works and get use to the groomers.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review and your business.

name: Stacey Wells
text: They made our dog look so lovely and she was so happy when we picked her up!! I think they've spoiled our dog (worse than she already was)!

resp.text:
Thanks so much! When you love animals and you love what you do, it just shows.
Thank you for your business.

name: Jo Cartee
text: Very good with our pet. They do a great job with her hair.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate your business.

name: Cathy West
text:
My mother’s dog Parker is 11 and has never enjoyed getting groomed until Doggie Do’s.
It is so comforting to know their caring staff
takes care of our fur babies like family.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We appreciate your business.

name: Jennifer Jones
text: My baby girl Daisy, we'll always go to this Spa because she deserves it these people are really good and they know what they're doing and I are so sweet and I just love the cookies and stuff they have and all the retail is just so cute for people who love their fur babies

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer. Daisy is a doll and we so much appreciate your business.

name: Jennifer Cabaniss
text: They are very good people, our pets have been treated awesome,  and they do a great job on their grooming, and bed and biscuits is a great service also. We will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!

name: 2Badcats
text: Dropped our pup off for a 1- night stay so we could spend the day celebrating our anniversary. As always, he was perfectly happy when we picked him up the next morning. It is obvious that Alesia & John love and take great pride in their work. We have used them for grooming, daycare & boarding over the past few years and have been completely pleased.

resp.text: Thanks Susan! Love you guys especially Mr. B. ♡♡♡♡

name: Dena Dalton
text: The kindest and most caring groomers I've met or used. I have a golden rescue who is scared of strangers. The owners took the time to approach and make friends with my pup so that my pup and I are completely comfortable. I love how my pup smells when I pick him up, and the fees are affordable. Great, great people!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Deana! We appreciate the opportunity to serve you!

name: 2 Badcats
text: Our pup has been a loyal customer of Doggie Do's for about 3 years now. We take him there for grooming, boarding & some days just to hang out. He loves them, and so do we. Alesia & John are talented, kind folks and it is clear that they truly love their work. We gladly give them the highest recommendation possible.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind review! You guys, especially Bailey, have found a spot in our hearts.

name: Kathryn Headley
text:
Our baby girl love the staff at Doggie Dos
She really like to go and see John most of all
Thanks yall for all the love and hard work ya'll do

resp.text: Thank you all. We just love Evie Jane ♡♡

name: Dawn Murray
text: They did an amazing job on my fur baby

resp.text:
Thanks for the review but I don't see you as a client in our database.
Let us know how we can improve so as to gain your 5 star review!

name: Melissa Findley
text: We LOVE Doggie Do's! They are always professional, accommodating, and caring to our Trigger. He gets excited as soon as we get to parking lot, ready to go for his visit! He always smells great, looks handsome, and is ready on time after his grooming appointments!

resp.text: Thanks so much Melissa! You know we love Trigger too!

name: Sheila Griffin
text: They were very good.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the nice review! It's our pleasure to serve you and get to know your furry friend!

name: Christie Pilley
text: I would like to say that even though I have only spoken to Doggie Do's regarding bathing my baby and the new puppy hotel they will offer - I am very impressed and pleased.  Scheduling conflicts have kept me from bring my baby in but I will be using them many times during the upcoming winter months and when I go on vacation.  Love they are so close to my area.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really are looking forward to the boarding facility opening and better serving our community!

name: Chip Ramsey
text: They do an awesome job with Butkus D. Dogg. I think he enjoys going there.

resp.text: Thanks Chip! Butkus is always a very good boy. ♡♡

name: Rachael Langley
text: My baby has been only 1 time and I highly recommend this business for your pet. They were also friendly and I am very satisfied how she looked and smelled so good!!! Thank you John I will be bringing her back!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review! We are happy to hear this and will see you soon.

name: Tracy West s
text: We love doggie do's!!! Once, we were in a rush and had to use another place on brooklane Dr. The other place shaved Lunas for too short and skinned her all up. Not Doggie Do's!! They do a perfect job on Luna every time. You can count on these people to treat your pet like they would their own! And these people love pets!

resp.text: Thanks Tracy! Luna is a sweetheart ♡

name: Terri Frederick
text: We LOVE Doggie Do's!!!  Took our boxer there for his first grooming experience and they made us feel at such ease about leaving him.  They are wonderful people who care greatly for the animals that they work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and great review!

name: lanie parker
text: I have 4 little girls, two of which need special handling due to health issues.   Hope, Gracie, Lola and Abby loves to visit DoggieDoo.   I don't worry because I know they are taking good care of my animals.   I could not be more pleased with the care and attention given to us.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Brandy Finke
text:
I am so glad they are here for me.  I have a German Sheppard and I can't handle giving her a bath.  They give her a bath and they also provide defurmination which cuts down on the shedding.  I don't know what I would do without them.
They take such good care of her.  If she is there when it storms, they give her extra loving because Bella is scared of thunder.  They love on her like she is one of their own.

resp.text: Thanks so much Brandy! We appreciate you and the kind words!

name: amee sully
text: We love Doggie Do's! We never have to worry about Jax when he is in their care! He always smells great and looks handsome when I pick him up! I would recommend Doggie Do's to anyone looking for a groomer!!

resp.text: Thanks Amee! Jax is a doll!

name: Lauren Barnett
text:
Doggie Do's is by far the BEST place to get your pet groomed and cared for. I live in Argo which is a 45 minute drive to Concord just to have my Maltipoo Bella groomed and she always looks amazing when I pick her up. Everyone in my family takes theirs dogs here and we always will!!!! Thanks Alesia and John for always taking care of our fur babies! Y'all are the BEST!!

Lauren

resp.text: Thanks Lauren for the kind words! Bella is always an angel and we love you and your family! Thanks for your loyalty and the opportunity to serve you.

name: Michael Williams
text: Quick clean comfortable great work

resp.text:
Thanks for your review but I don't see you as a client in our database.
Please let us know how we can improve to gain your 5 star review!

name: mary harris
text: I live in Gardendale and I pass many other places that I could take my pets for grooming, but I drive to Doggie Do's because they care for my fur babies as if they were their own. I now have 5 fur babies that will have to be groomed and taken care of and asked my husband if he thought we should find a place closer to our home because getting 5 dogs to Bessemer may be a hassle. He said absolutley not because he doesn't think that we would ever get the service, passion or concern that the people of Doggie Do's put into each and every fur baby that is brought to them. If you are like me and think of your pets as part of the family, then you will find no better place than Doggie Do's.

resp.text: Mary,  thank you so much! Your kind words have brightened our day and I love your babies!

name: Jamye Holt
text: Today was the first of many to come. I called for a same day appointment as luck was on my side they said I could bring my Miss Lil Bitt in at 3pm. I was a little nervous about the first time visit but the moment I walked in the door the feeling was gone . I have never taken her to such a fabulous groomer since no longer being able to take her to Villa Rica GA.  Doggie Do's was extremely fast and did  awesome  on my poodle.

name: Christy Thomas
text: Great place everyone is very friendly and they are awesome groomers my dog was and is very happy to come here

name: Patty Maddox
text: Very rude on phone definitely need to brush up on Customer service skills wouldn't take my dog after rude encounter on phone

resp.text: I'm sorry Mrs. Patricia Mattox but you were 45 minutes late without even a phone call. When we called to let you know we would have to reschedule you started yelling obscenities and our phone etiquette comes across as rude? You actually called the owner a b*tch. We don't do business with people who disrespect us this way. Have a great day and I'm sure there are other businesses which you've never stepped foot in that you'd like to go troll and leave ugly reviews.

name: Donna Sartain
text: Doggie Do's has been Bailey's groomer for 3 years. They have always done a great job and treated Bailey like she was their own dog.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We love Bailey!

name: Tracy Bonnett
text: Oliver and Lenny love going to Doggie Do's.  They take care of our fur babies.  Great people and highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks so much Tracy! We love Oliver & Lenny and always appreciate the opportunity to serve you guys!

name: Miranda Latham
text: My doggie Lil Bit and I love Doggie Do's!! They are always so nice and always make my fur baby look so cute!

name: heather
text: Love this place our dog roxy gets so excited when we ask her wanna go get your hair done.

name: Emily Barlow

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review! TJ is a sweetheart!

resp.text: Thanks for the review Marnie. We try and we also kinda love dogs a lot! Glad it shows! ;)

resp.text: Maurine, you and Loki are the best! ♡

text: My  dog loves their treats.

resp.text: Glad to hear! It helps that our treats are all human grade and healthy! ♡

text: Have been using them since they opened.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Pat Jones
text: Good

text:
Axle really looks forward to going to Doggie Do's,all i got to do is ask and he go's nuts.
they are really a pleasure to work with.
